name: David Hall
text: We use Stegall for all our HVAC work and have been for the past 10 years.  They are the best at customer service.  Their technicians arrive when scheduled, are always polite and courteous, and our HVAC never goes out.  Joe Ryder, our technician this year, was great!  I highly recommend.

name: Harrison Bender
text: Joe Rider is great. He has been to my home for service on multiple occasions and is always incredibly polite and on time. Service is great with Stegall.

name: Jeff Owens
text: Love this company. I really appreciate Joe and all he did to fix our air conditioning. I am so happy with my experience with Stegall and highly recommend them!

name: David Coram
text: I had an after hours HVAC emergency at my home.  It was hot and the HVAC would not come on. It was around Midnight on a Friday night when I called Stegall. Joe Rider was on call and came right out in about 30 minutes, and got us up and running in about 20 minutes.  He was courteous, kind, and had a great attitude to be up so late.  I wish I could hire more people like Joe to work for me!!

name: Drew Lansdell
text: Stegall has been very professional in my experience with them. I have requested two homes receive an HVAC inspection prior to purchase, and Joe has performed both. I would highly recommend the service.

name: Cathy Gibson
text: Woke up July 3rd. No air. Twenty guests expected for a Fourth of July celebration!  Shelly was extremely helpful in the office and Joe the technician came out and had us up and running in no time. Thanks Stegall!!

name: Susan Smith
text: Very prompt and courteous service in the middle of the night to get our air conditioning working. We were so grateful!

name: Shane Gates
text: From the office staff to the guys on the field, everyone is fantastic! I've had work in plumbing, electrical, and HVAC. Brandon, Chuck, Justin, Nick, and Quentin are professional, personable and knowledgeable. Shelly who works in the office is priceless! This company has the best employees you could ask for! I would recommend them to everyone.

name: Nancy Prater
text: Excellent service! I appreciate the prompt response to my initial phone call. I can't remember the last time technicians have covered my floors with protective sheets. I have already recommended them to my co-workers!

name: G Weldon
text: Have used Stegall for HVAC units, electrical needs and plumbing issues and highly recommend them!  Just today I had a plumbing issue - was able to get a quick response time, and can’t express enough how awesome and thorough Brandon and Bobby were in resolving the problem and cleaning up afterwards.  And, the fees are so much more reasonable than what I’ve encountered in the past!

name: samuel mcdonald
text: We were very impressed with Joe's professionalism and integrity as he serviced our HVAC this morning. He did a wonderful job!

name: Tony Diliberto
text: Joe and Steven we on time and very profesh. Great company!

name: janet taylor
text: I just completely replaced my central heating/air system and duct work after many years long overdue, which was a task.  I shopped thoroughly and got 4 bids, Jeremiah's bid was best as well as the install was very satisfactory with experienced professional & courteous labor.  I greatly appreciated Jeremiah's drive and honesty to give the best job for the best price.  I also recommend Carrier Infinity unit with media filter and UV light.

name: BIZ 77
text: Had an issue with my drip pan being full and needed the drain unclogged so I contacted Stegall who sent Joe the same morning to get the issue resolved quickly.  Went ahead and signed up for the two visits a year deal because I was so impressed with the service we received.

name: Lisa Churchill
text: I called 4 different companies to help me with purchasing a new HVAC unit for my sunroom. No one could help with this purchase and install - all said that the crawl space was too small for a new unit. However, Stegall said, "Yes!" The team of Jo, Todd and Justin dismantled the existing unit piece by piece and fit the new unit in this tight space. It is anyways easier to say no but so glad that Stegall said YES! It works like a charm - thanks Stegall!

name: Caroline Langley
text: Joe Rider was the Technician that serviced our HVAC. He was quick to diagnose the issue, and he was very punctual. Would use again in the future!

name: Ron Inscho
text:
Friendly and helpful service.
Michael arrived within two hours of our urgent call and stayed until our problem was solved! The manager we worked with, Jerry,  was considerate of our plight and worked efficiently to help us get things resolved. This was one of those everything-goes-wrong days, and Stegall made it better.

name: Don Kraupa
text: Brandon did an awesome job and is very professional. He represents a great company, who must be proud to have him. Thank you Brandon.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words

name: Holly Nealey
text: Thanks Joe Rider for your great service! Always prompt and knowledgeable about services provided!

name: Tina Howse
text: Our A/C went out last night and Joe was here first thing this morning and had it fixed before we could even blink. He identified the problem, replaced the motor and now we're in the cool again. I can't thank Joe enough for helping us out in such a timely fashion. Thank you Joe!!!

name: kaytebugg016
text: It’s late June. My house was 85°. A technician came and went and my issue was resolved within 25 minutes. He was polite, fast, and very knowledgeable. I also live in a condo so my access to the HVAC and condenser units was not the most convenient. Overall I am 200% pleased. Would definitely call Stegall again.

name: Shana Moton
text: Stegall offered excellent customer service from being on time for our initial quote, to offering the best quote we received, to being able to install our new A/C the very next day (on a Saturday!!).  Andrew with Stegall offered service with a smile, was very knowledgeable, and was very kind and upfront with us the whole time.  We were very impressed with Stegall and recommend them to anyone needing to replace your home's A/C - it's going to be a hot summer!! But, thankfully, we'll be sitting cool inside our home :)

name: Karri Hensley
text: I called Stegall for a broken AC. Joe from Stegall was at my house 2hours later and expertly analyzed my system. He gave his recommendation and I followed it. A crew from (Todd and Brandon) Stegall showed up the next day to install a blower to properly match my existing heat pump. Todd and Brandon worked in withering heat and paid attention to the smallest details, not scratching or denting my floors, or walls.  The heat pump developed another small issue and Joe came back to inspect the over all system AND fixed the heat pump issue not charging me the callout fee. Joe, Todd and Brandon are excellent at their jobs and are very personable people. Stegall is a quality company. I would recommend them to you.

name: Darren Wells
text: Stegall came out and serviced my air conditioner. Justin was friendly and honest and explained everything he was doing and gave me great tips. I'm freezing and it's hot as hell outside! Thanks Stegall!!!

name: andrea egea
text: Mr Gilbert saved us tonight. Was very helpful and warned us of possible future problems. I am not totally useless when it comes to such things. Was the first place to call us back at a bad time of day. Great job!

name: Lauren Hall
text: We have used Stegall for years for yearly maintenance and other work. Technician Joe Rider has been wonderful, prompt and walks us through any issues!

name: Mortimer Calhoun
text: I'm very pleased with the services I have received with Stegall. Great company, great staff.

name: Terry Stinson
text:
The service man today was Joe Riley. He was, as is usual for Steagall, prompt and courteous and solved my problem quickly and professionally.  He went the extra mile for the filter I needed after he checked everything out.

I find Steagall and it’s employees to be knowledgeable and prompt and professional from the administrative side to the service side.

name: Julie Dana
text: Called in service order for my hot water heater and they came out the very next morning at 8AM!  The service guys were excellent and their attitude was very customer oriented and professional.  I will call Stegall again when I need services they provide.

name: Libby Langford
text:
Got home from work and the house was 80 degrees! Called another company and they couldn't get anyone out until late if any, and would charge an emergency fee. Called Stegall, and the guy was here in an hour, and had it fixed shortly afterward. Very professional and efficient, and the price was VERY resonable! They are definitely my "go to" people in the future.

By the way, I AM a real customer that had a real problem....

name: Carolyn Lantrip
text: I came home from work one day to find my air conditioning was not working properly and I called Stegall the next day.  Two technicians met me at my home on Smith Lake in Winston County AL that evening around 4:00 p.m.   They were very courteous and serviced the unit.  They explained exactly what part had gone bad, replaced it with a new one which they had on the van and had my air back on within the hour.  The charge for the work was more than fair and I will definitely use them again.

name: Jenifer White
text: Excellent service throughout the process! Everyone was punctual, professional, and competent. After a bad experience with another company, it's refreshing to see that there is a company that can meet expectations. Great job!

name: Zachariah Seanor
text: Joe stopped by today and made sure our unit was running efficiently for our big family reunion. Thanks Joe Rider for answering my questions and not judging our messy house 😄

name: Crystal Knezek
text: Our main A/C unit stopped blowing cold air. Jeremiah came out quickly and diagnosed and fixed the problem, after another company screwed it up and tried to make us think we needed a whole new unit. Jeremiah was straight forward, friendly, prompt and considerate, and above all, he was honest. Thanks!

name: Michael Heaven
text: Great company, repairs on our HVAC were reasonably priced.  The service professional that came to our house, Joe Rider, did a great job getting our system back in tip top shape and was prompt and courteos!

name: Daniel Richards
text: They came out to service my HVAC and did a fantastic job!!  Mr. Gilbert was very polite and took care of us.  I will definitely will be calling Stegall again for future issues.

name: Rena Miller
text: The technician was great.  On time and super friendly.   So far my experience with Stegall has been great.

name: Haley Dshae
text: I highly recommend Stegall mechanical for any plumbing, electrical, and hvac needs. Honest and reliable and all around great company.

name: Susie Brasher
text: We recently replaced one of our units using Stegall. They made sure we were purchasing the option that worked best with our budget. We were very happy with the customer service and overall experience. Thanks Stegall!

name: Rod Damon
text: I have used Stegall for at least 5 years. I have used them for HVAC maintenance, new hot water tank, and electrical work and have always had great service. I have a yearly maintenance contract with them to service my heat pump. They come out twice a year and I have had less unit problems since I've gone with them.

name: Jennifer Lerma
text: I knew that I needed a new heat pump as my current heat pump was 14 years old.  When I got home from church on Sunday and it was 80 degrees in my house, I knew I could put it off no longer.  I had a quote from another company but had recently learned about Stegall through a co-worker.  They came out to my house within a couple of hours of receiving my call, confirmed I needed a new system, gave me quotes and options, helped with me financing and installed my new system, all within 2 days.  They sold me a better system and a better price than what I had been quoted by another company.  Throughout the whole project, I was constantly being informed of what was going on and everyone was helpful, professional and nice. They answered all of my questions, no matter how inconsequential they may have been. Stegall is my company of choice and I will be happy to recommend them to all of my friends and family!

name: Brewer Family
text: Stegall has been our go-to for Plumbing, Electrical & HVAC. We have an older home, so the guys at Stegall help us give it a little TLC. Brandon Jones especially will go the extra mile! Thank you guys!

name: Jerry Baker
text: They came out to check on our HVAC and serviced it with an affordable price.

name: Abigail Cole
text: Stegall were very professional. Got great service. Got a new heat pump installed, it is working wonderful.

name: Jason Echols
text: My house AC unit stopped working. I am a plumber by trade but I have no idea when it comes to hvac type stuff. I call stegall and they came to my house and investigated the problem. I assumed I would be looking at a huge bill because I have had similar issues at a different residence, and Norrell charged me $600, 3 separate times over a number of yrs. so I figured it was going to be the same ole same ole. But was wrong!!!! The technician that came out explained everything he was looking for and what I needed to look for and do to prolong my AC unit. Turns out I was not doing maintenance for the unit that I was not aware of. He fixed it quickly and in no time the unit was running properly. My wife was super excited and happy......happy wife =happy life. Lol 😂

resp.text: Thanks Jason for the kind words,please let us know if we can help you in the future.

name: Sara Fondren
text: Be careful with these guys. I had one of them tell me my condenser was bad and had to be replaced for $5000 when it was actually just a fuse. Get a 2nd opinion or better yet just don't bother calling this place at all.

name: Ann D
text: Have used in the past for HVAC repair and maintenance and recently used again to install flood lights, fix a doorbell and a 2 way light switch.  They did a great job as always.

name: Anderson Jackson
text: Andrew did a very good job this morning, he ansered all my questions. I would recommend Stegall Heating and Air.

name: Niaj Nia
text: The tech came in to check my unit. He diagnosed it as a leak but never found a leak. In addition to charging me for a diagnostic fee, I was charged an additional $125.00 for a "leak check". Isn't the diagnostic a part of checking to see what is wrong with the unit ... including checking for leaks? I would not recommend this company AT ALL. They are ripoffs and I am taking them to court if my money is not returned. I will be contacting them on Monday about this matter.

text: Bought a service contract. They never called the number I gave them to set up appointments. When I need my ac fixed my contract is expired. I never received any service. Wouldn’t recommend a company that takes people’s money and doesn’t provide any services.

name: Jeremy R
text: Needed a heat pump and was impressed with how professional everyone was. I cancelled my other estimates and had a new heat pump the next day. Thanks.

text: Stay away! Came and LOOKED at my water heater. Could not fix it and sent me a $200 bill! ???? The company that actually made the repair charged me less than they did to LOOK at it. Garbage. DO NOT CALL.

name: Buddy Estes
text: very prompt, knew what he was doing and repaired on the spot!

name: Joe Allred
text:
My two HVAC units were due for annual spring service, and my commercial ice maker had stopped running .  Upon my request, Ken Speer called before his arrival, and promptly arrived on time. Very professional and friendly, Ken immediately began to perform the maintenance service due on my units.

I knew my upstairs heat pump system was in need of replacement, and Ken explained the problems with it, and recommended a replacement system that would be best suited for the space.

Ken determined the problem with my ice machine, installed the replacement part needed, and had my machine making ice, in less than an hour.

I mentioned to Ken, the water pressure in my house had never been sufficient, since I built my house in 2005, and he contacted a co-worker from Stegall's plumbing division, and upon his prompt arrival, they determined my pressure regulator needed replacing.  Stegall had the replacement part on their truck.  The new regulator was quickly installed, the pressure adjusted, and my water pressure problems were solved throughout my entire house, for the first time, since I built my house, 11 years ago.

I would highly recommend Stegall's services to anyone in need of HVAC, or plumbing service.  Ken Speer is a professional, knows his business, and promptly resolved 3 major issues within my home, and did so, in just a few hours.  I couldn't be happier with his customer service.  I give him an A+.

name: Marlin Headley
text: The technician, Joe, was courteous, efficient, and most importantly, arrived on time

name: Cindy Fletcher

Throughout the whole project, I was constantly being informed of what was going on and everyone was helpful, professional and nice. They answered all of my questions, no matter how inconsequential they may have been. Stegall is my company of choice and I will be happy to recommend them to all of my friends and family!

name: Joe Allred
text:
My two HVAC units were due for annual spring service, and my commercial ice maker had stopped running .  Upon my request, Ken Speer called before his arrival, and promptly arrived on time. Very professional and friendly, Ken immediately began to perform the maintenance service due on my units.

I knew my upstairs heat pump system was in need of replacement, and Ken explained the problems with it, and recommended a replacement system that would be best suited for the space.

Ken determined the problem with my ice machine, installed the replacement part needed, and had my machine making ice, in less than an hour.

I mentioned to Ken, the water pressure in my house had never been sufficient, since I built my house in 2005, and he contacted a co-worker from Stegall's plumbing division, and upon his prompt arrival, they determined my pressure regulator needed replacing.  Stegall had the replacement part on their truck.  The new regulator was quickly installed, the pressure adjusted, and my water pressure problems were solved throughout my entire house, for the first time, since I built my house, 11 years ago.

I would highly recommend Stegall's services to anyone in need of HVAC, or plumbing service.  Ken Speer is a professional, knows his business, and promptly resolved 3 major issues within my home, and did so, in just a few hours.  I couldn't be happier with his customer service.  I give him an A+.

text: Air Degree owner Lonnie Law and COO Sam Billiter are amazing! They have an extraordinary amount of integrity and are exceptionally competent. They tested it and answered my many questions thoroughly and knowledgeably. We decided jointly that it needed to be replaced. Lonnie and Sam looked at my HVAC system, saw it was still under warranty and called the manufacturer to inquire about the warranty! It is still in effect for both parts and labor, but the work has to be done by a specific local company. They told me I could get both parts and labor done for free simply by phoning that company. What ethical standards they displayed! They also had gone far out of their way to work me into their very busy schedule. I highly recommend this company and will hire them myself in the future.

name: Samuel Walsh
text:
A technician came for routine service on Tuesday, the AC stopped working on Wednesday. On Thursday night we called to request service and a technician arrived Friday morning. I’m happy with the response time. The technician told us the breaker tripped and then charged us 139$ for his time and diagnosis.

We had this issue last summer and we were assured by the service technician that there is nothing wrong with the AC or it’s amperage, so we installed a brand new breaker. Today I was told by customer service that the issue again must be with the breaker and not the AC, so we are stuck with the charge. I’m really starting to wonder what the point of paying for a service contract is.

Customer service is friendly and the “hold” music is soothing.

Check Better Business Bureau site to read real issues with this company and decide if you want to do business with Climatemp.  They have lost my trust and my business!

name: Lynne Hall
text: Climatemp installed a high end Carrier system 4 years ago.  Now, July, having condensation dripping from indoor unit and damaging ceiling on lower level of house. He stated unit was improperly installed by Climatemp and duct work had separated from unit creating condensation which is dripping to floor below.  Also possibly causing the unit to underperform.  He is unable to repair the duct work due to how the unit was installed.  Climatemp worked on the unit in December and stated there was no issue then, (it’s not hot in December).  They will not stand behind their installation work. Spoke with Carrier, they allow any licensed HVAC company which is licensed to install their product.

Called me 2 days later to tell me the 30 minute repair was going to cost 250$ that’s a 389$ total for a warranty repair and under an hour labor. If money is no object this your shop. The original owner warranty is ten years and subsequent owner warranty is five years. Installation date 9/29 /17 as per your estimate. And don’t act like you installed or fixed anything because you certainly didn’t. And for you as the owner to respond with this tale is is further proof of the right decision I made to go elsewhere.

name: Rena Allen
text: The guys were very professional and did a great job putting in our ac system works amazing well done and then one month we found mold in the ac vents  and called climatemp out to do a mold treatment and also to clean vents they recommended a air scrubber which I wasn’t familiar with thought it was a good  thing to have they were saying positive things  Said it would eliminate mold and help with cleaner air. I asked them to clean inside the ac vents where the mold was but they didn’t get cleaned  the guys said they another job to go do. I was told the air scrubber we bought was to eliminate the mold that was still in the vents and prevent new mold from growing completely. I stayed away 24 hours cause I’m  sensitive to chemicals and especially mold I’ve dealt with mold before and became very ill and stayed in hospital. The night I did return home I woke up at 2 am with tightness in my chest and throat irritation and was very uncomfortable had fire dept to check me out was upset about it. I googled more about the air scrubber and found some people don’t do well with it and I feel I’m one of them and the side effects were what I was experiencing. It’s been two days and I will not stay at home. I called one of the owners David and asked them to please remove the air scrubber system it was the weekend so they were gonna charge me service call which wasn’t a big deal but I wasn’t even told when they did mold treatment what kind of treatment or was there mold in the ducts I feel like I’m scared to be in my own home. I don’t want to upset anyone But I would have liked to known. I talked to one of the owners David he was trying to make me feel better about the situation but I’m thinking the air scrubber is not for us.  which was very nice but I feel like im not going to do well with a system that isn’t helping me and I want to be comfortable in my home. I hope this company will make this right for us. They are very professional and have helped us in the past. I didn’t know how I would react to the air scrubber and I’m not doing well I would like to fix it please thanks so much.

name: J
text:
Climatemp sold and installed two new Carrier Infinity series, 18 seer units  in 2019.  These came with a 10 year parts/labor warranty.  In 13 months, Unit A stopped cooling 3 times over several months and Climatemp was unable to effect permanent repairs.  The last time Climatemp repaired unit A, it stopped working within 18 hours.  This was after several days of disruption, no AC, and probably 10 hours of attempts to fix it.  Unit B stopped cooling at the 7-month mark and the air handler had to be replaced.  They broke the condensate pump which leaked water everywhere and didn't seal the discharge side into the main duct during the install.  In addition, I have seen several misdiagnosed issues,  unterminated wires, holes in return box, and uninsulated freon lines to name just a few issues.  My favorite was the condensate pump installed so that it blocked the door from closing to the air handler room.  The customer service is awful.  Nobody will call you back.  You have to follow up on everything yourself.  I had a no show on more than one occasion and when I called to ask where the tech was, “oh he’s not going to be able to make it.”  After unit A stopped cooling, yet again, and nearly immediately after the last attempt to fix it, I attempted to reach a final resolution with the GM David, but he never called me back.  He told me he would speak to the owner and let me know what they decided, but no call.  It would be laughable if I hadn’t spent 14k on two units and was one year into a 10 year parts/labor warranty.  In the end, I never heard from him again, all while unit A was not cooling.  Ultimately, I had to get Carrier involved who thankfully switched my parts and labor warranty to another local factory authorized dealer, who has been amazing.  The new dealer fixed unit A on the first attempt, in about two hours, which was over pressurized with freon, and had been incorrectly diagnosed by Climatemp.  They provided updates through the whole process.  Then, they reconfigured unit A and B, which were never set up properly and were running inefficiently on factory default settings.  I would give anything to be able to go back and avoid ever using Climatemp, but they had such good reviews.  I discovered that A LOT of them are from their own employees.  Even the techs told me, they’re told to leave five-star reviews on google and have their friends and family do the same.  Look through the reviews and you will see the same names that you hear when you call dispatch or receive an email.  The owners, and the GM leave them, as well as their family.  You will see the same names leaving reviews across every location.  Normal customers don’t do that.  When bad reviews are left, you will see threats of litigation and claims of fake reviews.  Folks this company is shameful.  Please save yourself and use any number of available HVAC companies in Baldwin county.  If you have a part/labor warranty with them and you feel trapped, call Carrier.  They can and will help you.

** In response to the owner's claim - the last time your technician was in my home, he was there for nearly six hours.  I loaned him my extension cords and fed him dinner.  Your claim of being limited to 30 minutes is as disingenuous as the rest of your business practices.

resp.text: J please give us a call we would love to help you out sounds like you are one of a handful out of over 300 reviews that had an issue which we are human and do make mistakes as the loyal company we will strive to do our best to make things right in this relationship it takes two that’s loyal HONEST customers as well! If your not given the Proper opportunity to fix things then the problem becomes worse. Now the times we came to your house we had a time limit of less than 30min by you to fix your unit I don’t think that was the right approach! Please give us call at 251-968-6006 and give us the time we need while we are their to do our Job. Thanks,have a blessed day.

name: Jessica Cajueiro
text: If I could leave zero stars here I would! My unit, which I’ll admit is old, but it still works… Was not cooling as well as usual. This has happened previously and it needed Freon. So I called  Climatemp to come out… I knew they like to try to upsell your unit but I had them come out anyway. I had called and they told me there was an $89 service/diagnostic fee. So long story short… The guy came out opened the unit and within 10 minutes told my husband we needed a brand new unit that it would cost @ $3000 just to fix the leak. I told him no thank you we would get another opinion that I was not spending $10,000 today on a new unit. He then asked me “ What’s the right price to get you to say yes to a new unit today?” Climatemp keeps your credit card on file and within 45 minutes charged my account $189… For nothing! Within that same amount of time I had had another local company come out they had already fixed my unit, my house was cool and only charged me $150. Climatetemp does not tell you that they charge you $25 per 15 minutes they are there… If you do the math that is $1.66 PER MINUTE!! We would definitely not have let the technician take his 10 minute cigarette  break in our front yard if we had known we were paying that per minute!! They were there for 15 minutes, just wanted to sell us a new $8000 unit and told us ours could not be fixed for less than $3000, did not give us accurate information on charges, never left us an invoice and still won’t give us one, just charged my card. Terrible way to do business!!

resp.text: Jessica, we are sorry you feel that way after further investigation yes your unit was very old and had multiple R22 Freon leaks in it. The laws require us to fix and repair the leak before we put r-22 Freon back in this is a costly repair especially in your case where a whole coil was going to have to be replaced to fix your unit. So yes a coil plus recharging your unit with r-22 is a very costly repair. You say you paid 150.00 and you were cool again by another company but did they actually do you justice by putting some Freon in knowing its going to leak back out and you will be calling them right back out. We also noticed you said you already had them out once before. So as you can see your having to call someone out every few months to charge your unit mean while when it is running low on Freon it is working double time and costing you double time just to operate the system. It sounds like as much as you are having to pay for a very inefficient  system in your home with multiple service calls a year you could have purchased a new efficient system with just the savings you would have on your utilities each month not to mention all the 150.00 dollar service call. So did Climatemp really do a dis justice or where you just putting a band aid on something that really needed stitches to buy you more time. Climatemp charges by the quarter hr. Which can save you tons of money many other companies charge a 1hr minimum and flat rate prices that would have cost you much more. We are truly sorry for any inconvenience to you or your family but in the same note here at Climatemp we believe in fixing things right and not putting a band on something that will end up costing you much more in the long run. Our deepest regards

name: Sara H.
text: I’ve used ClimaTemp cooling for the past two years. I’ve always received great service up until this last week. I had a scheduled maintenance set up which was set up approximately 3 weeks prior. This was a service agreement that I had purchased from them which included a scheduled maintenance (3 times a year). A tech was scheduled to be here between 12-2pm. I received a call at 2 stating that all techs were on service calls and they would be a little late. No big deal. Well, 5pm rolls around. I call to get an ETA. I was told I was still on the board and that a tech would call when they were on the way. Long story short, the tech never showed up and I never received a call that night or the next day from anyone. Very frustrating when my plans had to be canceled that evening and I never got the service I paid for. It’s kind of like waiting on a text or call from someone that has no interest in you.

resp.text: Sarah, I’m so sorry for your inconvenience we were trying hard to catch all the service calls with multiple elderly people with out air conditioning period. We are sorry for any inconvenience we would like to make this right with you please give us a call anytime at 251-968-6006 thanks for your patience.

name: David Gamache
text: If I could give zero stars I would. Avoid this place at all costs!  Called them at 8:00 am for an AC repair at my condo. I am told they cannot give me a time but it would be that day. 4:00 pm, phone call stating the Tech is on the way.  4:10, another call asking if Tech was here. Then told, OH OK, he is on the way. 4:50, another call stating Tech was tied up but heading my way.  Nobody ever showed and no further contact. One can only assume there is so much business that they can treat people this way and still survive.  Pathetic.

resp.text: -lease give us a call 251-968-6006

name: Paula Gaubatz
text:
I had an in home estimate with Stan and he sold me on getting a new 16 seer 3 ton unit.  They told me it would be installed the next day and someone would call me around 8am to let me know what time to expect them.  After 9:30am and no phone call, I called and was told they would be here between 11:30am-12pm and it would be about 4-5 hours for the installation.  I called several times after 12pm to find out when someone would be here as I had to take off work to get this done, no one called me back.  Finally, at 3:30pm the guys arrived to install this system.  It was not until 2am that they left, completed the job and drove out of my driveway!  I asked if they could stop and come back the next day and was told no, they were required to finish the job that day.  2am is unacceptable to me, for someone to expect their installers to do a good job at that hour and also when it's not an emergency is beyond me.  I was also told by the installer that the company does this to them all of the time.  I called the next day to talk to the owner and I also emailed him.  I have yet to receive a return call.  I will never recommend this company to anyone.  Wesley was wonderful, very competent and very nice.  The next day, the unit froze up and had to have service repair.  They said the thermostat was not relaying to the fan the correct way and he fixed it and it's been good since.  The installers and service guys seem to know what they are doing, however, the management doesn't and it's evident in their complete lack of correspondence.  The one email I did receive the day of the install was from the owner and it was as though he was yelling at me with his !!!!!! all throughout the email.  Customer service will get you every time and theirs is awful.

After discussing the issues with Stan, I was offered an additional 2 year maintenance agreement.  Stan was very knowledgeable and upfront with me on his visit and Wesley was excellent as an installer.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Climatemp as your A/C provider.

name: M. Mace
text: My AC went out on a Sat and kudos to Climatemp for coming out right away.  That's where my good opinion ends. The sales person said the new unit would be eligible for an energy rebate - turned out it wasn't. When I brought the issue up with the owner, he was unhelpful and arrogant.  A few months later, they missed the included maintenance appointment because they claimed not to have my phone number (which was clearly on the paperwork) and when I brought it to their attention, they said it expired and wouldn't honor it. From the start, my summer bills have average about $50 more despite being a bigger more efficient unit. When I had another company service it, they discovered the electrical wiring was not done properly and needed to be redone plus the unit was short 2.5lbs of refrigerant.  Since there were no leaks, it probably hadn't been filled properly from the start (which explains the higher bills). I give them two stars because they came out on a weekend but I would never trust them to install a new HVAC.

resp.text: Please give us a call we would love to help 251-968-6006

text: Durham installed a much smaller unit than required for my home. Fortunately we purchased the best warranty they offered, so while we have suffered with heat and cold, multiple compressors and other parts were covered by the warranty. So if you want to pay for a large unit and get a small unit, while being talked to as if you just fell off a turnip truck, hire this company.

name: Ken Senes
text:
Update: Called SEARS again on May 24th to see if an earlier appointment could be made to install the part that had been ordered (I had called a week earlier to see if it would be possible to get someone to come out sooner than the almost 3 weeks I had previously been told that it would take to get someone to my house to put in the part). Well, to my surprise, this time I was told they could send out a serviceman the very next day (which they did). The repairman was very courteous and knowledgeable.....and the dryer has now been repaired.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Did not show up for first service call. Said truck broke down but we never received a call. Sears said they texted us...but upon further investigation, Sears said they transposed our telephone #, so who knows who received the message that said they weren't going to show up. Wasted one day waiting for repair man. Then after almost 2 weeks later, a repairman finally shows up. He was nice enough and seemed to know what he was doing. Said that a part would need to be ordered. Okay, fair enough. Part came in almost two weeks later; however, was told it will be almost another 3 weeks before Sears can send someone out to install the part. Customer service??? I don't think so. Bottom line: Almost 7 weeks without a dryer that's under Sear's Home Warranty program is a very POOR indicator of this company's ability to honor their agreement. Still waiting for June 9th to get here. Hope they show up. Signed, "Not holding my breath."

resp.text: Thank you, Ken Senes, for taking the time to provide us with your rating and review. We are sorry to hear you have not had a good experience with us. If you would please message us with the name, address, and phone number that is associated with this issue to our Sears Home Services Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/SearsHomeServices/, we will be able to see how we can help out. Please reference this review in your message, thank you

text: Not sure about the level of service, but if you are looking for someone to pull out in front of you, force you to reduce your speed by half, and slam on the brakes because they were not paying attention then fallow this guy.

resp.text: We apologize for any convenience one of our vehicles may have caused for you. We do ask that you reconsider using this location to let us know about our driving practice as it is used for people to decide on the level of service they could expect to receive from us. I have used other companies in the past, but none have ever been as meticulous as Mainline with their annual service and inspections. Great all around service and customer service.

The unit stops cooling and I have to do a hard reset for the air conditioner to come on. The unit struggles to cool below 74 degrees. We have to open the windows. The unit is too small for the square foot of the house. I continue after a year of seeking company assistance in resolving the problem and have yet to hear from anyone since my last call in the past two weeks.

Based on my experience with Mainline I can only assume they have all the business they want and they are not interested in my business. I’m glad I found out about there customer service before I had them do any work for me. I will never call them again. A waste of time!

name: Spence Overton
text:
Thank you Darryl!
We had multiple HVAC companies come look at our system about 2 weeks ago. One of them opened a gas valve in our crawlspace that they thought was inactive. They left and our home started to fill up with gas. My wife was home with the dog and didn't notice the smell. About an hour later Darryl from Mainline came and immediately noticed the smell. He located the valve in the crawlspace and closed it back up, potentially saving my wife and our home from a total disaster. All this and they didn't even charge us for anything. Best $0 I've ever spent.

In the future I will go with Mainline because the tech was knowledgeable and honest. And potentially saved my wife's life! Thank you.

They are the worst. Their home office is incompetent and their quality of work is terrible.

When you get a service agreement, they do not show up and you have to follow with them to get them to schedule service so you can get what you pay for.

They try to up sell on work that is not needed.

Their issue is their high turnover and poor, poor management.

I won’t be surprised if they are out of business soon.

name: Vinod David
text: The tech showed up on time but the work he performed was literally a five minute job. He pushed a long zip tie (improper tool!?) to push some collected gunk from the air handler condensation drain line. That is all he did and termed it as "flushing the system". On my insistence, he emptied the drain reservoir under the drain pump (he wasn't going to do it of I hadn't been standing there and asked him to at least make out as if he had done some work!) and charged me $117 apart from a "diagnostic charge of $89 for a total of $206. Highly unprofessional job, left a puddle of water behind ( thankfully it dried up by itself). The service manager I talked to on the phone to protest the charge, was, although not rude, but curt and said, " Hey, your system works, doesn't it? That is all that matters!" and would not listen to anything else. I paid the bill but If this is their customer care attitude, I know who I'm NOT calling for any of our HVAC related service or repairs. Highly unprofessional. I have half my mind to report the matter to Trane Service and maybe the BBB.

name: Spencer Harris
text:
I bought a house with a service plan with mainline on it already.  I had one inspection left so I got them to come out and check everything.  Two Weeks later I had a capacitor failure on my main level unit.  When the Mainline technician returned he noted that the connector had not been installed properly and he put another one on.  This lasted a week and Mainline was back again.  This time he said that the capacitor was bad and had to be replaced.  $300 dollars later I had a new capacitor installed that was perfectly good, according to Mainline, less than a month ago.  Another 4 weeks go by and my Evaporator Coil is leaking.  This was noted in Mainline's records on my house for two years, but they didn't find in their regular inspection.  When I asked them why I had so much trouble on units that they said were OK they just noted that things happen and the units were getting older.  I asked how they missed the leak and they blamed that on the type of instrumentation that some of the technicians have on their trucks.  the company that came out pulled out an instrument that looked like a WWII walkie talkie and was able to detect Freon as soon as they entered my attic.

in the end the cost to get their service plan will get you a discount on their service, but their inspections did not detect any issues and at least one of the parts that they handled failed within weeks of them touching it.

text: Sears came to my home and did a diagnostic test on my washing machine, then said they needed to order a part. After calling the help line, they told me that everything was done and that my washer had been fixed, but none of that happened. They took our check for the part, cashed it, then closed our ticket. No one during this process was rude to me in any way, but none of them were helpful in any way. I am absolutely appalled with Sear, and will not be using any of their services ever again because of this.

text:
Here is Sears asking for a " How did I like the service" comment when the  service hasn't been done. My mower's drive belt broke.  And it was time for the annual servicing. So I called and everything went well.  Parts ordered, service time arranged, Life was good. Two weeks later, no parts, no service call.  When I called back to check, the number I was given was not a correct number.  I had to call four times to the service number.  The first time I was transferred four times to get to the correct division for my service contract on my mower.  The fourth person couldn't help me and transferred me back to the third person and they 'dropped' the call.  Two hours 18 minutes... no, I did not call back that day.  Finally got through to the proper division for the mower service contract.  Got the service time set up with my complaint and requested service ordered.

The serviceman arrives and I tell him what I had asked for and he says he was only told about the broken belt.  No new blades, no new cut grass shield, and NO service.  He starts to replace the belt and I quickly saw he did not have the correct belt.  He had been given the belt that turns the blades, not the drive belt.

So off to the hardware store to get the correct belt.  Once he gets back, the drive belt repair was completed quickly.  Two days later, a different service tech comes by to look at the mower to get the numbers to order the shield.   He promises me that he will put in the request for the annual service.  A week later, someone comes out to my house and installs the shield on the mower,  No service, no new blades.  My son and I go get some new blades and put them on ourselves.  At least I can cut grass now.

STILL WAITING ON THE SERVICE.  I would take this back to Sears, but.....

name: Jacque Sherbak
text: Prompt, pleasant and assessed the problem immediately.  He ordered the part and installed it within a week.  Our beeping refrigerator was silent once again.  Very reasonable time.  We found it very helpful that Sears is now sending parts to the repair shops instead of customer homes.  This allows repair to contact us with a time in mind.  Another improvement is Sears is using local repair businesses which makes service time more convenient and faster for all. Much better!

name: Glen Zachreson
text: Received a completed status email on a work order which was not fixed. Need more detail information to the reason why the work order was closed. Unable to get the status online.

name: charlie whatley
text: Sears repair came out as scheduled, diagnosed the unit not cooling properly both freezer and refrigerator. Technician was very knowledgeable and professional. Job was completed by servicing the compressor and recharging and checking for leaks. Paid the service fee of about $145. The freezer came to life and is freezing but the refrigeration dept. only gets down ranging from 44-55 degrees. We are very disappointed as we installed a new compressor via Sears Appliance Repair in October of 2019. The most recent tech did not check any other components except the compressor. Any possibility of a tech coming out to check other components of our unit? Another disappointed customer!!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to bring this to our attention, charlie. We hate to see that you have had this kind of experience and would love the opportunity to take a look to see how we can help out. If you would please email the name, address, and phone number that is associated with the service order to our Sears Home Services Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/SearsHomeServices/, we will be able to see how we can help out. We appreciate your business and look forward to assisting you with this matter.

name: Sheree “Gigi” Thornton
text: The Mechanic was very personable and knowledgeable and had us up and running again in no time. My only complaint was it took so long to get an appointment...almost 2 weeks out from the day I called. Other than that, I was very pleased with the actual work and the mechanic who performed it.

name: Bara Designs
text: I have maintained a Sears Home Warranty on a few of my appliances for several years now, and I can truly say that it has more than paid for itself!  Unfortunately they just don't make things like they used too!  The folks that work for Sears are professional, courteous, thorough, and prompt!  Recently when my refridgerator was accumulating condensation and causing the metal shelving brackets to rust, they first told me that rust was not covered, however after further investigating they discovered the insulation had failed and are providing me with a full replacement!  I highly recommend Sears and their home maintenance agreements.

name: Nancy Reba
text: Courteous and efficient.  Will only buy appliances, etc. at Sears because of the wonderful service.

name: Sarah Creech
text: Sears Buyer Beware:  I am a senior and have been a loyal Sears’s customer for over 50 years but am very sad to say, I will never utilize Sears products or their service ever again and I will warn everyone I know to beware.   Sears furnished my homes in Chicago, Bethlehem, PA and in Montgomery, AL.  Sears has been my standby for over 50 years and it was an institution I really believed in.   The horrible, inexcusable way I have been treated by Sears in Daphne, AL for the past two months is unforgivable. I was told that I would be receiving a refund from 4 different Sears’s people.  I called Sears each time check was promised and not received.  I was told that confirmation would be sent via email very shortly.  Emails never came.   The fourth time (after 2 months) the Sears person I called said they had decided not to give me a refund.  So, I am going to the Better Business Bureau.  Sears may be going out of business, but they could hurt a lot of people in the meantime.  It took almost two months of contacting Sears Customer Service before I got to this point.   My dryer was old, and the refund promised wasn’t that much.   My refund is no longer the point.  After reading all of the numerous complaints by Sears customers, in addition to what I experienced first-hand, something needs to be done to protect others.

name: Keith & Suzanne Douglas
text:
Washing Machine still don't work since May 20, 2017 started pursuing Repairs.
It is now July 24, 2017
I purchased protection agreement in good faith.
They offered me $50.00 rewards.
That is not the equivalent to purchase price of washing machine or purchase agreement plan.
I only want it to work or a replacement washing machine that works.
It worked a little before service took place just made a loud noise.

name: Nelson Russell
text:
My complaint is not with the workmanship.  The technician was very professional and proficient; however, when he tech arrived, I was advised that some parts were not covered by the maintenance agreement.  I should have been told this on the first trip when the grill was inspected and the parts were ordered.  Cost was reasonable, but totally unexpected.
While we're at it, I also had a maintenance agreement on some yard equipment, but did not renew because I now have to drive 50 miles to take them to an authorized sears repair shop.  You would think that in a city the size of Mobile AL that Sears would have a local repair facility.  The days of getting service from companies who appreciate the customer is over.  Sad state of affairs.

name: Clay Davidson
text:
Technician was pleasant and fixed my fridge without any issues. His performance is the direct reason I purchased a home warranty from sears.

Good experience. Definitely recommend.

name: Renee Jones
text:
Refrigerator not working since 1/28. We had to throw all our food out. Customer service scheduled an appointment for  today 8 am - 12 pm.
Appliance repair company that handles repairs for Sears rescheduled our appointment for  Friday morning.  They dont do repairs in Georgia on Tuesday,  only Alabama. Sears assured us they were coming out. They NEVER came. Called customer service,  call went to the Philippines! They were NO help at all! Dont waste your money on the Master Protection Plan. It gets you promises of food reimbursement IF the technician says the there is no way the food would have been edible if we left it in there.
The entire refrigerator is HOT on the inside like it's not  plugged up.  Dont ask for a Supervisor to call either. They won't.  Never buying anything from them again.

resp.text: We hate to see that you have had this kind of experience and would love the opportunity to take a look to see how we can help get things moving in the right direction. If you would please email the name, address, and phone number associated with the order to SHSSocialcare@searshc.com and we will be able to see how we can help out. We appreciate your business and look forward to assisting you with this matter

name: Janet Boukal
text: The technician arrived on time and was very knowledgeable and helpful. The repair was done in less than 30 minutes and I am very satisfied. I have already recommended Sears to another family member.

name: Joan Lomax
text: My Friend Wiliams wife said he was the same guy that repaired it before and he knew right away what was wrong, please with service to get it fixed

name: Terry Rickell
text: Very satisfied with the Appliance Repair Tech that came out for our Maintenance Check and minor repair. He was extremely helpful and knowledgable about the appliance.

name: amlight1
text: Serviceman thought on a previous call that the temperature sensors needed to be replaced. He ordered 2. Said that when he came back he would olhm them to make sure they were accurate.  When he came back he immediately open the packages and asked me to disconnect the power to the oven. I did and he immediately replace the sensors not checking them for accuracy. Within 10 minutes he told me to turn the power back on. Packed up his tools and said that should take care of it. I ask him if he was not going to put his temperature sensor in and check the temperature and this was his answer. " well you will just have to cook in it" and left.  Problem was not solved,  the oven was still cooking at 60° hotter than the temperature setting.

name: Sonny Weeks
text: Following two repairmen visits to my home to repair an ice maker in my Kenmore refrigerator, my ice maker is still not working. I am now waiting almost one month for another appointment to have someone come out to my home for the third time.  At this time my experience with Sears repair is very poor.  I am very disappointed in my experience and do not see customer service as a tool that Sears repair service can advertise.  When my appointment is given, each time I am told they will be at my home between 8 am and 5 pm.  For a family where everyone works, this is certainly not convenient.  If my ice maker had been repaired this may have been more tolerable.  I was told by the last rep that the 90 day repair guarantee began at the time of the first repair appointment. That just adds fat to the fire in my lack of confidence in your services.

name: Mike Lehan
text: Technician arrived on time. He did a good job of annealing the issue and repaired the mower completely. I was very satisfied with the repair and the technician.

name: ron Joyner
text: The repairs and service were outstanding.The tech ( Malcolm)that came to our home was very friendly and professional. Repairs were quick with no unusual complications. Extremely pleased.

name: Tammy Johnson
text:
Repairs to my washer were preformed by a knowledgeable and very courteous tech.
Very pleased with this service and recommend it highly....
They also have a great home warranty plan as well👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍

name: Rosemary Messer Fender
text: This was my yearly check up just to make sure that the dishwasher and freezer are in good working order. The service rep. was knowledgable on both.

name: Wendy Sullivan
text: Rinaldo was engaging polite and knowledgeable. He repaired my refrigerator in a short time. I am completely happy with the result.

name: Betty Hoyle
text: He did a great job.  He knew what to fix when he looked the  mower over, I was very happy with his services.

name: Raymond Hare
text: Tech was the best! He diagnosed the problem and ordered the part to fix it for me. He listened to my concerns and was helpful in every way possible.

name: John Blount
text: Repair technician did a good job once they arrived. It took close to 2 weeks to get the service scheduled.

name: Shelby Rhodes
text: Washer repair technician was great,polite, knowledgeable,fixed prob,but Sears charged 79$ diagnostic fee,plus 45$ labor plus parts,I called number on receipt,the girl I spoke with was nice,said I would receive a 50 $ gift card by e mail...,.Still looking.......

name: Sharon McCaskill
text:
My ice maker was not fixed.  This was the 5th time we have called fro repair on it and it is not ever fixed. Still leaking water from the ice dispenser down the front of the fridge

Another service man came out this week and caulked the ice maker again.  It is still leaking from the ice maker inside the refridgerater and probably will begin leaking again from the dispenser again. NOT FIXED ...AGAIN.  IT SEEMS THEY CAN'T FIX IT.

Again my ice maker and dispenser are leaking about 1/4 cup each time I get ice and it is leaking and forming ice cycles from outside the ice bucket. Still the same. It is sad to have to go through this when you need your refrigerator repaired especially when it began when you got it home and as much as the price was that I paid!

Still leaking again.  The last repair man installed a new fan or did something to the fan. It helped a short while. Then started again.  This time the repair man did something else in the ice compartment.  It is better for now but just waiting to see if it fixed it this time.  We will see.

name: Brittany Miller
text: A complete waste of money--- had to call our  electrician---- technicians at our home less than 5 minutes but waited the entire day  when originally  tole 0800-1200 appt. Technicians arrived after 1400. Do not plan to use sears for anything in the future. this one star is generous. Sears needs to  get rid of the outsourced customer service in the third world countries--- they simply  do not care( sears must not either) and are completely  incompetent !!!!!

name: Melissa Duplesis
text: It as always is great Cody was very nice and helpful and I would like to have him and him only to do all of my things in the future. You have a great guy hang on to him.

name: Barbara Robinson
text: Great service--Very polite young serviceman--Thank you!

name: Paul Dowsey
text: The Lady , Althea,  was on time, did a superb job, corrected my mower problem and was most pleasant.  Thank you Sears.  Paul Dowsey

name: Joyce Langley
text: The technician arrived over an hour past the scheduled time and had not advised me of the expected delay until over 30 minutes past the arrival window. More importantly, the dryer was not fixed properly. The replaced belt came off when attempting to dry the first load. I contacted the technician immediately, but he refused to return. I was required to schedule another appointment through Sears - first available 6 days later- and learned that he actually had assumed the first repair would probably not hold. He was also late for this appointment but did contact me just shortly past the window for arrival. It was properly repaired this time, but I found the exhaust vent hose no longer attached securely. A voicemail message to him within 15 minutes of his leaving was ignored and I finally had to have someone else repair it. This was a very unpleasant repair experience!

name: Sherry Scarbrough
text: I hope after about the 10th time (I've lost count), that Titus has found the problem of my 'sometimes leaking' dishwasher. (Plugs omitted in the sides of dishwasher).   This has been an ordeal that has left a bad taste in my mouth for Sears repair.  Each service man has been nice, they just could NOT find the problem  .....hence.....I've wasted many days as 'lady- -in-waiting.'

name: Carol Oglesby
text: Fast & efficient. Washer works great. Thank you.

name: Ron Maxime
text: Sears brand name Kenmore seems to have become worthless. I bought a new refrigerator almost 3 years ago and the refrigerator has failed. I had to wait a week for a service technician to come out to tell me what is wrong with it and now it has been over a week awaiting the part to arrive. All the while I am without a $2000 dollar refrigerator. Now I see why sears will soon go the way of GE.

name: Limmie Walker
text:
WITHOUT REFRIG for the long hot summer was too much. Issue resolved with, appliance not repairable. Ok!  But to have customer  continue wait for delivery( due to storm in JACKSONVILLE,FL) WHERE wearhouse is .THIS IS UNACCEPTABLE. CUSTOMER/I SHOULD NOT have had to continue to wait.  ARE THERE NOT OTHER SEARS WAREHOUSE
AVAILABLE? SUCH AS In ALABAMA.  HINT: IF YOU VALUE YOUR CUSTOMER ; SATISFACTION IS THE KEYS.  Need help with loss food. Had to purchase APT SZ REFRIG WITH MY POINTS AND CASH...NOT GOOD SERVICE. DISSATISFIED.  .....

name: Martin Gartman
text: Great service. Tech. was very friendly and through in no time.

name: Mark Bernasconi
text: Repair person was very knowledgeable and professional.   Helped us save money on the repair.

name: Mary Nash
text: Prompt arrival.  Fast, efficient work.  Very satisfied.

name: Mark Costlow
text: showed up on time; pleasant, competent, thorough.

name: James Ryan Arwood (Ryan)
text: Customer service.

name: Cheryl Guilford
text: Terrible. Instead of replacing a part that we could use right now they keep replacing our door which is taking at-least 2 weeks and this is the 3rd visit within 2 months. I wouldn't give any stars but in order to make this post I have to select at-least one

name: Frank Temonia
text: The technician arrived as scheduled.  Had the dryer working again in very short order.

name: Amy Whiting
text: On time, qualified for repair, polite....

name: George Lansky
text: Repair technician showed up, needed to order a part, still waiting.

name: Sandra Dycus
text: Repairman was prompt, professional and efficient.

name: Janice Files
text: This was a complimentary "check up" on my washer - but the insides fell apart during the next use.  The guy did come out the next day and repaired it, no charge.  No clue what he did to it!

name: Dianne Nobles
text: very helpful and thourough

name: Robert Smith
text: Top notch service!

name: Ron Sherbak
text: Quick, professional and courteous!

name: Chuck Holtz
text: Renaldo was the name of the gentleman who performed the service. On a scale of 1-10, he gets an 11. I've never seen a serviceman with a better attitude.

name: David Arnold
text: Efficient, knowledgeable, friendly

name: William Amendolare
text: Outstanding in all areas !!!!

name: edison scott
text: satisfied

name: Rhonda Pezikian
text: Very friendly and professional

name: Heath Smith
text: It's been brought to my attention that some from another state or city has posted on our page we have irresponsible, employees and one ran them off the road, to who ever you are Im sorry that has happened to you ,but I received another call last week one of my trucks was blocking a gate at a ace hard ware in Decatur Georgia, reason behind this is we've sold some trucks last year n they ended up in actions, our name logo's and numbers are still on those trucks from what I've been told by few people who's called ,were trying to get the truck owners to remove our lettering we have the tag numbers of the trucks now ,so please remove the negative comment we've worked very hard for lot of years n take pride in this company, to have a bad experience as this said about us ,but I assure no more trucks will be sold with lettering. Thank you to all our loyal customers.i apologize.

name: Stacey Leighann Pate
text: They are all hard workers who will shoot you straight ! Will come out in emergency situations too which is great they are good people !!

name: Dawn Smith
text: Nice work 👍

name: Birmingham-Stillman
text: They have very irresponsible employees who get behind the wheel in the company truck intoxicated. I had to call the authorities since one of their workers drove down the wrong side of the road toward me then drove into an apartment complex parking lot side swiping two parked cars. License plate number was noted.

name: Wallace Williams
text: Good service fast response

name: Garrett Pearson
text: Timely and professional. All issues faced were resolved. Would recommend to anyone needing a quality air conditioner and wanting to conduct business with honest, diligent people.

name: Chuck Brand
text: We have used them for years to work with a large house on campus and found Hughes & Mullenix to be a great partner. The few times we have had someone try and call a competitor, we have found the quotes/costs to be considerably more, work less professional, and even had another company say a unit needed replaced and would take a week to get the new air conditioning unit. When I found out they had called another company, I had the person call Hughes & Mullenix who was able to fix the issue in one visit for the cost of parts and a service call. I would not use anyone else in Tuscaloosa!

name: Walt Park
text: Great job ,very helpful staff, professional service and highly recommend

name: Tammy Watkins
text: Awesome service always!

name: Nancy Emig
text: Customer service was great. Jenny was very knowledgeable and courteous.  Service person was extremely courteous and knew exactly what to did and my air was back on in immediately. I would refer this company to my family and friends.  Thank you so much!!

name: Regina Wilson
text: This used to be a good company before they start offering the repairmen commission when they sold an AC unit.  My family and I used this company for years. The last time someone came out, they put freon in my unit and said I needed a new unit because the leak was coming from within.  I called another guy who looked at the unit and said you have a leak in a hose outside.  He could tell because leaves and dirt had settled in the spot where the hole was. He fixed in about 10 minutes and havent had a problem since.  The time before that, someone came out, and didnt bother to look at anything, and said they could get me a new unit and they would have it built on a concrete block to make it nice.  I called someone else and it was the fan motor. Offering your employees commission has really prompted your employees to become scam artist, thus making your company look bad.

name: Carl B
text: Smart and accurate to diagnose my problem, would use them again

name: Jessica Miller
text:
First time home owner here who should have listened to her father the first time he suggested Head's. Actually called a different HVAV company initially. That tech said a clogged drain line was the issue. It wasn't. Head's came out and actually listened to my husband and I about the problem, then proceeded to run his own diagnostics and handle the repair needed.

Not a clogged drain but a bad module.

The tech was friendly, very knowledgeable, and I thoroughly appreciated him explaining to me what the issue was.

Thank you Head's for your time and professionalism. My family will only use your service in the future.

name: Machelle Thompson
text: Head's installed the Heating/AC Unit in our new home in Foley. They are always fast to respond to any questions that I have. They keep you informed of their latest offers so I can keep our unit running at top efficiency.

name: kim reed
text: When your serviceman calls to say he is on his way and my husband ask a time frame I don’t expect I will get there when I get there as his response ! Now to show up on a Friday tell us he doesn’t have the part in his truck it’s to expensive to carry all these parts around so will be back Monday charges 79$ service call leaves us with no air for the weekend in 90 degree weather with covid and my husband doing 8 hours dialysis daily at our home where all his equipment is we can not go to hotel ! I was not here at the time but you can bet I will be in phone Monday morning requesting a different service man if we hadn’t already paid 79$ and Dsld requested we use you id call someone else very dissatisfied and haven’t even had service done yet !

name: Peggy Duplan
text: I had a problem with my grinder and the previous company never returned my calls. After about 4 messages left and no call I called Hanson’s and they came out same day and was very professional and great price. I will now use them for my plumbing. Thanks Hanson for a great job.

name: Max Reed
text: Very friendly, professional and reasonably priced. I've never had a supplier react so quickly with such great service! I highly recommend Head's Heating and Air Conditioning.

name: William Blake
text:
Terrible company to do business with. They installed my heat pump two years ago. I’ve had to have them out half a dozen times in the last two years for repairs.  Now I had a warranty repair to the condenser unit outside. They said that the manufacturer would cover the parts and such but that I had to pay for four hours labor for the repair. ($200).
Tech arrived and 30 minutes later said that he had his equipment pulling a vacuum and was going to lunch. After he was finished it was 2.5 hours total (including his lunch break). Still charged me the $200!!!
I would advise anyone and everyone to stay away from this company! Poor service, poor workmanship and even worse service!

name: JBEECH
text:
I highly recommend Heads heating and Air for any of your Heating and Air needs. They installed a new unit in my attic and done a first class job. They where very helpful answering any questions I had to ask them about the equipment and duct work they installed the service tech was fully trained and very knowledgeable about his job. Thank you Keith and Ronnie Head for the well trained crew y’all have at Heads heating and air.  I am well pleased. Thank you  Heads Heating and Air

Well pleased.
JBEECH.

name: Renee Fransen
text: I've been a customer for well over 40 years ... Always professional, responsive and knowledgeable.

name: Rick Deason
text: A+ rating from me over last several years. Most recent service/maintenance call was performed by Mark who, in my opinion, has a very high level of technical competence and communication skills. Far exceeded my expectations even with your excellent past experience. You are doing something right here with your customer service!

name: Lynne Cary
text: Been using this company for years. They just put in an ac unit and did a fantastic service. Honest and they went the extra mile to make sure i was satisfied. You will not be unhappy if you use this company.

name: James Zirkle
text: Head’s has an amazing staff that really treats you like family. Our most recent repair technician was Devo. Awesome tech, punctual and very professional.

resp.text: Thank you, for the review on Deveais we strive to give EXCELLENT customer service!

name: Gene Youngblood
text: A great experience on this double installation. We hardly knew Chris, Gary and crew were here. In and out same day with no complications or mess left behind. Scott explained all the details and answered every question both before and after installation.

name: Amanda Forbes
text:
Will not use this company ever again! I was told I needed a whole new unit in 2015 so I did just that. Now since I have had my new unit installed we have had nothing but problems with it.
Had to call them out here for multiple different reason with my air not cooling, my unit not coming on and parts apparently going bad. Note that was only in the first 2 yrs a total of 6 different times. Now this year at the start of summer my unit again was not working got them out here and it was a bad part again, got it to work. So now here it is the starting of winter and my unit again is not working, my heat will not come on! Note this was a brand new unit they put in. No reason i should be having the issue im having. My maintenance on my unit has been kept up 100%
Would not recommend this company to anyone.

name: Wayne Vancleave Wayne Vancleave (Mrac!)
text: Several years ago I had the truly great blessing of becoming employed by Heads! I learned a lot, about Air Conditioning, R 410A refrigerant and equipment. Thanks to Mr. Head the owner, and also to Mike Roy Service Manager. Truly the best I've seen around in a long time. Thanks again for all the blessings and knowledge. I know we haven't seen each other in several years, but would you please give me the most honest review that you can. Guaranteed Service Heating & Cooling. Thanks again. Check us out to if your in or around Madison Ms.

name: Robert Wendling
text: Got a good estimate, they installed a new unit in my house in about 4 hours, very friendly crew, great work, I would recommend.

name: Frank Sloan
text: Explained the issue clearly ; repaired in very timely manner.

name: Page Pulliam
text: Terrific installation team!  Fast, efficient, friendly, and did a beautiful job cleaning up before leaving.  Wonderful experience!

name: Marvin Mohler
text: Worst service I have ever received. The technician obviously didn’t want to be bothered with the job. Told me it was a bad unit and send it back. I called Earley Air Control, they actually researched the problem and had everything up and running in a day. No defects, no bad unit no returns just a simple problem that was fixed.

resp.text:
Mr. Mohler,
At Head's Heating & Air we take our customers comments very serious and appreciate your feedback.  However, I do find it amusing that Head’s Heating & Air has NEVER been to your home.  Everything that you have posted is incorrect and false and frankly it’s sad that you would post something like this on our company ratings to boost the ratings of another company!

****Pasted is a review you made for Early Air Control on the same day you posted this on ours. ******

Earley Air Control Inc.
HVAC contractor
Mooncrest
Place details
Marvin Mohler
a day ago
We have used Earley for 18 years, they are always thorough, make sure the job is done right the first time and make sure they clean up behind themselves so it’s like they were never here, except your problem is fixed.

name: Jayson Marrero
text: Never utilize this company ever!!! Installed a way small HVAC system in my new house and keeps master bedroom 5 degrees warmer than the rest of the house. Had a blower module go bad and charged me $180 in labor and $80 call out fee for a 5 minute job.  An absolute rip off.

name: LaToya B.
text: This company has the worst customer service (and equipment) that I have ever experienced in my entire life!!! They will lie directly to your face and try to blame you for everything that goes wrong with you unit. I had a service appointment yesterday from 1 to 5 guy was late called and told me he would be there about 6:35 to 6:40 and I told him I would be there at 6:40 so if he got there a few min before me he could start outside. I pulled up at my house at exactly 6:40 waited a few min and went and got a package from my front door and boom there was a sorry I missed you tag!!! I could t believe how I was treated and lied to, I arrived home to the min what time I said I would which according to him would not have been more than 5 min after him...so they could t wait 5 min for me when they where at least an hour and 35 min late after having someone sit at my house waiting for them to never come!!!! I can’t express how upset I was that this boy would lie to me and treat me the way he has.  It to mention my unit is a lemon that they refuse to replace that went out 2 to 3 times the very first year where they had to weld and replace parts so they could t blame those on me like they try to do now since it continues to go out a min of twice of year which they blame now on the type of air filter I have which is a load of ****!!!!

name: felicia owen
text: great service! the guy was very patient with all the craziness with my kids and dog and the price was great.  I will definitely be sending everyone I know there way. thank yall!!!

name: Kim Lane
text: Always friendly and quick to respond.  I would recommend them to everyone!

name: Deborah Cooper
text: Called this morning and they were out to my house by 3:00. Great service, friendly technician. I would recommend Heads Heating and Air, as well as Mark Graham who was awesome at his job

resp.text: Glad we could be of service to you!

name: John Riordin
text: After shopping around, I had Head's come and replace my damaged coil. Scott, the technician, was nice and thoroughly explained everything in layman's terms so I felt confident in his work. He even made sure to wipe his feet before coming inside everytime! I really appreciated that. The service was exceptional and that in my book is what gets return customers! very pleased.

name: Donald Ferguson
text: Tech arrive when he said he would. Called to tell me he was headed my way and would be here in about 20 minutes. Very professional.

name: Trina Nicholas
text: Jennie and Kyler were both very professional in setting up my appointment (Jennie) and Kyler was an excellent service provider for your company. He explained every aspect of servicing our unit and was very knowledgeable with our unit, many thanks to them both!

name: Salt Life
text: The worse inefficient duct system Ive seen installed. It looks like a spiderweb of flex duct run everywhere. Should be a duct line with pipe takeoffs and short pueces of flex. They installed the cheapest, fastest system they could. Many leaks also. To get warranty work is when they feel like showing up. Stay away

name: deb c
text: I realize some people had an experience quite different from mine, but my recent experience with Head's was quite good. I would give them 4 3/4 stars if that were an option. I recently bought a house in Mobile, and was given paper work showing the AC coils having been replaced in January 2018 by Head's, with a 10 year guarantee. On some of the 1st hot days this year, the AC did not seem to be cooling efficiently, and there was quite a lot of condensation and then ice on the lines. I called Head's with some reluctance due to the negative reviews, but they were extremely responsive, came out to the house in less than 2 hours, and were extremely thorough, professional, courteous, and pleasant. They diagnosed the problem, handled it, and then checked everything else, and explained exactly what was going on.  They even gave me a call the next day to make certain everything went well. The only reason I'd take of 1/4 star would be because there was some initial record keeping confusion, and the problem with the AC function was traced back to a cap which should not have been added/placed at the previous service due to the slightly unusual configuration of my particular AC and furnace. Luckily, the tech (Scott) was very knowledgeable and diagnosed it easily.

resp.text: We are very grateful of your review and are glad that we were able to properly diagnose and fix your problem!!
