Dependable, Fast, Affordable and Good People!

resp.text: Service Tech, Inc. appreciates your loyalty and your positive feedback, Wesley Calhoun.

name: Larry Stephens
text: Have used their services for 25 plus years. New system installed main floor of our house about 2 weeks ago. Quiet, efficient, professionally done and looking fwd to savings on our energy bills!!

resp.text: Thank you for being a long-time customer Larry, we appreciate your business and feedback!

name: Alana letzplay
text: Very pleased with the work.

resp.text: Team Service Tech, Inc. appreciates your business and thanks for sharing with the community!

name: Jennifer Groban
text: Amazing customer service! I would highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Jennifer, we really appreciate your support and business. Proud of the staff making a difference and they truly love what they can do to make it a better day!

name: Timothy Richey
text: Probably the last HVAC company in Birmingham that puts people first. They came out and installed new units and really took their time explaining what they're doing and why. I look forward to many years of service from them. Thanks Richie, Brandon, Johnny, and Josh.

resp.text: Mr. Timothy Richey, we appreciate your positive feedback. Service Tech, Inc takes pride in putting our customers first. We also look forward to doing business with you in the future.

name: Marcus Amerson
text: Walked in and experienced good customer service.

resp.text: Hello Marcus Amerson.  We appreciate all feed back.  However we have never provided service for you.  If you are ever in the need of heating or cooling services, please feel free to contact us.

name: T Nagah
text: I've been using Service Tech for years.  Always a pleasure doing business with them.

resp.text: Your loyalty, positive feedback, and your business is definitely appreciated, T Nagah.

name: douglas stovall
text: We Had a unit replaced .The Job was done by a skilled person .We are pleased with the instillation and the good service they provided.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback Douglas!

name: Richard Kirby
text: On time, professional, and efficient.

resp.text: Hi Mr. Kirby, We appreciate your positive feedback. We will share these kind words, with your technician, Jeff D.  Warm regards, Team Service Tech, Inc.

name: Will Browder
text: Great experience!!!!  Far exceeded my expectations.

resp.text: Your positive feedback is definitely appreciated, Will Browder.

name: Britney Hope
text: We own a rental home in Calera and had a huge water spot appear on our ceiling along with water pouring into the light fixture, upon looking around  in the attic we noticed it was coming from our HVAC unit that another company had installed. I called Service Tech and they had a technician to our home within the hour, Randell was very friendly and professional even showed me the problem and how he fixed it, I can not say enough about Service Tech I will be using them for my HVAC needs from now on.

resp.text: We appreciate you so much for being a customer of ours Britney!

name: Axee Lambert
text: I called on a Saturday, and an hour later Jamey came out and fixed our HVAC system and was super honest about everything! I definitely recommend Service Tech for any HVAC needs.

resp.text: Your positive feedback is definitely appreciated Axee Lambert.

name: Lily Indkart Studios
text: Excellent customer focus!

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback!

name: Johnny Summers
text: Hire me very dependable

resp.text: Call the office and come by to apply. Always looking for great people to work with us

name: Lisa Bolding
text: Warm

resp.text: Thank you for the Great review Mrs. Bolding! We appreciate having the opportunity to serve you!

name: Denie Girardeau
text: Always excellent

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback, Rush & Denie Girardeau! And it's been excellent doing business with you guys over the years. Thanks for sharing with the community! Warm regards, Team Service Tech, Inc.

name: Courtlyn Robinson
text: Highly professional, does work swiftly and responsibly

resp.text: Thanks Courtlyn!

name: Whit Drake
text: Fast efficient service at a reasonable rate. They didn't try to snow me and sell me something I didn't need.

resp.text: This is just what we like to hear, Whit! Thanks for taking the time to rate us a couple of years ago. Please don't hesitate to reach out again if there's anything else we can do for you! -Richie, Owner

name: Jo Broadwater
text: Great professional, on time, and courteous service.

resp.text: Thank you Jo,it has been a pleasure working with you now for a few years. Hoping your having a wonderful 4th and look forward to seeing you soon,Richie,Owner and Friend

name: Lance Huffstutler
text: Misunderstanding on my part but the owner took the time to contact me and we got the situation clarified. I would trust him with my system

resp.text: Richie, the owner takes pride in making sure that the customer is comfortable with every decision they approach. Thank you for the 4 star review.

name: Jamal Bashir
text: Unprofessional handling of sensitive credit card information.

resp.text: We are a professional company that places top priority on our customer's private credit card information. We provide top security measures to ensure all transactions are handled properly and ethically.

name: Theresa Rose
text: Richie really cares about his customers and it shows in everything Service Tech does!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback Theresa!

name: Barbara Gilbert
text: Great Service!

resp.text: Service Tech, Inc. really appreciates your positive feedback.

name: Lee Fernon
text: They have been amazing. We have unfortunately had to deal with quite a few AC companies recently, and BoJiffy has been outstanding. They are extremely professional and knowledgeable, and have explained everything in an easy to understand and no nonsense manner. I would highly recommend them.

name: Andy Mims
text: Bo personally called when the warranty company said it would be the next day or the day after and had Robert out that evening. Robert recommended a new unit and got us up and going until the new unit could be ordered and put in. They were very professional and answered quickly to get us back up and going in this summer heat. 10/10 recommend and will use them for any other heating and air issues!!

resp.text: Thank you our good customer!

name: Jimmie Wright
text: Great guys to work with. Installed units on 2 separate occasions. Followed up and made sure all was in proper order. Knowledgeable, honest, competitive; what else can be said. Will continue to use them and recommend them. Jimmie

resp.text: It is a pleasure to serve another true professional!

name: Terri Holcombe
text: We had a couple issues with our AC, Bo came out the same day I called got my ac back up & running great and did not drain my wallet.  Great guy that truly cares about his customers.

resp.text: We try to be very professional and care about the results. We thank you for you positive affirmation!

name: Kevin Farrar
text: Mr. Flanders has come to our rescue several times over the years.  He is always prompt to respond to calls/texts and thoroughly explains the issue and fix.  He is knowledgeable and dependable.  Thanks for taking care of my family!

resp.text: Thank you for using us. We are proud to offer you our professional service. It is a pleasure to be able to explain things and have folks understand! Thank you for your comments. You are a long time client.

name: J Birmingham
text: Bo has helped us many times over the years. Very knowledgeable, friendly, and timely. I would highly recommend Bo Jiffy for any of your A/C needs.

resp.text: Thank you, it is a pleasure!

name: Mike R.
text: Does not return phone calls. Called multiple times from two different numbers from Thurs-Sat.  Left a message every time. Never heard back from him.

resp.text: You are a home warranty customer and you are over an hour from us. You were evidently assigned out of our work area by mistake and we think you got that changed and still gave us a star. We guess that was not good enough.

name: Kelsey Cunningham
text: DO NOT use this company! They were sent out through our home warranty 4 different times due to our unit never being fixed, it would work for a day or two then stop again and be 88-94 degrees in our home. Now, we have water damage as well and he poured the WRONG FREON and also overloaded it. We are now having to buy an entire new system out of pocket due to our home warranty sending companies like this out and fix water damage out of our pocket! Also, they are completely unprofessional. For example, the owner of this branch was the technician as well that came out and he proceeded to take his shirt off and “work” while there was only a young woman in the house!! He was not the fittest either, very disturbing. Also, he new we have a small child too and he wouldn’t come out until it was convenient for him and complained about it every time we had to call to set up an appointment AGAIN because he lived 45 minutes away. PLEASE DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!! (I don’t want to give them a star but it wouldn’t let me post this unless I did.)

resp.text: Your satisfaction is very important to us. We were not the first company and were not the last company to perform the multiple repairs for a world class home warranty that probably came with your new two bedroom home. Early 20's, gone through a divorce, very hard time, baby, then these multiple repairs before and after us. Glad you at least remembered us. But remember we fixed several issues before the next guys.

name: Sara Cracco
text: Great company! We hired them to move an ac unit and then we used them again when we purchased a new ac unit. I would highly recommend this company!

resp.text: We are so proud of our wonderful clients like you. Thanks for the review!

name: tom hogan
text: Robert came out as part of service call through a home warranty company that I will soon be taking my business elsewhere from shortly. He was professional and did a good job. The warranty company denied the claim which is an issue for another day, meaning Robert didn't get compensated. The unit had a problem to reoccur and Robert came back out and fixed the problem without charging me. He even recommended another warranty company for me to use .I definitely would recommend this company plus Robert returnrr my calls or texts at his earliest convenience. Additionally he's former military.

resp.text: He is indeed the best!

name: Yolanda Little
text: My air went out  on a Friday night. I called my warranty company and they had me for another company that would not be available until Monday. I called them back and they connect me with BO Jiffy. Mr. Bo wasn't available at the time. He told me that he would look at the schedule and see can he get a tech out later that afternoon or early Sunday.  I received a call from Tech Robert  within an hour of speaking with Mr. Bo. Robert took his time explain the problem and fixed it each issues. I must say I am very please with the services that has been render. The level of professionalism that was GREAT!

resp.text: So happy when you are happy! We like a professional , knowledgeable approach and it is nice for you to take the time to review. Thank you!

name: Munoz Harret
text: Home Warranty company contacted them to repair our heat on a Thursday.  As of Sunday, no response.  After several calls, texts and messages left, they have not contacted us. Our area is under a freeze warning.  Very disappointed in this company.

resp.text: Thank you for pointing out how busy things got. Sometimes people don't understand. It was hard for the big and little folks. Warranty clients can always be reassigned during those times. We read all our messages and try like crazy to find windows of opportunity to serve.

name: Bo Atkinson
text: My AC unit had been performing quite poorly in recent weeks, and after looking into various service providers around Birmingham, I decided to call BoJIFFY. I could not be more satisfied with the service Bo provided! Bo answered my phone call after only 2 rings at 7:30 AM, and was able to diagnose the issue with near certainty. I asked if Bo could arrive to work on my AC at noon, and he arrived at 11:59. Sometimes my watch runs a little slow, so he likely arrived at exactly 12:00. I would highly recommend BoJIFFY to anyone in need of air conditioning service – Bo is a top-notch professional!

resp.text: Like we say, If your air condioner is iffy, call Bo Jiffy!

name: Darryl Wedgeworth
text: Great service, very professional!!!

resp.text: Thank you, we try to be the most professional and have wonderful clients like you to prove it!

name: Andrew McDonald
text: Contacted company and left voicemail. Never heard back. Unprofessional to say the least.

resp.text: None of our call records show your number. Maybe there was a phone issue. We have a reputation of being very professional with the latest equipment and technology. We could have really helped you! We were in Kimberly and it would have saved travel time!

name: Lisa misad
text: PERFECT!!!!!!!

name: Elisa Aldridge
text: Zach was quick, same day service, very nice and professional. He answered all of our questions and was up front about the associated costs and repairs. Happy with our service. He waited until we were satisfied before leaving which was highly appreciated.

name: Scott Certain
text: Quality work.  Our ac went out and they replaced our unit in one day.  The modifications to adapt the new unit to our 15 year old duct work was top notch.   I hope this unit lasts as long the last one.  You guys rock.

name: Kaitlin Williams
text: Would highly recommend! I received several quotes from various well-known companies around town for a new unit purchase/install and some relatively extensive modifications to our ductwork. A1 not only provided one of the more reasonable quotes for the new unit, but they also provided the most viable solution to our ductwork issues that wouldn’t also break the bank. Unlike the questionable sales tactics I experienced with some of the other companies, Steve was extremely professional and straightforward throughout the entire process. He answered all of my questions (there were A LOT of them) and was always happy to go the extra mile by walking me through everything in detail. The day of the install far exceeded my expectations as well. The technicians with Steve were courteous, extremely knowledgeable/capable, and worked hard until the entire job was completed. Their quality of work was impressive as well. It seemed like a tough job, but these guys made it look easy! 5 stars all around for the entire A1 team!

resp.text: Thank you Katlin for the awesome review.  It was a pleasure working with you on this project. We always like a good challenge. We will always be here for you.   Steve

name: Valinda Murphy
text: Had a great experience with Tech., James. Very professional; great value; good communication; I will use them again.

name: Dave Luck
text: I had an emergency call for them.and they dealt with my problem.knoledgeable staff.with good hearts.im a cancer patient .recently diagnosed.i couldnt be in the heat.while on the meds prescribed to me.as soon as they found out.they expedited the repairs.it took 2days .but they went and got my part.it was the compresor.under warranty. But had to be sent from somewhere way off.so they hooked up a small partable unit 4 me .so I could stay in my home.it saved us alot of money.then they fairly charged for ther great service.it felt great to deal with people who cared about my situation.so much they went the extra mile for us.i will always call them to service any a/c concerns I have in the future. Thank you all for everything. A1 is a great company.

name: Britt Sanford
text: Air went out on Tuesday evening and Steve was at our house first thing Wednesday to quote us a new unit. We have been fighting with our current old unit for years, so we knew when we called we were getting a new unit. After looking at our house and realizing I was 8 1/2 months pregnant he said soonest would be Saturday. Was far away to me, but we said okay. Thursday rolled around and Steve called and said I can be there at 7am Friday. The crew showed up right at 7 and worked hard. They fixed issues that were found during installation that were not part of the quote to make sure we got everything out of a new unit. Very professional group of men. They made sure everything was correctly installed from areas we were not fixing and went above and beyond replacing areas that were part of our quote. Their professionalism, quick response and turn around time will always keep customers coming back. You cannot go wrong with this company. You can tell it is ran as a team and not just another business. We will definitely be recommending them to everyone, as they were recommended to us by a friend.

resp.text: thanks Britt

name: Kara Williams
text: I had a bad experience with a competitor on a repair, and decided to go with A1 on my new system.  Steve was on-time for the proposal and he and his crew were on time for the install.  I thought their proposal offered the best terms, and no issues so far.  I will definitely call them again in the future if I need AC service.

name: Hal Ledbetter
text: Outstanding responsiveness and service. Our AC went out on Memorial Day. Sharon responded almost immediately and made an appointment the next day, accommodating my availability. Zach the repair specialist replaced a start capacitor on the outside heat exchanger and the computer board on the attic unit air handler. Fully restored AC the same day. All around excellent professionalism.

resp.text: Thanks Hal! Glad we could get you help!

name: LISA BRAGG
text: A 1 was an amazing company to do business with! They always contacted me ahead of time and were on time, every time! They guarantee their labor and parts and came through on this for me. I have never done business with a company that was so honest, reliable, and professional before. Thank you A 1 for all that you’ve done!

resp.text: Thanks Lisa

name: Megan Roegner
text: A1 was super responsive, they got Zach out to check and repair my A/C unit within 24 hours. I would absolutely recommend them to anyone in this area!

name: Kendall Lewis
text: Our A/C unit suddenly stopped working a few nights ago. We called A1 the next morning and we got an appointment immediately. Zach was our technician along with Dustin. Both were very professional and helpful. Any questions I had were answered immediately. I would definitely recommend these guys to anyone wanting professional and efficient work done at a fair price.

resp.text: Thanks Kendall!

name: BAP 5068
text: Heater wasn't working on a Saturday called them up and were able to see us that day. A tech came out and found the problem and fix it. A week later it wasn't working again. Call them up on a Saturday and again able to send somebody out same day. Zack showed up and figure out what was wrong. Fix it and with no extra fees as it was still cover from last weeks visit. Zack did a great job. Recommend using A1 Heating and Cooling A/C

resp.text: Thanks!

name: Adam Chapman
text: Called A1 when my unit stopped blowing air, despite being very late in the afternoon Zach came over and was able to fix a faulty blower motor and get it blowing ice cold. The next day the temperature dropped drastically and when we tried to use our heat we noticed it was not working. I called A1 and they had Brady come over to inspect and bring me a space heater to keep my wife warm while the issue was assessed. The following day Zach was over at my house bright and early as promised to fix the issue. Zach was able to determine our newest problem was simply a faulty wire connection with our nest thermostat. I highly recommend A1. Zach went above and beyond to fix everything all while understanding that I was on a tight budget. It really meant a lot when Brady came over with a space heater just to keep my wife warm and happy. These guys will be my go to for any hvac needs. Thanks again Zach, Brady, and Sharon for saving the day and being awesome people!

resp.text: Your welcome, thanks for the awesome review!

name: Josh Cato
text: These guys were amazing!  I called in a panic when my AC broke last night but they calmed my nerves and were very accommodating. I called right after they opened hoping I could get someone today. Originally they said they could get someone out to my house around 2:00 PM but the receptionist said that she wanted to check and asked if she could call me back. She called me back 10 minutes later and told me Zack would be at my house around 10:00 AM. Zack actually called me 2 hours before he was supposed to be there and told me he’d be at my house in 10 minutes. 10 minutes later, Zack knocks on my door. It took him about 5 minutes to diagnose the problem when he came in and told me how much it would cost before he did anything - which I liked. It was a very affordable price for the repair as well I thought. He had my AC unit repaired in under 3 minutes. I really appreciate how this company handled me as a customer. I call expecting to be miserable and sweating all day, and they had my AC fixed before the the time they had scheduled my appointment initially . I chose to go with this company because of their rating on Google and it’s easy to see why they’re rated so high. It reflects my sentiment as well. Well above 5 stars and would absolutely, without-question would use again.

name: Antwuan Forte
text: The Owner of A1 is a very stand up guy and makes sure the customer is satisfied

name: James Denney
text: Excellent service and installation of two 16 SEER HVAC units for my home.  Steve was extremely courteous and conscientious in providing all the  Bryant options and answering countless questions. Alex, Brady, and Nelson were professional and courteous and they did a fantastic job of installing both units in record time with no delays.  Definitely recommend this outstanding company for any of your heating and AC problems.

resp.text: Happy to be of service, thanks, James!

name: Sunny Lloyd
text:
Just wow guys.

We had five companies come out and they all said we’d need a new unit. As anyone looking at these reviews probably knows, that is extraordinarily expensive and a nail biting experience. We got a quote from A1 which was incredibly competitive, and my husband was able to quickly schedule.

Today they came out and realized that our unit is still perfectly usable, the issue was merely a broken fan. Luck was on our side here, but the main takeaway should be the honesty and integrity of this company.

They are not going to suggest to you superfluous items or charge you for things that you do not truly need, and that level of professionalism is so rare.

They will be our first call forever from now on.

resp.text: thanks Sunny!

name: Jason Mefford
text: I would highly recommend A1.  They were great from start to finish.  They were pleasant when I called and showed up on time with a courtesy call before they arrived.  The technician (Zach) was extremely knowledgeable and professional.  He walked me through the troubleshooting process and educated me on the fix.  I would recommend A1 to family or friends looking for AC assistance.

name: Joseph Siebern
text: It is currently 7:05 and Zack is heading to Lowes to get the parts needed to fix my issue. A1 provides great service! They are straight up, they do not play games, they show you the problem and provide you a now strings cost to fix it. Zack diagnosed the problem in probably 5 minutes, had my quote in 10 and I am sure he will work quickly, but more importantly I am confident he is going to do a quality job so it doesn't happen again.  highly recommend for anyone in the Huntsville area to give these guys a call , same day service and will work late hours to fix your problem.

name: Roger Wisnosky
text: I had A1 replace my upstairs unit in October 2018 and I was totally happy with their knowledge and service.  My downstairs unit went up last week and I had Brady come out to check it out and decided it was best to replace.  Not only do they replace the units, they also are very good at inspecting other aspects to make sure everything is done correctly.  I highly recommend A1 and their staff for all your HVAC needs.

name: Cynthia S
text: I would recommend A1 HVAC. I used them to install a new unit. They went above and beyond to see that I had proper airflow in my home.

resp.text: thanks Cynthia!

name: Tiffany Kimbrough
text: This company is GREAT! I literally called at 7:30am, and they had someone out by 9:00! Zack was great and professional. I told him what the issue was, and what I had attempted on my own to try to fix the issue. He listened! After that, he checked some things out, and had the issue identified and rectified in 10 mins top! He also took the time to walk me through different things that I could do on my own to help upkeep my units. I DEFINITELY recommend them, and will forever use them as my go to company!!

name: stacey lightsey
text: I would recommend this company and Dustin Clifford to anyone needing heating or air repair. I called at around 10 am and by 2 am they had drove 40 minutes to my house, serviced my unit, fixed 2 parts, and had it running like a top. Did I mention it is pouring rain and only 4 days till Christmas? He never made any mess, Dustin explained every step and ask if each step was ok and told me price as he went. No surprises! He was also the nicest man, always polite and smiling even though he was soaked in rain and had to get out a yucky mouse. He cleaned up everything and removed all waste. I will never call anyone else for help. This was top of the line service in record timing. I rate them 5 star and would recommend them to everyone I know. And definitely recommend Dustin again. Best service ever!

name: Jennifer Ashworth
text: Woke up at 2 am on a Saturday to a 60 degree house. Called A1 at 7:30, and Zach was here at 9. He was very professional and nice. Fix the unit quickly and also updated the the circuit for our new thermostat to avoid that becoming an issue. We are very pleased and will definitely use them again.

name: Joe Azar
text: Highly recommend. Have worked with them over the years for minor repair or recharging a system. Service techs were always on time and efficient. Finally the AC unit went out in July and had them replace it. The two service techs were on time, very pleasant and did an outstanding job from getting the old unit out, the new unit in, ensuring everything worked and did a good job of cleaning up afterwards.  I highly recommend them to anyone needing AC service.

name: Ryan Stutzman
text: My go to people. First experience was great, the Tech walked me through the whole process of his diagnoses and how to fix it. Second time 2 years later with a different problem, I called Monday morning at 7am and the tech was out by 9. Quick assessment of the problem, communicated the problem and Quote was right where I expected.  100% recommend to friends and neighbors, will continue to be my go to HVAC company.

name: Kris Hankinson
text: A1 has been my air-conditioner maintenance choice since I moved here in 2012. Every time I have called them for periodic maintenance they have arrived on time and have been quick and reasonably priced. Recently my air-conditioner stopped working on a Saturday. I called Steve and he assigned Zach, who called to let me know when he would arrive, and he arrived by the time he said he would. He quickly diagnosed the issue and replaced the bad part. The price was very reasonable, plus they warranty the parts and the service fee is good for 30 days in case you need to have them come back. They have definitely earned my loyalty!

name: Susie Brown
text:
We got a quote from Steve for our new HVAC package unit and it was similar to other quotes but felt he really knew his business. He and one of his installers showed up this week and worked in the intense heat & humidity to install our 4 ton unit. They did a great job and sheet metal work is impressive. So happy with our unit. It is a Bryant and so quiet we can't hear it running. I am a Realtor and will be referring him to my clients.
After working all day on our install he took the time to visit my client that just bought at home on our street to check out one of their units that was not working correctly. They also were impressed by his honesty and knowledge.

July 3rd one month after new install. Got our first utility bill and it was only $181 for our 2385 sq. ft. ranch. Lowest bill in 18 years. This unit runs so quiet and puts out a lot more volume. Thanks Steve!!!!

name: Joy Dumes
text: Wow! I am so impressed with this company.  Our first contact was with Sharon and she was so very helpful.  She scheduled us right away.  Our technician was Zach and he was so prompt and helpful.  He was there exactly at the time that was scheduled.  He was very thorough and he even took time to educate me on exactly what was going on with our AC unit.  I could not have been more pleased.  We are not from this area and had no idea who to call, but because of the superior service we received, we will definitely be using this company going forward.  Thanks to Sharon and Zach for your great customer service!

name: Treena Waters
text: I rely on reviews when I'm looking for services. The reviews for this company were right on target. From the time I called for services to the end, I was informed of everything going on. Tyler was very professional. He explained everything to me and quoted me a fair price. If I need these type of services in the future, A1 will be who I call. I will also recommend this company to others.

name: Melissa Scofield
text: Excellent service! Zach was very nice and professional. He diagnosed and fixed the problem in a timely manner. Thank you! We will  definitely be using your services in the future and recommending you too.

name: Neil Young
text: So my AC was giving us problems and we've had great service from A1 so we called again.  Honestly nervous that they would be to busy but nope they had Zack out not long after I called.  I can't say enough on how helpful and friendly Zack is and extremely knowledgeable at his trade. Thankfully our issues were from me not changing my filter and caused our unit to freeze up. You can't beat having a company that can get to you quickly and being friendly.  I highly recommend giving them a try for your AC needs. The rates are great and the staff does what they can to help which means a lot t hu is day and time. Thanks A1

name: Jarod
text: Had a unit blowing out warm air. The technician stopped by to perform a diagnostic and had to have been there for all of 15 minutes. He came by, determined there was a leak, called and told me he added some refrigerant and told me to give him a call if I had any more problems. The guy was really nice, but he didn’t even attempt to fix the leak. So, one week later, we were calling someone else to come and fix the leak.

resp.text:
Jarod,
We are deeply concerned with your negative service experience.  We pride ourselves in excellent customer service and therefore want to refund your money.  Please call our office at 256-975-6616 so we can resolve this as quickly as possible.  Once again, we are very sorry.
Steve

name: sebastian ferreiras
text: They were outstanding! and also offered the best prices with value. Best in town 👍🏽

name: Neil Young
text: I can't say enough good about this place.  I have to say Zack the service technician that showed up to help this morning is an amazing person.  The service was fast and extremely efficient and fast. Zack was extremely helpful and knowledgeable and has us fixed up perfectly.  I highly recommend checking them out.  They have been the best we have used several different heating and cooling service businesses and by far A1 has been the best.  I plan on sticking with them on all of my heating and cooling service needs.

name: Megan Taylor
text: The staff and technicians with A1 heating and cooling are very professional and efficient. They were able to come to the house when we requested and offered excellent service and price. I will be using them again when we need HVAC repairs in the future.

name: Claude Bridges
text: One of the best experiences we’ve ever had with a service company. Zach was extremely knowledgeable and courteous. He went well above our expectations, even taking the time to install a new thermostat free of charge. The service was done quickly and the price was very reasonable. We definitely won’t have to look for another HVAC company as long as A1 is around.

name: J K
text: So glad we chose this company to fix our AC. They came out to our house very fast and fixed it first thing the next morning. Tyler was our technician and did a great job. We are very happy with our service and A1 will definitely be our go-to for heating and air!

name: Stephen Keel
text: Thank you Zach for coming out on a Sunday morning to get our air conditioning going again. Zach found and fixed the issue very quickly. Me and everybody else in my household appreciate you. Also thank you A1 Heating and Cooling for being so responsive to my call and email.

name: MorningCoffeeMeds
text: Fast, friendly, professional service! had to have my entire unit replaced. Which happened without a hitch in one day!

name: David A. Rivera
text: I was extremely impressed with the service Steve performed for Donna and I on our home heating and AC unit.  I have been unimpressed with our unit’s performance since the day we built and moved into our home in 2001.  We have had several technicians service our unit with little or no improvement in its performance.  The knowledge, professionalism, service and patience that you delivered helped to answer all of our questions.  Our unit has never worked better.  We are extremely satisfied and would strongly recommend you to all of our friends and anyone looking for quality heating and AC service.  We trust the quality of your work completely.  Thank you very much!

name: Robert Tinsley
text:
These guys did a great job.  Steve was very though at explaining everything.  He had all the proper licenses.  Many in this business do not.  A1 was very competitive and gave me 1 extra year of labor warranty for free.  Thanks again Steve.
Bobby

name: Jenna Ruddock
text: I'm extremely pleased with the service from A1! I called them first thing the morning after a miserable night without air conditioning and they promptly sent out technician, Tyler. Tyler was able to explain what  the issue was and fix the problem in the most cost effective manner. He was very respectful and professional and the whole process was easy. I appreciate a company that works so quickly and has people who will go the extra mile! I will definitely recommend these guys to my friends and neighbors in the future!

name: Genea Lawrence
text: This was the best and easiest experience I have ever had with a company! Zach came out Monday figured out what was wrong with my unit. Came back Wednesday afternoon and had it fixed with in an hour! Thank you so much Zach for the AWESOME work! I highly recommend A1 Heating and cooling! Will forever use them!

name: Collin Langley
text: I recommend Zach, he was exceptional and by the best AC technician I have had out to my house. Fixed my issue and gave multiple options in terms of what I wanted to pay. Charged me 89$ for a fee (normal), and then charged me 11$ to assess and reroute some ducts.

name: Ann Creager
text: We started having problems with our heat pump and called a company that was recommended to us. The gentleman came out and repaired in about an hour and a half, left with system running. Less than 2 months later, unit went out again. So I began my google search for heating repair; found A1 Heating and Air with great reviews. Called Steve and they came out same day, late Friday evening. Steve and his tech did everything they could but the unit was not salvageable. Steve ordered new unit on Saturday morning and it was going to be a few days before it could be delivered and installed. To my surprise, after worrying about the cold weather that had invaded us early in the season, Steve shows up, with daughter in tow on a family day, brought us 4 room heaters to get us through the cooler nights. He did this on his day off, while spending time with his family and under no obligation; just a super guy with his customers concerns and well-being a priority. Pricing was more than fair and better than the competition that we checked into. A1, from Steve to techs, are very professional, courteous and knowledgeable about the work they do and products they sell. I am very pleased and satisfied with their work and pricing, and recommend them to anyone needing heat and air repair/replacement. I will never call another heating and air company, A1 is the only company for us in the future. Thanks Steve and Chris.

name: Rita Sumners
text: I liked the price, the service and the people. Chose them because of the reviews and haven't been disappointed. I was impressed by the way they worked together.

name: Becky Pierson
text: Impressed again with A1, Zach came out diagnosed my problem, replaced the part and had me working again in no time.  Zach was professional and thorough, our family will not trust any other company for our AC and heating needs.  Thanks again A1.

name: Neal
text: This is an amazing AC company... Zach, Steve, Nelson, Alex are all outstanding!!! My family had some serious issues with our AC and Zach came out and diagnose the issue. He fixed the issue long enough for is to replace one of our units. Steve, Nelson, and Alex came and replaced a unit in about 4 hours which I thought was amazing. They are very professional very knowledgeable and go over the top for their customers. Once you do business with them they treat you like family. We would HIGHLY recommend them for anyone that has AC needs. We'll never use anyone else ever again.

name: Donett Murphy
text: Quick and professional service. Zack was execellent.

resp.text: Thanks Donett!

name: Greg Brierly
text: A1 was wonderful! They responded very shortly to my phone call even though it was a Saturday. They were very accommodating in finding a day and time that worked well for me. I was given an appointment day and time with Tyler. I received and email reminder the morning of and then Tyler texted when he was on his way. He was prompt and friendly. He was very knowledgeable and quickly fixed our issue. I recommend them highly and will call them again.

name: justin newman
text: Great service, quick diagnosis, and got out to us first thing in the morning.  They also do a military discount.  Support local businesses!

resp.text: thanks Justin!

name: David Cole
text: When I decided that our old system was just not going to make it through another cold season "I started shopping".  I called several well known companies around town to give us quotes and try to learn about the different brands and features.  I am very analytical to say the least.  After talking to A1 for a while I realized they were going to be the most informative without becoming irritated with me like other companies, and my wife sometimes does!  I really appreciated that because this is a lot of money to us and we want to understand just what it is or isn't that were buying.  A1 was the most economical for the services provided and gave us the best warranty.  A1 installed our system and did a great job!  Thanks again for everything Steve!  We will always recommend you to our family and friends.

name: tammy jolley
text: Great response!   Several others wouldn't even come take a look,  they would only quote a new unit.   Steve was Very honest and actually tried to save me money but pointed out the risks as well.   If i need a new unit,  they will get my business!

resp.text: Thank you for your for your review.

name: David Higginbotham
text: These guys recently helped me service a HVAC unit that was still under warranty.  Zach (the tech assigned to me) came in special on a Saturday to diagnose the issue....that was greatly appreciated.  There were a couple of issues outside of his control that brought him back a couple of times to remedy the problem and he was always prompt and professional.  Sharon took care of the scheduling and she kept me updated on Zach's arrival time via text message.  That's a courtesy you don't always get but it made things super convenient and low hassle.

name: Christie Sanders
text: Over Labor Day weekend our AC went out! We knew immediately that we would call A1 Heating and Cooling, since we had used them the previous year for our lower level unit. The service on both occasions was extraordinary - we received an immediate response and quick repair (even on Labor Day). Steve exceeds all of our expectations when it comes to customer service. I would highly recommend him and his company to any of my friends or family.

name: Bill Case
text:
I found A1 extremely prompt and professional with fair pricng. We chose to have them repair instead of replace, but will definitely contact them if a unit needs replacing.
UPDATE: a year later, our other unit reached end-of-life and A1 replaced it quickly with a Bryant.  We had a couple of minor issues, which were quickly addressed, but then had a coolant leak at 7 months, which required a back-ordered part, so A1 chose to replace the entire unit instead of waiting. Amazing service by Steve, Zack and Nelson.

name: Thomas Castor
text: Tyler was prompt and fixed problem quickly.  Made sure we understood what else needed done. Very satisfied!

name: Daniel Bell
text: A1 replaced my home HVAC unit in April 2019, and I highly recommend them. The customer service was outstanding, and the technical staff was very knowledgeable.

name: Scott’s Sanders
text:
Steve showed up on time and was very personable. Diagnosed the situation and repaired the unit. This all was done in a timely and professional manner and at a great price.
I highly recommend this company.

name: Leslie Moody
text:
Steve with A1 Heating and Cooling has been extremely helpful to us on two different occasions.  As luck would have it, each of our AC units went out on summer holidays!  Even on a holiday, Steve understood the urgency of being without AC in the Alabama summer heat.  He didn't use our bad luck to his advantage to gouge us with outrageous emergency pricing.  Each time, he was thorough in helping us understand what was wrong with the unit and what needed to be done to correct the problem in the most cost effective way.  Steve even followed up the day after repairs to be sure were happy with the work that had been performed!

I've rarely experienced such excellent  customer service and would highly recommend A1 Heating and Air Conditioning.

name: Tim M
text: First, I want to say that all of these glowing reviews about Steve are completely valid! HE IS A 5 STAR REPAIRMAN! My wife found A1 on Google while I was away on business and our AC was on the fritz. She decided to go with them based on their stellar reviews. I returned just in time to meet Steve as he arrived to diagnose the problem with our AC unit. He found the problem (bad capacitor) in a matter of minutes, had the replacement part on his truck, and had our system pumping cold air within 15 minutes of his arrival. He was professional and courteous. Above all, he was respectful and didn't try to act like his work was too complicated for me to understand. He explained everything he was doing and reassured us that, if anything went wrong with the AC, we could call him and he'd come back to make things right. I felt very comfortable with our conversation. Steve is my AC guy. Trust him with your repair needs. He will take care of you.

name: Chris Messervy
text: After having HVAC problems and receiving wrong information from several other technicians, we began to look for a knowledgeable, honest and reasonable technician.  We called Steve after reading several good reviews online.  He came and assessed the situation. He thoroughly explained what we needed and why. He was prompt in his scheduling and came exactly on time.  He was very professional and did excellent work in removing and replacing our old compressor and handler.  Compared to other quotes received, his pricing was very competitive.  We are happy to now have a dependable technician to call!  We will definitely be passing his card along...Thanks Steve!

name: Adam O
text: Steve with A1 Heating and Air has been a pleasure to do business with in the middle of the stressful situation of having A/C problems. After a phone call on a Friday evening, he showed up first thing Saturday morning and quickly diagnosed the problem, all while teaching me what he was doing to satisfy my curiosity. Steve is professional, very knowledgeable, extremely friendly, and really seems to enjoy his work. He ordered my warranty-covered parts for me to prepare for installation a few days later (due to my schedule constraints - not his) and kept me updated with text messages and phone calls along the way. I highly recommend Steve and A1 Heating and Air.

name: Alexandra Jackson
text: Great guys and great service. They showed up early and actually spent the time to diagnose the problem with our system. Steve explained the different options to us and made us feel 100% sure about what we were getting into. Will use again in the future if need be.

name: Jeremiah Raemhild
text: A1 services was quick and efficient. Zack was very professional and top notch. I will be using A1 for all my future AC repair needs!!!!!

name: Steven Bustos
text: Quality work. Steve called me back within an hour, and set up an appointment to diagnose my interesting situation. Came out on time, was extremely professional, helpful, and willing to work with you and answer any inquiries you might have. I will recommend him and the company to anybody who has A/C needs.

name: Blake Autin
text: The owner and operator, Steve, is a great guy and responded to my request for service the day I called. The company is licensed and bonded, and Steve even made sure to give me his license and bonding information so I could looking him up and confirm. Steve arrived on time, quickly diagnosed what was wrong with my system, and had it running in no time.  This company had high ratings on all the rating sites I went to when I was looking for an AC repair company and after Steve was done I knew why.  I have recommended this company to all my family and friends.

name: Don Holt
text: We called Steve about our heating unit shorting out and blowing fuses. He set an appointment time with us. He was right on time. Not something you see any more in the service industry.  Right away, he impressed me with his friendly and easy going manner.  He took time to question us on the problem we were having and what we had done to correct it. He then methodically proceeded to run down the problem. He tried one thing at a time, until he found the problem and fixed it. His fee was quite acceptable.  We were so impressed that we ask for a handful of his business cards to pass out.  I recommended him to my parents. Something I do not usually do.  I feel completely confident that he would do an honest and trustworthy job for them. And, for anybody else.

name: John Cote
text: Steve did a fantastic job discovering the problem with our A/C system and he saved us a ton of money by fixing a system that was  only 7 years old. We got a couple of other quotes and they all wanted us to replace the system at significant cost. Steve determined that the system could be repaired no problem. He is a man of  integrity, I wouldn't use any one else and recommend him highly.

name: Lindsay Izzo
text: Steve really is the best!! My renters had an A/C unit go out on them and he had the part replaced the next day. He is very professional and an extremely kind man. I would recommend him any day of the week.

text: I've used A1 Heating and Cooling several times now.  Each time the technician arrived on time and was extremely pleasant and efficient.  I'll definitely call them again if I have any other issues.

name: Alex Khaimenov
text: I am so glad I met Steve! He gave me an honest opinion on my system and saved me a lot of money on a new one. He is my new to go to guy!

name: Phillip Zink
text:
Excellent service, excellent product, excellent group of people to work with. The unit we had was original to the house and going on 22 years old.  So it came as no surprise to us when it finally decided to start being more hassle to upkeep than just flat out replace.  Our unit stopped working on a Sunday morning.  The fan motor had gone bad and no hot air would come through the vents.  It would kick on and off intermittently, but very sporadic and unreliable.  We called around and left messages at a few places.  Steve was the first to call back that same day. We explained the situation.  He advised us to use the unit if we could and wanted to make sure we did still have some heat.  Being that it was a Sunday, it would be Monday until he could send someone out unless it was an absolute emergency.  Come Monday, a technician, Juan, came out to check the problem.

Juan was polite, informative and an all-around great guy.  We were given a quote to repair the unit and replace.  Juan took the time to break down everything for us if we had any questions.  We shopped around and found A1's price to be fair and put the order in for a replacement.  Steve, himself, came by the house the next day to talk with us and clear up any questions we had and help discuss cost options. We decided to go with A1. Juan and Steve were back out first thing that Friday and had the unit replaced and operational in 4 hours.

We'll be sure to continue to use Steve and A1 for any of our future needs for HVAC.

name: Robert F Stierwalt (Fred)
text: Great group to work with.

resp.text: Thanks,  Robert same here.

name: Kim C
text:
Very honest!
Quick response!

name: GPercifull
text: We now have incredible AC and heat. Thanks to a patient Steve that answered questions and made it easy.

name: Jerry Curiel (lastcall)
text: The compressor in Unit a Goodman I had for several years worked fine but it suddenly died Juan the Service tech @ A1 Service , came and surveyed the Goodman and quickly had my compressor replaced about 3 months passed and the Unit stopped cooling, this time I noticed the Fan outside stopped spinning and no cool air was coming out from vents -  I called again and Juan the Service tech came again and found a wire loose and got me on the road to cool air conditioned again ,by this time I - Me - discussed the longevity of my goodman Air conditioned Unit Versus getting a New Unit put inn , and he said "This unit might get you through the summer and if you still feel you might want to replace it we have several alternatives you can look at  to see what is best for you" I felt very comfortable with his answer, Long story Short . I called  back and I'm having the whole house unit replace and changing to Gas instead of a Heat pump a 98% efficient and a whole house comfort control including a variable speed Seer 19 Carrier with a 10 year warranty. Juan was and has been very helpful and I felt no pressure sales  from him, I had suggested a Trane instead of Carrier and he said that whatever I wanted it wold be fine with him, I will surely recommend, A1 Aircondition to all my friends, Oh I have ordered the Unit and it will be installed at my convenience, like next week,l

name: Mrs. Howze
text: Tyler was very professional and friendly!  Great service!

name: Daniel Pollard
text: Great product, installation and subsequent service on this and other heat pumps .Responsive and Pleasure to deal with. Very competitive pricing

name: Todd Aycock
text:
Saved me $1600!!

I had another HVAC come out and give me a $1600 bill to repair my air conditioning system (even though when the technician left, it was working again).  I thought this seemed high, and I got Steve's number from a friend at work who recommended A1.  I called and Steve came out and thoroughly examined my system because he was suspicious of the repairs the other company had listed.  Sure enough, he found that almost all of the parts (except for one small heating element, unrelated to the cooling problem) were working fine.  He also completely explained how my system worked to me, he verified that it was working properly, and he was extremely courteous and professional the entire time.  Probably the best experience I have ever had with a service technician.

Considering that he could have easily "charged me less" to fix the non-existent problem, due to my lack of knowledge about HVAC, and considering that he wouldn't let me pay him a service fee because he just wanted to prevent me from getting screwed over, it seems clear that Steve has extremely high integrity.  I would definitely recommend him and will be using him as my HVAC service and installation company for the foreseeable future.  Beware of other local Huntsville companies (seems they like to up-charge) and go with A1 if at all possible!

name: Jason Bolduc
text: My air conditioning went out when it was 100*, I called Steve at AI Air conditioning and Heating, he showed up within 30 minutes and within just a few minutes already knew what part went bad, he replaced the bad part and anwered all questions I had concerning air conditioning, he went on to educate me more in the field, he also fixed our heating unit back in the winter,  I was extremely impressed with Steves knowledge in air conditioning and heating and how he cares about treating people right, he is trustworthy and I recommend him over ANYONE if you need your air conditioning or heating unit fixed.  I feel fortunate I called Steve at A1, he will be our only contact person for any future air/heat concerns as I need only a professional.

name: Tammy Jones
text: Steve came out late on a  Friday afternoon to assist me with my HVAC.  He provided very good service and did not recommend parts that I did not need.  I would definitely use him again in the future.

name: Lori Bickford
text: Great service, prompt, appreciate it!

text: Great service! Glad it wasn't too serious, will definitely use A1 again!

text: I used Steve at my previous house for some maintenance on my unit (new blower fan and freon refill), so when the system at my current house died; I didn't hestiate to call. He gave me an up-front quote for a new system which is more than I can say for the other HVAC dealers. With them, it was more like buying a car with deals and discounts. I appreciated that Steve gave me his best price right off the bat and it was extremely competetive. He does great work with a good eye for detail and quality. I could not recommend his services highly enough. He's the first call I make if anything HVAC goes wrong.

Mr. Charlie and his son were so kind and they were quick about getting our air going again! Fair pricing!

name: James Cooper
text: Very professional with extremely fast response time. Called at 7pm and they were there first thing the next morning.

name: Kyle L
text: They took care of my wiring work quickly and during the holidays! Scheduling was a breeze, was well aware of their arrival time, everyone was polite, and they quoted a competitive price. A+

name: Lynn Goodwin
text:
I would never use this company. On the surface they look great but if you have any warranty work for a product they sold you they treat it differently and cut corners and even mislead you about what they are doing.  They get belligerent if you question them. The best thing they have going for them is the lady who answers the phone and dispatches.  If they all had her integrity it would be a good company.  Do Not Use This Company.  After 2 failed attempts to fix a 2 year old unit, I had to go to another company to cure the issue with my ac (previously being left a week at a time with no ac).  I asked for reimbursement due to the issue being a faulty weld they made and they behaved like children. Still trying to get a reimbursement.

Response To the owners response- yes there is a lot more to the story which will come out.  I used a reputable company to come out to correct the issue they caused by faulty work and could not correct in two visits.  Out of two separate weeks, after asking and after they left the job site after being caught trying to not do a job properly and lying, i asked to be put into a hotel for which i paid and got reimbursement a week later.

I gave them an opportunity to reimburse me before posting a review.  The childish unprofessional response to this bad review, and all others prior to mine, should show all you need to know about this company.

Save yourself the drama and do not use them.  The anxiety and suffering I have been caused dealing with them has been ridiculous.  I have never written a poor review on google about anyone before.  This experience warranted warning to others.

resp.text: They say one bad apple spoils the bunch. They also say when you point your finger at someone you got 3 pointing right back at you. There's is way more to this story than can be told. We always came every time she called. We never charge ever for any warranty repairs. We even put her in a hotel. Had she of called and let us know her a/c was not doing right we would have come out and repaired at zero charge. She has a friend in hvac. Why she did not have him put her new system in is beyond us. However he charges her $1400 to fix her unit. If that's a friend I would not want any part of them. The only person who got taken advantage of was miss goodwin. Im talk a 25lbs drum of 410a is 90$ dealer cost. He charged her like $800 for 4 or 5 lbs of 410a. I mean he took her for a ride if they truly even fixed her unit.. Thats just some of this story. Don't believe everything you read is all I can say.

name: Paige McClure
text:
I love this place as they have always gone above and beyond when working on my HVAC.  Had the whole unit replaced by them 2 years ago and their service is great. The only reason I gave 4 stars is reaching them seems to be a bit difficult.

The receipt I have has an old number on it and the new number has a full voicemail box so I couldn't leave a message.

With that being said, I called this morning and they arrived at 10:30 and we're done before 11:30 (clogged drain pipe).

Thanks for the fast response!

name: Kristy M
text: This is by far the best company to do any heating or air work you need.  I had a new outside air unit installed last April (2019) and had to call them again this week for heating issues.  The two men that showed up were knowledgeable, professional, and patient with my mother and I.  They made sure I understood everything they were explaining.  I need a new furnace and the price quoted is so much lower than I expected.  When the funds are available I know exactly who I'll be calling.  Great job guys!!!!

name: Stephen Long
text:
We called Charlie to install a new HVAC based on the reccomendation of a hard-to-please family member. His team was quick and responsive, but the first installation wasn't what we were expecting.

I was able to call Charlie and discuss my concerns, and he came back to discuss a fix, brought his team and made it right in record time. I would recommend Charlie and his team to anyone, I don't think you can find a more trustworthy, skilled team in Alabama.

name: Dennis Ragsdale
text: The nicest most professional store

name: Terry Fulwider
text: Extremely knowledgeable and always willing to share that knowledge with you through the process.  They seem to genuinely have the customer's best interest at heart and not just selling another piece of equipment.  Great folks from top to bottom!

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity to serve you! We're glad we exceeded your expectations. Thank you again for taking the time to leave this humbling review!

name: Mary Pullen
text: One call came to my house the same day I called.  I had to have a new unit and they were there the next day to install.  I was very pleased with them.  Friendly, courteous and very professional. I would recommend them to everyone.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review! We are so glad you enjoyed your experience. We appreciate your patience with us as we worked to get your equipment working in tip-top shape and working to your specifications. Thanks again for trusting us with your comfort needs!

name: Cookie Diane
text: My unit went out on while I was traveling. I came home to a huge water leak and a warm house.  Monday morning I called One Call and by Monday afternoon I had a new unit installed.  They were great! Mr. Gallegos went over all my options. I felt very well informed.  His son and co-worker were very professional and even tried to clean up my water mess downstairs.  Great company, great work! I even got a hand written "thank you" card in the mail.

name: Krystle Gallegos
text:
I highly recommend this company to anyone looking for timely, knowledgeable and experienced service, repair, or replacement!

We had York equipment installed at our house and it provides the best comfort for our family. The equipment, considering what it's used for, looks great! The technicians really did great work keeping the install looking tidy and clean.

name: Emily Kyser
text: Called and made an appointment & I was told that someone would be at my home either between 8 & 9 or 2 & 3 the nextday. My husband works 3rd shift & was going to be the one to meet them. Around 9:30 I called to check on which time they were coming & I was told the afternoon appointment. Husband went to bed & woke up early to meet them & no one showed. Called back & was told the appointment time was between 2 & 4. Around 4:30 husband called & was told between 5 & 5:30. At 6pm no one was at our home & no one had called to update. Husband called the office & told them to forget about it. We will be using a different company.

name: Tony Smyly
text: This is a great company to do business with.  I truly appreciate everything that they have done for me to keep my air conditioning working year round. I have used One Call Heating and Cooling for years!! They always treat me like family. This is the only company I have used for more than 10 years. Thanks for all the Hard work!!!  If you need service or a new system they have the experience to take care of your heating and cooling needs. Thanks One Call Heating and Cooling!!!!

text: These guys are awesome! They were on time, great to work with, and super helpful.  The repair man answered all my questions, worked hard to get the problem fixed quickly, and were very knowledgeable.

resp.text: We're so glad that you enjoyed your experience! Thank you for the review.

name: Lance Coggins
text:
This company did a fantastic job! I would absolutely recommend them to anyone. We had to replace my A/C unit and repair some ductwork. The company did a great job making me (the customer) feel comfortable about making such an unexpected, major purchase. They will work with you as best they can. The ductwork seemed impossible to fix. There had been some shotty work done when my house built. However, Charlie and the guys gave me a great deal.

Also, I lost one of my batteries to my DeWalt drill while they were here. They may have accidentally taken it or I may have lost it! Either way I called and asked if they had seen an extra battery laying around. Instead of saying ‘’no” and moving on, they bought me a brand new DeWalt drill and mailed it to my house.

That’s what makes this company great!!!

resp.text: We're so glad that you enjoyed your experience! Thank you for the review. We were only honoring our word. Thank you also for being a terrific customer!

Completely incompetent. I scheduled them to come out and repair my HVAC unit. When I never heard from the technician, I called the hotline. They said that the technician saw our window units and left. Moronic

I told you over the phone that there was a full AC unit on the house. It's not working, which is why we have window units.

resp.text: josh we would appreciate your return apology as you wrote to me on my email. i was concerned for any issues but when the equipment is working i can't fix it. i was not rude to you so please write back a different reply. Thank you Charlie

name: John White
text: I would NOT recommend Eagle Service for plumbing. They replaced a portion of our sewer pipe in our basement that we had been having clogging issues with. The new piping looks excellent and the problem seems to have been fixed. However... I had a couple of issues. They charged me an extra $150 for a 2nd visit that only took 10 minutes for him to confirm the issue (I believe this was refunded after I complained). And worst of all, he did not protect the work area and raw sewage dumped all over our washer and dryer, mop sink, basement walls, etc. I did not see this happen and it ended up being much worse than I thought. I asked him if he was going to clean up before he left, he didn't even sweep up the PVC dust from cutting the pipe. He asked me if I had a mop?? All he did was hose down the area and did NOT do a thorough job cleaning up the raw sewage or disinfecting the area. When I called the office to talk to a manager, they told me they have gotten calls before but that it was not standard for their crew to carry cleaning supplies on their trucks. They did not offer to send someone to clean up the mess. The Servpro quote was twice as much as the plumbing quote. I truly cannot believe they would leave someone's home in such a mess. It's a good thing it was in an unfinished basement!

name: Susan Johnson
text: My furnace quit working the day before a predicted freeze warning! I called OnTime Service and they actually told me that the first available appointment was December 9th.  So I got in touch with Eagle Service Company and David was here the same morning I called. This company is a fourth generation company founded in 1930. John Jeffcoat, the owner, was actually an Eagle Scout and his core values are based on what he learned as a Boy Scout!! David found the problem, replaced the broken part, and heat began to blow! He was professional, knowledgeable, and efficient! If I could give more stars I would! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

name: Nicky Hobbs
text: Eagle Service Company was dispatched to our home to find an exterior leak and restore our water service.  Their people were very courteous and diligent.  They located the source of my leak, evaluated the best way to restore my service and completely repaired everything.  The best thing I like about Eagle is they take ownership.  I knew they were going to be with me from start to finish to make sure I was happy and extremely satisfied, which I am.  Very well done!  They get my highest recommendation.

name: Johnny Segal
text: I called Eagle on a Friday afternoon since we had a drain problem before a busy weekend at my Laundromat. Brian showed up a couple hours later and saved our weekend business. Today Brian came back cleared another drain and jetted all lines. He was very professional, efficient and arrive on time. I think there prices are very fair and would recommend the company and Brian for your pumbling needs.

name: Terry Bost
text: Eagle Service Company came to my home on 7/13/2020 to install a dishwasher, sink, faucet, and disposal. They left and they had damaged the wiring to the dishwasher and it would not run. The company told me the next day to read the user’s manual and call an appliance repair company to come fix it. There is a 28 day warranty on their work. They damaged the wiring to the dishwasher, and I now have to call an electrician to come fix their damage.

resp.text: We installed an owner furnished dishwasher and reconnected the existing electrical wiring.  When we returned to see why the dishwasher had stopped working, we discovered a loose wire in the junction box below the dishwasher.  The dishwasher was operating properly when we left.  We offered to pay to have the homeowner's electrician look at the wiring and correct the existing electrical connection if necessary.  We apologize for the inconvenience.

name: Joe Gilmore
text: Wayne Price was outstanding!  He arrived timely, quickly identified the problem and resolved it quickly and with obvious skill. He was extremely professional. I could not be more pleased with my experience with Wayne and Eagle Service Company. Joseph Gilmore

name: darrell ziroli
text: I could not have asked for better service. Everything was well organized from the very start. Professional, courteous and very knowledgeable!  I was always kept in the loop as to what to expect. Everything was explained quite well. I would give them a six but this only goes to five stars

name: Stephanie Mason
text: We had a leak in the main water line from the meter to the house.  Eagle came out and fixed it very quickly and gave us a form to help lower our water bill due to the leak.  The two men from Eagle were very friendly, helpful, and professional.  I would definitely use them again!

name: Clara Lapidus
text: They were here exactly when they were scheduled. The leak was located and repaired quickly with no mess to clean up. Wayne explained what happend and gave suggestions so to would not happen again. We will absolutely use Eagle again and recommend them to our family and friends.

name: Jody Owens
text: Spoke with Linda and ordered a radiator from this company with the OEM specs. She told me they would ship out within 2 days. Two weeks later, still hadn't received the radiator. So, I called them and they made a mistake and the order had not been process yet. Linda told me they'd over night it.  Finally received 4 days later.  Went to install the radiator in the truck when I noticed the drain hole and vent hole were wrong.  Called the company back again, explained, sent pics, ect (with the OEM# there should be no mistake).. this company seems to have a problem admitting fault and taking care of the customer.  After the runaround, I had to re-order another radiator from another company, as I had my service truck down and could not depend on this company to do the right thing.  I shipped back the wrong radiator to Brice Thomas and ask Brice Thomas Radiator to give me a full refund.  I am currently awaiting for Brice Thomas Radiator to do the right thing and give me a full refund. I will update.

name: J Moe
text:
I had one good experience and one not so good one at Andalusia Tire. I bought tires as well as had needed front end work done on my truck. That was the good experience. I should add they have had the same mechanic for years and he has a well deserved reputation for competence.
The most recent vist to purchase tires for my car was not so good. It was shocking enough that the owner helping me abruptly left for a lunch engagement in the middle of the sale promising to call me after lunch. text:
December 2017: Amazing customer service! Highly recommend
January 2019: Mike and Jaquata were again fantastic. Not only through their customer service but demonstrated through their technical skills.  I never feel like just "another customer". text: I can not be seen to even get service. I have been by three times to get my vehicle serviced to get told to call on this day or that day. I understand that you are busy but how's about offering a time slot or an appointment.  Often people have to change there life and there families life around to free up a vehicle. Just doesn't seem professional or considerate as a business looking to supply there community and there clients with service.

resp.text: Once again mistaken Hampton Cove Auto for Cove Auto. We set appointments for our customers.

name: Shaun Osborne
text: New management. Used prior to change, always fair. Went by because air quit blowing cold. Asked how much to hook up gauges to test pressure and was told "shouldn't be any charge". The compressor was engaging and disengaging so i figured it might be plugged. The technician hooked it up and saw the high side was too high and low side very low. It was plugged. They tried to say they had to pull codes and all this junk and i told them it runs fine except for the a/c. I shut off the a/c and it ran fine, it would bog down when the compressor engaged. They tried to make more out of it, then charged me $45. Avoid if possible.

resp.text: Not us!! WE have been here since 1998, no new management.

name: Kirk Ward
text: Great Service and always a fair price.

resp.text: Thank you for putting your trust in us.

name: Andrew Raymond Crawford
text: I am looking to purchase a 2002-2006 Cadillac Escalade and I used Hampton Cove Auto Services for the pre-purchase inspection of an example I was considering.  The car seemed ok to me, although I knew there were some issues with the shock absorbers and brakes.  The PPI was the best $55 I ever spent and saved me from getting mired in a long list of reliability problems and expensive repairs that would have equaled the purchase price of the car!  I haven't found the right car yet, but will try to bring a few more examples to Hampton Cove Auto Services until we identify the right one.  As well as having a diligent technical team, I have found Jaquata on the customer service side to be both accommodating and very personable.  My neighbor says she has been happily using Hampton Cove Auto Services for many years and it's very easy to see why.  I will use them again as my first preference auto mechanic.

text: Carden Heating and Cooling installed our  unit probably 10 years ago or so. They had excellent service then. My dad has done most of the maintenance since then. He's gotten to where he can't do it, so I've recently had Carden to come out for the regular maintenence this year. A few weeks later a part went out that caused our unit to run nonstop. Carden sent someone out within the day to get everything fixed. I highly recommend this company.

text: We love this company!  They installed all of our equipment when we built our home and have continued to service everything for going on 8 years now.  The are professional, prompt and excellent at explaining what you need and why.  I would highly recommend them!

name: Brittiny DeJarnett
text: Overall I had a very good experience. I would definitely recommend them to friends/family in the future. They came out on a Sunday to repair our unit that had stopped blowing cool air. They were very speedy and professional. The only suggestion I would have is the number that’s listed to call, maybe make it more clear what times there will be someone available to take a call after hours. The website says the business is open “24 hours” which I imagine that’s because they take emergency calls. But, I had to call that number about 5 times within a couple hours to get someone on the phone. But, once I did it was a very pleasant experience they took care of my request immediately and very friendly. I work in a customer service roll, so that’s very important as you’re very much the face or the voice of the company.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Ms. DeJarnett! We appreciate the feedback! Please always leave a message and someone will call you back if they’re not available to answer. We always check messages if there’s a time we aren’t able to answer. Thanks again for your business!

Just last month we discovered that during a remodel a nail was hammered into the thermostat wiring, causing all kinds of headaches. But Carden kept working until they diagnosed the problem and corrected it. I have been very pleased with their service, and will keep coming back.

name: Mike Austell
text:
We had a great experience with Carden Heating & Cooling!
We have always had a large Birmingham company service our unit and we weren't very impressed with their service group. So when it came time to get a new unit we started looking around. We had 6 different companies come quote our new system (large and small companies). We didn't stop our research there. Whenever possible I went and looked at a system each of those companies had installed to get an idea of the quality of their installers. I had never heard of Carden before,  but they came very highly recommend and after seeing their quality work and receiving the quote I understood why. We considered several of the quotes, but Carden offered a far superior unit at a better price than other quoted for a cheaper unit. They came and installed the unit the next business day and they did a phenomenal job. Kyle quoted our system and he was here for the install to make sure everything was taken care of just as we discussed. I can't say enough about the great job everyone at Carden did to take care of us. Carden will be the only company touching our system from now on.

resp.text: We are glad you found us Mike! Thanks for choosing Carden!

name: Carolyn Seay
text:
Carden Heating and Cooling 😁😁😁.
I was having problems with my ac. It was Saturday morning around 6:00am. I sent an email and a voicemail. By 7:00am. I received a call from Amanda. Who was very sweet and very professional. She told me she would have someone out asap.

Simon arrived at 8:00am. He was very nice and introduced himself. He gave me instructions on what I needed  to do. I came outside and he had already diagnosed the problem. He told me that he had the part with him on site. He fixed it and he gave me detailed information about what to expect and the warranty time frame.

It was great quality work and service and reasonable price for an after hours service call. Will definitely use them for my maintenance.

Thank you again Carden Heating and Cooling!!!!

Carolyn S.

resp.text: We're so happy your experience went smoothly. Thank you for your kind words Carolyn!

text: We called them out for some maintenance on our AC ac and to repair some things..... our technician was very nice and respectful with dealing with more problems then we thought we had... however he arrived two hours late, didn’t have all the materials he needed to complete the job and had to come back a second day. The main complaint however is that we called them out with the specific request of cleaning our fins on the second day... when we asked about the fins being cleaned they said it would be too difficult and did not complete this request.... I will say we didn’t push this as we were wary of their ability to it if it was “to hard” but if it was easy I would have done it myself in the first place... what they did was good overall but it was a lot of work for us to have it done and that is not what I like to pay for.

resp.text: Ashley - I'm sorry that we fell short of your expectations.  We work really hard to provide 5 star service. Please call our office at 205-669-2459 and ask to speak to Simon.  We will do whatever it takes to make it right. Thanks - Simon

text:
Starting with office staff, Amanda was extremely kind on the phone, responsive to my needs and easy to work with.
