name: Courtney Parrish
text: My fiancé and I just recently bought a house. We called Polar Bear services to come out to check our ac unit because of something to do with our inspection. They said everything was fine. A week later, the temperature in the house starts rising so we call them out to look at it again. First, they told us they’d be out in a few hours since no one was home at the time. They call my fiancé back a couple minutes later and say they are at the house waiting on us and he proceeds to tell the guy he told someone on the phone no one was there for at least another hour. The service guy got angry with us because of poor communication within the company. Then, the service guy proceeds to tell me it’s because the unit “might” be low on Freon. He never looked at the system in the basement, just outside so I don’t know how he got an accurate solution.  He charged us for the most expensive Freon (he only used 1 lb) and $99 for less than an hour of service. Needless to say, it was a complete waste of time and money because the problem was ongoing and we had another company come out a few days later. That company was able to tell us the problem right away which the other guy would have, maybe, known had he looked at the system in the basement. Needless to say, the Polar Bear services guy didn’t seem to know what he was doing but had no problem charging an unnecessary, large amount of money. We will not be using this company again.

resp.text: I am sorry that you were not happy with your experience with Polar Bear Services.  I reviewed your invoice and saw where the tech had added one pound of R22 to your system to achieve his pressures.  We were unaware of your dissatisfaction with our services and would like the opportunity to talk to you.  Thank you.

name: k Harris
text: $3850 + $79.99 wasted!!!!! Our AC stopped working and we were advised we need a coil and condensor replaced. The fee for that was $3850. A month later the ac went back to blowing hot air. We called for PB to come back out and the technician stated a part was loose and needed to be replaced from the first service job and we would not be charged. That fixed it for about another month or two. The next technician stated a frog short circuited the system and he removed it and the ac went back to blowing like it should for another couple weeks. Every visit after the alleged frog incident has been one excuse after the other. We're doing renovations and were told the filters needed to be changed more frequently and the house would cool down. We continued to change them weekly and still no luck. We called yet again to advise of the continuing problem only to be charged $79.99 for them to clean the coils and blame the filters. The AC still continued to blow hot air and then the attic began to leak. So ANOTHER call was made. The technician stated the coils were frozen and that the ac needed to be turned off and to change the filter again (at this point we're already changing it weekly and have completed the renovations). The house still didnt cool down and the ac was still leaking. Another call was made the same day (as a leaking attic is urgent and ruining the ceiling) the technician returned and said the coil was shooting out water (ya think!!!! That's why we called in the first place!) had they bothered to look and not blame it on the filter they would have discovered it on the first visit. So the technician fixes the leak and says give it time, the house will cool. Guess what, it's still not cooling!!! So we wait a week (we work and can't keep taking off for someone to come out) and call them back out. The technician now states the roof doesnt have enough vents  and the attic door is off centered and that is what's causing the house not to cool. He said he tweaked something and give it a minute and it will cool. He also states he was advised to charge for coming out. What is there to charge for? The house is still hot, the temperature is steady rising as I type, and the original problem has not been fixed. They're basically grasping  at straws at this point and have run out of probable excuses.  Be prepared to throw away $4000 plus dollars and live in heat if you use this company. Currently in search of another AC company.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear about your experience, we would appreciate if you could call us to discuss this and see if we could resolve your problems.

name: Mary Catherine Barnes Sutphin
text:
I can not say enough wonderful things about this company, from the scheduling desk to the service crew, they are all amazing! I would like to give a special “thank you” to the three men that came to our home in the past two days, John, Brody, & Steve. All three men delivered top quality customer service, while also allowing me, as a stay at home mom, a sense of trust and comfort that the service being provided to us was one we needn’t question. These gentlemen were very thorough with their original diagnostic visit, and also very kind to answer all of my questions. I have hired companies, prior to Bradberry , to repair our HVAC unit, and many a time I have been left feeling “swindled” or ignored. (I.E. rather discuss the business at hand with my husband). We’ve had multiple companies, even just send out a salesperson, instead of looking at all possible cost saving options for our family’s financial situation. I have been disheartened by other companies, to say the least...

That’s why I am so honored to write a five star review for the company of, Bradberry. They have gone above and beyond meeting my expectations. For years our family has “band aided” our AC unit, we knew it would be in the near future to get a new unit, however, Bradberry, and their service workers, still gave us multiple different options to consider.

After much deliberation, my husband and I did decide to replace the HVAC UNIT. All diagnostics, financing, and installation were done in 24hrs. (Keep in mind this is also at the end of May, in Alabama, when the heat is unbearable). These gentlemen had a kind smile on their faces the whole time, while also giving clear and concise details on what to expect going forward.

Like I said, I cannot say enough wonderful things about the customer service and products that Bradberry delivered to our family.
Thank you to the three gentlemen and the company of Bradberry for exceeding my expectations. I am truly thankful, and so much more comfortable!

-Mary Sutphin

resp.text: Thanks for your business Mary Catherine!! We are glad your experience was nothing short of great. Please spread the word in your area and we will take care of anyone you send our way.

text: Had a gas leak from AC unit and talked to Sheila in the Bradberry Office.  She was fantastic, and sent Conner and another employee over immediately to check it out. They went to get parts, came back and repaired it and the call kept them late on a Friday, but they could not have been more gracious about it. I also needed help with make my thermostat compatible with my phone. Conner could not get it going at this time, but when I signed up for a maintenance contract he came back and had conducted research on how to make my thermostat and phone compatible and fixed me up.  Also, my heater needed repairing, he sent me a quote quickly and Sheila followed up directly for an appointment to do so. These folks are so nice and professional - service is second to none.

text: From start to finish (which was very speedy) I was impressed and pleased with Bradberry. Our AC stopped working (on a weekend, of course) and Conner came within 30 minutes of my contacting Bradberry. After inspecting the AC unit, he explained my options to fix it. We decided to go with a new unit (due to age) and he was thorough and knowledgeable in explaining our options in replacing the unit. The installation crew arrived the next morning, and thanks to them, I arrived to a wonderful cool home after a long day at work. And did I mention honest? After inadvertently overpaying, I was contacted by Tuesday in the business office, who informed me I would be receiving a refund check. These folks are first-rate, through all phases of the job…I couldn’t be happier. Thanks, Bradberry!

text: I came home from a trip in early summer to an AC unit that had stopped working and a sweltering house. Bradberry Service Company had a technician out within an hour of my call. Terry was very friendly, knowledgeable, and professional. He quickly diagnosed the problem (lightning strike destroyed the AC panel) and got my system working enough to cool down the house. He returned with a new special-order replacement part within two days, and the entire HVAC system has been running smoothly ever since. I highly recommend Bradberry, and I'm now a loyal customer!

resp.text: Thanks for your business, Kristi. We appreciate you sharing your experience.

name: Rose Cavender
text:
** HIGHLY RECOMMEND!! **
have recently purchased my first home and my gas hot water heater had been going out. They replaced the hot water heater, but I still didn’t have hot water in the showers. I called the emergency phone number and told them my issue, the woman was incredibly nice and someone had returned my phone call within 30 minutes and was on my way to fix the issue at 8:30pm. Unfortunately, the next day after the fix, I still didn’t have hot water (it wasn’t staying warm long enough for a shower) and I called the emergency number again (it was 9:30pm). Same woman answered, again, incredibly nice. Within the hour, someone had reached my cell number and was scheduling an appt for the next day to resolve the issue (they would’ve come that night but I had to be at work so I told them to wait until the next day).
Long story short, it had nothing to do with the hot water heater, but the fixtures in the shower had recently been replaced prior to the inspection on my house. So the service man, Robert, changed the settings in both shower fixtures to allow more hot water to come out.
Great service, quick reply time and great all around!
HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

resp.text: Rose, thanks for choosing us for your new home needs. We value our customers feedback, and appreciate you taking the time to post a review.

text: As a Property Manager it is very important that services are prompt with great customer service skills. See you soon!!

text: I just wanted to take a second and let you know that Terry and Colby did a fantastic job! They both were well knowledgeable and got my unit back up and running! Now I must say they both are very funny , very Good looking and most importantly I will take them anytime to come fix my unit.

name: rehabconsult
text: We just had our heating and cooling system replaced by the folks at Bradberry Service Company. We live in Lexington Downs and they came highly recommended by neighbors that had recently used their services. We were not disappointed. In fact, the professionalism and skill demonstrated by each member of their installation team was a pleasure to watch. Each member of the team seemed to make an extra effort to keep us informed of each step of the installation process without us even asking. Every member, without exception, was very professional and each seemed to know their job. I highly recommend this company for any needs you may have with your heating and cooling system. They displayed a welcomed work ethic which was refreshing and very much appreciated by this customer!!!

resp.text: Thanks for your business and the rave review! We value your feedback and are happy your experience was refreshing.

name: Rob Kizer
text:
In fairness to the reader and the company my experience was as followed:
My old unit went out, I had just moved into this home about 6 months beforehand. Seeing the service number on the unit I called them just because they had serviced the unit before. They came out and were straight shooters after evaluating the unit that day, and determined it had to be replaced. After taking the time I needed to make a decision on the unit they promptly scheduled a service date and installed the unit.
I had an extremely high power bill the following month, and to their credit the technician came out on a Saturday in the middle of potential severe weather and identified and hopefully resolved the issue that caused my power bill to be so high. I give these guys the benefit of the doubt, and chalk it up to an anomaly. I don't expect to see a bill for the correction, and I DO recommend their service in the future because they strike me as good, hard working, and honest people.

resp.text: Rob, I’m aware of the issue with your old existing thermostat wiring in the wall, and I apologize for the issue. I appreciate your fair review in this matter. Of course there is not a charge at all for the work we performed Saturday to correct your issue in pulling new thermostat wire. We appreciate your business and please let us know if there is anything else we can do in the future!

text: Repair work plus diagnostics took less than 30 minutes and I was billed almost $300 to replace a $30 part. I appreciate the speed at which the repair person arrived and the work was done right from what I can tell but I feel that I was overcharged.

We only use factory authorized parts that come with a 1yr parts and labor warranty and we always make sure to check the complete system; not just fix the broke part. When you hire Bradberry Service Company you hire a complete team of specialist, and we appreciate your business.

text: 1,000% recommend these guys. Bought a new house and it has 2 units which are over 10 years old, so naturally they've needed some attention. Every time I've called BSC they get a serviceman to my house within an hour and guess what? He has what he needs on his truck to make the repair!!! I've called other companies before and they have to go get a part and come back or they have to call someone else to come look at the problem, but these guys are good - they know what they're doing and get you fixed on the spot. They're also neat when they work, they've never left a mess behind which happened to me with another company, never called them back even when they did good work. I'll take someone who does great work AND doesn't trash my attic.

name: amanda griffin
text: Bradberry Service Company is top notch!  Called on a Sunday, had a new HVAC unit and electric hot water heater installed and running on Wednesday afternoon. We were amazed to watch the guys walking around our garage and the side of the house looking for any kind of trash they may have left behind.  “We don’t want you to run over anything we left behind and have a flat tire” is what they told me. Who does that in this day and time?  Bradberry Service Company does.  They came back to service our unit a couple of weeks ago to make sure it was Winter ready, although the unit was just installed in April, Bradberry Service Company spent a hour looking over everything and making sure we were ready for cooler weather.  We would recommend this group of professionals to anyone and everybody.

Starting with Amanda, in the office to all of the service techs,  its one heck of a company. We appreciate all you do for us.

text: I recommend Skelton's to everyone.  They have maintained our air conditioners for 5 years now.  They have come out on the weekends when we needed service and we will be calling them to replace our older unit when it comes time.  Great People! Fantastic Service!

name: Matt Blair
text: We've been using Skelton's for years. They are a good family owned business that provides exceptional service. I use them for any HVAC needs at my home and my business. They just recently fixed an attic furnace at my home. Jonathon was professional and courteous. He arrived on time; then he diagnosed and fixed the problem in less than an hour.

name: Ray Brooks
text: After calling 6 different companies to install my gas wall oven, Hemphill was the only company to respond. They did excellent work and the price was very reasonable. A very professional company I would recommend any time.

name: Keith Duffy
text: The tech was great and did. A good job. Very courteous and cleaned up after himself, my biggest complaint is the bill. I admit I did not ask the hourly charge up front . But $160 a hour is way more than I expected. He was at our home for 3 and a half hours and the labor charge was $560.

name: James Crawford
text: Installed new Trane air conditioner. Michael Webb , technician, proved to be a knowledgeable, efficient and professional company representative.  He arrived on time, explained my options and provided the info I needed to arrive at a proper decision . Explained what he would do and delivered a wonderful product and service. I would definitely recommend Hemphill Services .

name: Anne Betbeze
text: Sewage was backing up in the bath tub and we immediately called Hemphill.  They came out promptly and fixed the problem.  We will absolutely call them for all of our plumbing needs in the future.  It is wonderful to know that we now have a reliable,  honest plumber.

name: Jamie Jones
text: This is the 2nd time I have used Hemphill services for HVAC related issues. We moved since the last time I used them but they were 1st on my list to call when I needed service. This company definitely does not disappoint! They are prompt, have very fair pricing, knowledgeable and most of all, courteous. I hands down recommend Hemphill Services and will not hesitate to call them again!!

name: Chez Knox
text: Hemphill is great! They’ve done several things around a house we bought and helped with repairs on the sale of another house. They are super nice and efficient!

name: salma jabeen
text: Called a tech to address.a leak. Tech found an issue with the pipes and had to cut the tile to replace them with brand new ones which was unexpected but fine. My complaint is with the bill. We were overcharged $200 and only caught it when reviewing the itemized receipt and doing the math ourselves. They handled it once we brought it up, but it bothers me that if we hadn't looked at the bill we would have just overpaid. On top of that, $160 a hour seems unreasonable. Most places will do a plumbing job for less than $100 an hour. The leak was small and we ended up paying ~$650 for the whole thing. Good work but will likely go with someone else next time.

name: Brent Bononia
text: We discovered a leaking water heater.  Called Hemphill and they were quick to respond by sending their guys out the same day and did the water tank remove and install the next day.  Service was quick, friendly and a quality repair for a good price!  I would recommend them to anyone!

name: Katrina Gamble Parker
text: Originally called another plumbing company several times and couldn’t get through to get an appointment so I called Hemphill after reading their reviews. A very nice gentleman answered the phone on the second ring and was very polite and helpful. He answered all my questions and sent Adam out this afternoon. Adam was able to properly find the problem and fix it immediately. He informed me each step of the way what the issue was and what it would take to fix it. I received quality work and service and am thankful! I’ll definitely use them again for any plumbing needs in my home and I’d gladly recommend them.

name: Corey Kearse
text: Would recommend Hemphill to anyone looking for plumbing services. Adam showed up on time and solved the problem we were having with our stopped up drain. Price was very reasonable.

name: Gayle Hurley
text: I have used Hemphill for many years (12+) and have always been very happy with their work. I heartily recommend them!

I spoke with Andrew and he sent Michael out to get me back going. He did just that and did it at a very fair price. I was very pleased with their service and professionalism. I won’t hesitate to call back in the future.

name: Jennifer Wills
text: Highly recommend Hemphill services. They are professional, responsive, and honest. We have used them on several occasions now and could not be happier with their customer service.

text: I needed a new gas range installed where we previously had an electric range. Called at 9:30 and by 3:30 the range was installed which included running a new gas line to that corner of the house. Very happy with their work and the guys they sent out.

text: Hemphill was responsive, reasonably priced, and the guys who came to install the ptrap for my sink were professional and so nice!

name: Kobe Singleton
text:
***UPDATE: October 20, 2020

After placing this review I was immediately contacted by Andrew. We had an in depth discussion about a few things and were able to reach an amicable understanding. They came out to give an estimate on the job October 20, 2020. Will give further updates as needed.***

***October 18, 2020

As a business we depend on other business services just as much as customers depend on us. I initially called and spoke with someone who passed my information on to the company representative. The representative called back and gave me a tentative arrival time but never showed. After continously calling, more than 3 times a day a few days in a row, the service representative (Andrew); I practically gave up on this business as an option. The unique thing is that so many people referred me to them.
(Wanted to give one star but gave two simply based on how many other people referred them).***

name: april brand
text:
I can’t say enough good things about my experience with the team from Hemphill.  They were so easy to work with!  Unlike many other companies, they sold me what I needed for my home rather than trying  to sell me with more just so they could turn a bigger profit.  After talking with several companies their upfront/no sales pitch approach was very refreshing.  Thanks to Hemphill,  I have an awesome new TRANE heating and air system and AO Smith gas water heater.  I got great service, equipment,, and value from Hemphill.

Hunter and his team did a terrific job with the install.  They were efficient and made sure I felt good about things each step of the way.  Hunter went above and beyond to help me get everything set up on the WiFi thermostat.  I even got a visit from Chad, Vice-President, to see that the project was coming together.  Based on my experience, you will have a hard time finding a company, with better service and value.

name: kally bradford
text: Michael was very polite, explained in detail what was wrong with my unit before fixing it and what we could do to help prevent having this kind of problem in the future, he made the repair and had everything working in no time, definitely recommend using this company for any heating or cooling issues!!

name: Tim Cano
text: I had Hunter out to service the AC yesterday and he asked if I needed anything else. I did need some outside water faucets replaced. Trey showed up the same afternoon and got it done in no time at all. My family has had three AC systems installed over the years and a few other service needs met by Hemphill. I appreciate the excellent service, quality work, and fair prices. Thank you everyone at Hemphill!

name: Arch Automotive Marketing Solutions
text: Several years ago, we needed two new Heating and Air units installed. We called 3 different Birmingham heating and air companies, Hemphill being one of them. Hemphill offered us the best price, so we hired them. They did a great job installing the units! We have since hired them for a few plumbing jobs, as well, and they did great work at a great price. We highly recommend these guys!

name: Doc C
text: Would recommend service

name: Jeremy Avant
text: These guys went above and beyond. I would give them 10 stars if I could. We had another company service our old furnace and they drug their feet, put bandaids on it, and finally said it needed to be replaced, after I paid several fees for them to fix it. So I had Hemphill come out and give me a quote on replacing the furnace. They gave me a quote Thursday evening and I had a new unit installed less than 24 hours later. Their pricing was more than fair so I had them replace my 30 year old AC unit while they were at it. Their staff couldn’t have been nicer! I highly recommend Hemphill to anyone looking for HVAC service.

name: Austin Robertson
text:
As of late summer and fall I knew that come spring 2019 I would need to replace either parts or the unit to be cool once the weather warmed up.  Little did I know that my system had decided it was not going to provide heat for the winter either!  I called Hemphill, and within one call they dispatched two guys to gather information about my system.  The next day they showed up, installed the unit in a clean and timely manner.  I would highly recommend their services for any plumbing and HVAC needs.
-Austin

text: Good job!

name: Nancy Owen
text: All I can say is Autumn Air was professional, trustworthy, economical and exceeded all my expectations. There is nothing more aggravating than to have your air conditioning unit quit. Although it is mid-October we needed our air conditioning fixed ASAP. Our unit was 17 years old and I knew we needed to replace it if not immediately, within the very near future. I emailed a few companies Saturday night asking for estimates and to please contact me Monday morning. Only Autumn Air and one other company returned my call today. Autumn Air was very pleasant and offered to have someone come out to price the unit immediately. Since I knew I did not want to start throwing money away repairing such an old unit I asked for a quote for a new unit (with and without the furnace). Skip came out and priced the unit with three options and it was clear if I wanted more options he would give them to me. He did not acted putout or frustrated with my request. He did not pressure me to make a decision nor did he push me to buy the most expensive product. Without me asking, he let me know the specials that were being offered. I asked how soon they could install the unit and he said either this afternoon or in the morning. I called my husband and sent him the estimates. My husband was impressed and even showed his fellow employees who were also impressed with the prices. After weighing the pros and cons we decided to replace the entire unit (with furnace). I called Skip back about 2:30 saying we did want to go ahead and replace the unit, he said he would call me right back, that it would be either this afternoon or in the morning. I was floored when he called me back shortly afterwards and asked if it was okay with me if they could install it today. Skip and two other gentlemen came and installed the unit working hard until close to 9:00 pm. We were all extremely grateful to the diligence of these men. In addition, Autumn Air included a 2-year service plan where they will come out to service/clean the unit twice a year. They have earned my trust. I am very thankful to Autumn Air.

resp.text: Thank you!!!!

He says it's holding freon when I know for a FACT it's empty. He did not go into the crawl space of where part of the unit is located. This guy is trying to sell us something we don't need. Reason being,  our 18 yr.old son was the one home who doesn't know any better than to just let him in. Didn't talk to my wife or me about anything. Very unsatisfied with this company. We have 5 properties and while our normal ac guy was servicing our rentals(while we waited days for the first company you sent) looked at it and told us exactly what was wrong.... NOTHING MORE THAN REGULAR WEAR AND TEAR.

name: John Hosmer
text:
For a long while there have been atmosphere issues in our basement where the previous home owners had never taken care of sealing up the rooms and keeping temps and humidity in check. We had addressed those issues and we had tried using good filters at the returns to prevent as much of any dust, mold spores, etc. from recirculating and spreading, but it ended up being a losing battle for both comfort and our family's health.  Finally, about a month ago I disconnected one of the flexpipes at the end of the trunk run to see just how bad it was and found almost 100% coverage of dust, mold, and nastiness throughout the system. It was in every bit of the trunk, and every flexpipe throughout the house (See pictures). Even a few of the vent registers had started harboring mold growth which was a really bad sign as well.

So, I did what any good panicking homeowner would do at that point. Went to Google, pulled up nearby HVAC companies with good reviews that could do duct replacement, and called for appointments for onsite inspections. Out of the four highly reviewed and reputable companies (minus individual contractors) in the Pelham area that actually showed up for their appointment, Autumn Air's rep Baker was the only one who showed up on time, actually visually inspected inside the ductwork even after I showed him the initial pictures I took, and then spent a solid amount of time explaining to me options for replacing the entire ductwork system so we could see about what would be right for our budget. In the end, the price that Autumn Air was able to provide for an upgrade to a new round smooth metal interior and outside insulated wrapped system, including new boots and registers, throughout the entire house, plus a new central AprilAire Space Guard filtration and iWave-R GPS ionization system upgrade (per my request) beat out the one other company who actually sent me a quote by almost half. Let me say that again differently...TWO of the four companies NEVER sent back a quote. This told me that two of the highly reputable companies in the Pelham area that have a high amount of favorable reviews simply did not want a job. Pitiful for them.

Fast forward to the install a week later...Led by two guys named Javy and Charles, they took care of making sure everything was treated with care when taking out the old ductwork so as to minimize spreading of dirt and mold as much as could be. Then, they proceeded to assemble and install all of the new system on site for custom fitting plus making sure all seams were taped properly and coated with mastic so that the chances of air leaks past the coils is forever kept at a minimum. They arrived early in the morning, and worked until the job was finished that evening (on the day of Harvey storms coming through too!).  Any questions I had concerning anything with the job was answered and explained with no hesitation on their part.  They went beyond expectations with accommodations and I just can't be any happier.

I can't say it enough in this entire description here how great Autumn Air is for an HVAC company. They want someone's business in the best way because they give the work the best service they can at reasonable prices, and offer great financing options too if needed. They understand how to go the extra mile to make sure the customer is being taken care of in the end as well. I can say I have also had the pleasure of meeting Jeff, the owner, later when he came back to look at a minor issue that crept up post install, and he is just as awesome about discussing more than the "here's what we'll do". He takes the time to explain the why and how's (if you are interested to know and ask) and will work with you as a customer to do everything he can within reason to make sure you are satisfied with him and his company. Because of all of these things described about everyone at that company and how we were treated, we now not only have clean, sanitized fresh air, but the confidence to know it will stay that way due to the complete service and professionalism we got from Autumn Air.

name: Bryan Pope
text:
So thankful for Jeff and his team. So professional, helpful, informative, and efficient. We called the night our air conditioner went out, Jeff came that night to offer options and quotes, then they arrived and installed the very next morning. They had the air on by lunch and completed modifications by dinner. Jeff considered our concerns and needs, then offered multiple options to meet both. Leaps and bounds above the competition. They made sure everything was properly set up and running as efficiently as possible before leaving. They even cleaned up after themselves. I highly recommend, especially if you have an out of date unit and and want to reduce your power bill. Fresh, Clean, Crisp Air all thanks to Jeff and his team.

Description of work:
Heat Pump and Air Handler Replacement - increased from 4ton unit to 5ton unit - duct work modifications to accommodate increase. Original construction of our home, 12 years ago, was  rushed and the a/c and duct work was thrown together quickly and in a sloppy manner. Our duct work was constricting air flow and in need of modifications. Our power bill was astronomical. So we called Autumn Air.

name: Max Levi
text:
Autumn Air (Charles in particular), have been absolutely incredible!  My existing furnace kept cutting off in the mornings, but then it ran fine for most of the day.  It was a difficult thing to track down, and they never quit troubleshooting to get to the root of the issue so they could fix it the right way.

This took several trips, they tried several things, one at a time, to narrow it down.  Instead of changing a bunch of things or applying "band-aids", they worked hard to pinpoint the true issue.  It ended up being a piece of metal (limit) that was popping and shutting it off prematurely (before the heat limit actually occurred).  So a tiny faulty limit had to be found, and they found it.

It took a lot of patience and tedious work at times.  They just had the attitude of "I'll find the root cause no matter what it takes, and I won't stop until I find and fix it."  I truly believe others would have given up or chalked it up to an issue with my new thermostat.

I really appreciate the time and effort that was put into troubleshooting, not giving up, and finding the real issue, and fixing it the right way!

name: Deidre Stone
text: We built our house just 3 Summers ago. During that 3 years it seems like either 1 unit or the other was in a struggle and the builder's installer was at my house at least every 6 months. It just never did heat or cool correctly and ran what seemed like constantly. You can imagine my frustration in a new home. This spring we called Autumn Air. They came right out and checked everything. They even went into the attic and found an issue with a clogged drain. (which the other guys never did) The air has been so cold all Summer that we can't set it under 74 without getting a chill and my power bill is HALF of what it has been in the past! Here we are 4 months later and my technician, Baker, gives me a courtesy call to just see how things are going since the service. I can't say enough good about these guys! Affordable, professional, and quick! I won t call or recommend  anyone but Autumn Air going forward!!Thanks for taking the stress out of my Summer!

Then when it come time to explain my new digital thermostat, my installer explained how to program & work the thermostat. Then he walked me through step by step, having me doing the programming, which made it so much easier to learn & understand.
I couldn't be more happier with my experience with Autumn Air Heating & Cooling, I'll never use another heating & cooling company ever again. And since the moment they left I've been telling everyone I know about Autumn Air Heating & Cooling, and I plan to continue to tell as many people as I can about, how great Autumn Air is.

name: Woody Armstrong
text: I have been with a different local HVAC company for the past 4 years. I had been content with them and their service until I had a repair. I had a capacitor go out and I was charged over $300 to replace it. I didn't think much about it until I shared my story with a few people who know what they are talking about. Turns out it was a steep price! I lost TRUST and confidence with them for work. I heard Autumn advertising on WDJC and thought I would check them out. Their monthly maintenance program is very reasonably priced and I even quizzed them on how much a capacitor replacement would run...much more reasonable! So I made the switch and scheduled my first maintenance visit...next day I might add and not in 6 weeks like the other. I was once again shocked at how bad my other service companies quality of work was for maintenance as Charlie showed me all of the stuff that wasn't being done! So, I am very happy I made the switch and hopeful that I have a company I can trust!

name: Lee McCarty
text: Our air conditioner decided to break down late Friday night, so I found myself in the position of trying to find someone to come out on Saturday to fix it. After calling numerous other companies that were in my area, each time just being told they had no available service time except later in the week, (none of them even asked exactly what the unit was doing, or what was wrong). I found Autumn Air online, and even though they weren't in my area, I figured I had nothing to lose trying them. My call was answered professionally, and he took my info and told me that they were pretty full for the day, but that they would try to fit me in. He asked me for details on what was wrong. After about 10 minutes, he called me back saying that they had a cancellation and a tech could be. at the house in about an hour. An hour later the tech was here and within 30 minutes we had cool air!!! I want to thank Autumn Air for taking the time to talk to me and for fitting me into their busy schedule on such a hot Saturday. The price was VERY reasonable, especially considering that it was a Saturday in the busy Summer season. I would recommend this company to everyone I know!

text: We went with them about a year ago and they did a decent job but not this time. We had absolutely no air in 90 degree weather. We called Friday and they told us they were busy and may not get to us that day which was fine (we wanted to go with them since we did last year so we didn't call anyone else) and they took our name and number and said they'd give us a call back that day and let us know when they could come. Late Friday no call, no text. I called and left a voice mail letting them know. Monday still no call so I called them again. We left another voice-mail. At this time we decided to call another company who scheduled us in as an emergency since it was so hot outside. It is now Wednesday and we have yet to get a call back from this company and our air is running beautifully thanks to the other awesome company we went with. My problem isn't the fact that they may have been too busy and couldn't see us this week,, my problem is the fact they couldn't call and let us know at any time in the past 6 days when the weather has been over 90 degrees in the house.

text: I gotta say these guys are awesome. They’ve now installed two new AC units in two different houses for us. Yesterday, they came out to do annual service on that last AC unit, and their tech spent almost a whole extra hour with me - for FREE - to walk me through a water heater installation I was trying to do myself and was kinda in over my head on. The whole reason I opted to do that job myself was that one plumber quoted me $2k, and OnTime Service wanted $179 just to come out and offer a quote (no thanks). Needless to say, I trust Ethridge and would def recommend them.

name: David Sherrill
text:
I can't say enough good things about Ethridge. We have had to replace both of our units in our house over the last two years. During our most recent one, we had a small issue and they quickly sent someone out to fix it. When we had a problem with the older of the two units, they, again, quickly got someone on site to both fix the issue, and do a thorough investigation of both our units.

You know the quality of any company starts at the top and the is true here as well. Mr. Ethridge is such a great guy. He employs people like Daniel who is one of the nicest and most conscientious service people I've ever met.

So, if you need a new unit, service on your current unit, or just looking for someone to perform maintenance, I HIGHLY recommend Ethridge! They may not always be the absolute cheapest, but you do get what you pay for in this type of work. They are worth every penny!

text: In a span of about 3 weeks fighting the AC and the home warranty company, my wife and I were really getting disheartened about just moving into our first home. They seemed to really care and were punctual with the install. Now, thanks to them, we are able to enjoy our new home and worry about the fun stuff about making a house a home. In my opinion there's only one HVAC company worth dealing with, and they now have a customer for life, Ethridge Heating and Air. They'll fix it FAST!

text: Very professional and knowledgeable technicians. Installation of our new upstairs system went smoothly and was finished relatively quickly. I probably could have gotten cheaper service elsewhere, but I'd be hard pressed to say that I could have gotten better.

text: I called at 7:30 a.m. to have my to have my AC checked out, it started blowing warm the night before. Two technicians were at my house by 11:00 a.m. and had my unit diagnosed and fixed in 40 minutes. They replaced a faulty capacitor for a very fair price. Everyone was very professional and friendly. I highly recommend Ethridge.

name: sqlb3rn segfavlt
text:
Nice folks, absurd prices, had to call them back out on 2 separate occasions because the tech didn't finish the job. Got charged more money of course. Check around before you commit to thousands of dollars, I'll be using a different company from now on.

Edit: was quoted $710 to install a new fan blade and $1300 for a new fan motor. I bought a OEM fan blade online for $38 and installed it myself in 10 minutes. The motor is perfectly fine. Enjoying cold AC again after a 3 day wait for shipping. I don't know how they get off charging that much, I think they just want people to finance repairs.

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback. We would love to resolve any issue but we can’t tell who you are based on the anonymity of your Google username. We take pride in our work, our pricing, and the handling of any customer concern. Nearly every customer that does a large job with us, shops around, does their homework, and in the end, hires us to do the work. The process goes smoothly, and everyone is happy. We apologize for whatever has caused you to feel differently and would like to resolve any concern fairly. So if you wouldn’t mind, please make yourself known to us as we had no idea there was an issue until now. You can do that here, or feel free to call our office to begin resolving whatever it is that concerns you. We’d love to help, but we don’t know who you are. If this is a true concern and this is not a case of you reviewing the wrong company, all you need to do is call to resolve. We are more than fair and will work with you to resolve your concern. Thanks!

text:
Wonderful customer service, friendly & knowledgeable technicians! Owner is very engaged in his company, and it shows! I called one evening and he answered the phone himself, personally taking care to assess my needs & book my appointment for the next day. Our job ended up being a big one! Super quick response and 2 crew installation of our new units (2 outside units, furnace and condenser in basement, plus one condenser in attic). Definitely recommend and we will continue using them for our HVAC needs!!

Unfortunately, they used RedBrick Financial Group for financing when we purchased our units, and RedBrick was awful to deal with! Shady practices, extremely rude “customer service”, no transparency in billing, difficult to make payments, and will put a lien on your home without notice or authorization. Stay away from RedBrick!
****Very glad to see (on Ethridge H & A website) that they NOW use Wells Fargo for financing! We have used WF for multiple banking accounts & they are very transparent and payments are easy to make in multiple ways.*****

Ms Denise called at 3:33pm to let me know Jarrod was on the way.  My home is cool and comfortable again THANKS to the great team at Etheridge! Their service, expertise and professionalism is spot on. Special thanks from my husband and I for everything!

name: dcasey
text:
I called and spoke with Becky (could have been Rebecca) in the office. She was very patient with me as I explained what was going on with my unit. I later learned that she obviously had taken really good notes based on the phone conversation I had a day later with the technician (wish I'd gotten his name).
The unit in question is at my house that is for sale. The buyer's "inspector" (loosely used here) said the unit had a serious problem. I had the unit maintained twice per year (it is important to note that this twice yearly maintenance was not done by Ethridge) for each of the 10 years since the unit was installed so I didn't really believe that much could be wrong with it but was required to have it checked out.
After thoroughly inspecting and testing the unit, the Ethridige technician called to let me know the unit was fine, in fact he found no problems at all.
He could have easily gone with what the "inspector" said and the repairs or replacement could have made them a lot of money. But, this company chooses ethics and honesty and in doing so earned a customer.
I recommend this company and I plan to contact them for a maintenance contract for my home because I know these folks will not take advantage of me.

name: Mark Engelmeyer
text:
During the quoting process for a  complete replacement Heat Pump for my 15 year old system we reached out to Hembree Heating & Air Conditioning.
They had been recommended to me from a neighbor.  We scheduled a time  to meet and discuss replacement options and quote the replacement system.  Madison called the morning of the estimate and Josh Hembree called, as promised, one hour prior to the meeting time.  Josh arrived on time and came prepared with all necessary information on a variety of systems available.  We were searching for a reliable system with an excellent warranty.  Josh offered an American Standard with an extended warranty through Hembree at a very fair and reasonable price.  The quote was under our budget which allowed us to step up to a 16 SEER system.  Overall, the quote for the 16 SEER system was less than any other quote we had received.  Josh schedule an install date for the following week.  Walt gave me a call on hour before the scheduled install.  Walt and Colin arrived on time to conduct the install as promised.  They were both very knowledgeable, friendly and professional.  The installation of the system was completed on time the day of starting the install.  The entire system functions flawlessly and is so much cleaner and more professional performing than my old system.  Josh Hembree and the entire Team at Hembree Heating & Air Conditioning are friendly, knowledgeable and trustworthy.  The final price was exactly as quoted and we continue to enjoy our new American Standard Heating and Air Conditioning Heat Pump.  I recommend Hembree Heating & Air Conditioning to all of my family, friends and will continue to use them for all of my future HVAC needs.

name: mike norris
text: I absolutely could not be more satisfied in the professional service that Hembree provided me!  I had to replace two systems due to Hurricane Sally and Hembree made this process so much easier than I expected.  From the initial consultation with Josh to discuss my options to the top notch installation by Chris and Morgan.  I was consistently kept in communication with what to expect, recommendations and progress.  They were prompt, courteous and did an amazing job with the installation.  I never thought I would be so excited about a new HVAC system!  However, Hembree exceeded all my expectations and I would not hesitate to use them again!  I highly recommend this company!!

name: Jay Connor
text: I have used 3D Air Services for 5 years to service my home and two businesses.  Their services and products offered have been top notch. Every time I call I easily get someone on the phone that is professional and efficient when handling my requests.  They schedule my service for maintenance within any time that works with me.  If I have an emergency they always come immediately and are prepared to handle whatever problem arises.  I have had them out at 11pm and worked until 3am as well as on holidays and still received the same professionalism that I was accustom to during normal business hours.  I am always impressed with how detailed they are when doing a simple service and cleaning.  I have entrusted them to replace 2 separate hvac units, a water heater, and dryer venting.  I have them service a separate unit that was installed before I knew of them. They treat it with the same respect that they do with the ones they installed.  They have provided superior service and I am confident that what is replaced is going to give me plenty of trouble free years.  I will continue to use their services on anything else I need and I am more than happy to give them a recommendation if needed.

Always happy to report its all good!

I suggest you give them a call you will be glad you did.

name: Mike Harden
text: The entire experience replacing our furnace and air conditioner was very professional and timely. Chris walked us through the process from estimate, to install, to payment with very clear options. They were always on time and the install went as they said. EVERYTHING was left neat, clean, and the install team was very friendly. Chis informed us of a special from the manufacturer that saved us $400 after the estimate. Highly recommend this company and Chris.

name: Colt Pilkington
text: Fast, friendly, very professional service. Everyone we spoke with was incredibly helpful. Would recommend to anyone in need.

resp.text: Thank you!  We appreciate your recommendation.

name: Sean Morrison
text: Came out on Tuesday. Quoted me a fair price. Came out the next day and installed my new unit. They were on time and finished before 5pm. Best service ever.

name: Mary Jo Piazza
text: Very professional and polite  answered all my questions .A good experience meeting Kevin

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Rachael Myers
text: My husband called at 5pm and they sent Chris out by 7pm to check our air. He had it up and running that night and was able to order the part we needed and replace it the next day. Fast and great service. Thanks Chris!

name: Shannon Hataway
text: Need furnace replacement for a very old system. Everyone was friendly, quick and professional! Thanks Jeremy, Rodger, Joe and Chris!

resp.text: Thank you!  We are so glad to help you out!  We appreciate you!

name: Rory Chrane
text: I got their name as a referral from a home remodeler who was sold on their business efficiency. Now I see why. Such a relief to have the help of these folks. Very professional and smart on climate control. No guessing around and hem- hawing, "might be this, might be that" kind of response you get from others.. Chris knows what he is doing, and instills confidence. The 3D team has the kind of people who you don't mind saying, just fix it ,whatever it is, and not have to bother with second opinions etc. I wish I had all the money I wasted with rookies in the past before I found these professionals. If you need heating or AC help just call them you will be pleased.

resp.text: Thank you!  We are glad you were recommended to us and look forward to working with you again.

name: Bryon Rickard
text: Very personable. Professional and good work.   This service rep is why I signed up for bi-annual maintenance.

name: Rachael Myers
text: My husband called at 5pm and they sent Chris out by 7pm to check our air. He had it up and running that night and was able to order the part we needed and replace it the next day. Fast and great service. Thanks Chris!

name: Alex Goebel
text: 3D just completed the install for my rental home in Birmingham. Everyone I dealt with from Kevin Burke, Kevin Massey, David and Chris G just did an outstanding job. I couldn’t have asked for a more professional crew and company to help me with this job. I will definitely use 3D again for any HVAC work and install needs in the future. I highly recommend them. Ask for Kevin Burke when you call.

name: matt fuller
text: Very friendly, and professional. They worked quick once we decided which package worked best for us, and they didn't push us while we made the choise. Complete system replacement for an affordable price, and it works like a charm now. Highly recommend these guys for your HVAC needs.

resp.text: Thank you!  We appreciate your recommendation.

name: Kevin Gardner
text:
We had let our service contract lapse and our unit needed work. Chris identified the issue, cleaned and got us set up with new contract. Extremely professional and no nonsense.

UPDATE: I had an issue with our install and the service manager himself came out to inspect it and fix the issue. These guys are AMAZING and actually take the time to listen -  top notch!

name: Claire Hudson
text: Yet again these people excel ! Shannon and Chris both are top notch .

resp.text: Thank you!  We appreciate you!

name: Don Frezell
text: Chris and the Install crew did a great job. I highly recommend 3D Air Services. A BIG Thanks to Chris for his expertise and recommendations and also to Rigo for his Hard work and making sure everything was working correctly after the install. My house is finally cool.

name: JohN S
text: Our heater went out the day before i went in for back surgery. When i got home we called 3D and Rodger G. came out that day and inspected everything. He told me what was wrong and what my options were. He didn't try to pressure me into a new system but that was the smart option for us. Then the next morning the crew arrived and started removing the old unit. They were all very polite and professional. Everything was taken care of that day and i couldn't be happier. I highly recommend 3D Air Services to anyone searching for HVAC work. Ask for Rodger!

name: savannah mcfarland
text: I have used 3D for a few years now and have always been happy with their service . Chris is always on time or early for our appointment and always takes the time to explain to me what he's done and if anything needs to be repaired. He always goes the extra mile which I appreciate. Also, Erica in the office is amazing. She is so friendly and is always willing to work with my schedule when making appointments for me. If there was an option to give them 10 starts, I would!

name: Don Frezell
text: Chris and the Install crew did a great job. I highly recommend 3D Air Services. A BIG Thanks to Chris for his expertise and recommendations and also to Rigo for his Hard work and making sure everything was working correctly after the install. My house is finally cool.

name: Carolyn Petty
text: From the people answering the phone in the office, to the people coming to our school to change filters or fix some other problem, everyone at this company is outstanding. They do great work at a very good price. I couldn't recommend them highly enough.

name: JohN S
text: Our heater went out the day before i went in for back surgery. When i got home we called 3D and Rodger G. came out that day and inspected everything. He told me what was wrong and what my options were. He didn't try to pressure me into a new system but that was the smart option for us. Then the next morning the crew arrived and started removing the old unit. They were all very polite and professional. Everything was taken care of that day and i couldn't be happier. I highly recommend 3D Air Services to anyone searching for HVAC work. Ask for Rodger!

name: Adam Owens
text: We had an 18 year old unit that finally bit the dust on Sunday...mind you in the middle of a down pour from Hurricane Nate. I called 3D and they said they would have someone out between 2-2:30. Chris called and showed up at 1:15pm. He took his time, worked on the unit and gave us an estimate for the repair but also to replace the unit. We decided it was time to do so and so they got on it the next day replacing the unit within a few hours. The unit has been installed for a day and is running great, very quiet and the installer even leveled out the area where the heat pump would sit to make sure it was balanced properly. I can't stress enough how much customer service makes a difference for us and Chris and the crew at 3D really did a great job.

name: Heather Thomas
text: Excellent service. They made sure to get us heat before the cold weather got here. The workers were polite and professional. Thank you 3D!!

name: Carol Bunn
text: Chris is very knowledgeable and very professional when working with a client. They do not keep you waiting for the appointment time that you have. They do not try to sell you something you do not need and I appreciate that.

name: Robert Bunger
text: Bad board on 20-yr-old system caused blower to quit. They were able to jumper blower to run constantly until they can come back and replace entire system.

resp.text: Thank you!  We appreciate your business.

name: Ryan Moulin
text: Initial visit was great and helpful. Fixed the problem quickly and answered all of our questions. We even decided to sign up for yearly service maintenance with them. Unfortunately, after paying for it and being told someone would call to start the maintenance the next week we never were contacted during the next three weeks. I finally called and cancelled and was told they would send the refund. I would recommend them still for a one time fix but not the annual service contract.

name: Stephen Harris
text:
I had 2 heat pump units that died so I went down the list of EBSCO recommended contractors for Birmingham.  I had one company come out to get my first quote.  The price seemed high and the salesman was not especially personable or helpful.  I needed another quote and Chris from 3D Air services came out and had a look.  He was very knowledgeable and answered all of my questions.  He saw things that the other contractor did not, such as a poor duct work design that was choking air to a particular room in my house.  He explored a couple of options with me and we settled on the best solution.  He really inspired confidence and wrote me a detailed quote for a fair price to replace both units with 2 different brand options.

The installers were also knowledgeable in answering my questions and addressing my concerns.  Chris showed up on the first day of the install as well, which was good to show that the salesman didn't just wash his hands of me after the sale.  The installers worked hard for 2 days and got everything installed in a professional manner.  They put down mats on my floors to minimize mess and swept up on their way out at the end of each day.

Overall I am very pleased with 3D Air Services.  The service was professional top to bottom and I always felt like the employees were being honest with me.  I will absolutely recommend them to friends and family members in the future.

name: Ryan Moulin
text: Initial visit was great and helpful. Fixed the problem quickly and answered all of our questions. We even decided to sign up for yearly service maintenance with them. Unfortunately, after paying for it and being told someone would call to start the maintenance the next week we never were contacted during the next three weeks. I finally called and cancelled and was told they would send the refund. I would recommend them still for a one time fix but not the annual service contract.
