name: J.B. Guthrie
text: On time, professional, efficient, and life saving. Alabama heat doesn't mess around in July and neither does 3D Air Services. Highly recommend.

name: Marie Smith
text: Kevin was very professional and on time.

resp.text: Thanks!

name: Lance Moore
text: Quick service on a Saturday. Was very happy with the tech, Chris. The price was reasonable too.

name: Carolyn Petty
text: We have used 3D Air Services several times, because we have a number of units in our large building. Every time we call, they respond quickly, usually coming out the same day. They replaced an aging unit with a great Carrier unit, and it's working well; but when we called them out again, expecting to have to replace another, they simply replaced the thermostat instead, solving the problem and saving us thousands of dollars. I highly recommend them for their efficiency, honesty, and general attitude. Even the woman who answers the phone is part of the same company-wide excellence!

name: Ron Rollins
text: Big Thanks to Shavarus and Kevin. Friendly and professional. They went the extra mile, all the while smiling!!!! Thanks again for everything!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Ande Underwood
text:
Chris came over and helped address the sloppy work performed by another HVAC contractor sent by our home warranty company. He was professional, polite, and knowledgeable. We signed up for their service plan, and are considering dropping the home warranty.

Thanks to Jay C. for recommending them!

name: Richard Garlikov
text: 3D Air installed a mini-split system for me three years ago and did an excellent job of that, and were nice to work with, especially because they patiently explained all that I needed to do before having the system installed and how it all worked.  They also installed the main house unit when the house was built, and came out one time at no charge to make an adjustment I requested.  So even though I have free semi-annual inspections of my main house unit with Sears whole house warranty, I do not use that and instead I pay for 3D to come out and 'tune' my unit and clean the coils, etc.   I trust them more, and they are more professional.  Today the service representative was Kevin and he was excellent in terms of doing the work and explaining all of it to me.  I like to understand what all is involved in this sort of thing.

name: Karen Smith
text: Chris at 3D Air did awesome repair on our air conditioner.He is very knowledgeable.explained in detail what needed to be repaired and went to work.I would call 3 D Air without hesitation.

name: Crissy V
text: 3D showed up when the company we had a maintenance contract with did not.  We spent $900 less than 14 days prior with the previous company.  We called 3D's main number and Chris called us back promptly.  Chris was their prior to his ETA.  He was friendly and professional and gave us several options as to how we could proceed. We needed to replace our AC system.  From the person on the phone, technician, and the installation crew, everyone was courteous, informative, and on time.  We had our entire system replaced within 24 hours of our after hours and on a holiday service call.

name: Rachael Hutchison
text: Chris was awesome! Had same day service and got us back up and running! Highly recommend!

name: Randall Williams
text: As a liscensed realtor, I always want to work with professional people who know there business and perform well. We are very pleased with the work, told me what they would do and did all they said. No surprises in the quality, the price or the workmanship, I would recommend them for my clients and would use them again for my personal needs.

name: Phillip Hughes
text: Very professional group. Correctly diagnosed problem and made repairs . Job required additional duct, stayed late into the night until the job was finished. I would certainly recommend them!!

name: Brandi Sharit
text: Our unit is a year old and works great. Our gas bill decreased dramatically with this unit. Chris does a great job with our maintenance on the unit. Thanks, 3D!

name: Kimberly Weathers
text: Installation was done in 1 day, the technicians were courteous and worked diligently. The office staff was awesome each time I spoke with them. I would highly recommend using this company for your HVAC needs!!!

name: David Haley
text:
The service has been impeccable, and while knowing nothing about HVAC the quality seems beyond reproach as we have had no problems.

Chris is the consummate professional. We have had them put in an AC unit and have a maintenance contract with them and have been very pleased. Next is a duct re-work. They have put no pressure on us to have that done, but has been mentioned on several visits and we finally decided to get 'er done.

name: Jeannie Birkenkamp
text: We had to have our entire until replaced.  All I can say is we will never use another HVAC company.  They were extremely informative, professional, courteous and timely.  They made a huge frustration into a very smooth process.  The techs, the office, we were impressed with everyone we came in contact with.  I would absolutely recommend them 10x over!  Great company!

name: Paul Wynn
text: Very knowledgable and helpful. Would do business with again!!!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Stephen Talley
text: We had 3D conduct our annual service today. The technician, Chris was very professional and when he found a problem, he explained what the problem was and what would be best to correct it. I am very happy with the experience and would recommend 3D to everyone!!!

name: Devin Smith
text: 3D has helped me several times over the years. After installing a new water-heater in my home, my power bill has been significantly less, and it's all thanks to 3D!

name: CHRIS HARPER
text: These folks are great. A/c would just stop in the middle of the night for a few hours then start back. Did this for about 4 days. Finally it shut down right befor they got there and the problem was discovered and fixed. They stayed with the process to make sure it was fixed. Can't say enough good things about their work and Kevin the tech.

name: Matt Clements
text: Excellent experience with Rodger and crew, from estimate to installation.  When my mother needed to replace a 24yr old Carrier system, we got estimates from 5 companies; one for Carrier, two for Bryant, one for Lennox, and one for Heil.  3D Air's proposal was not the cheapest, but also not the most expensive, and (1) Rodger was the most thorough in his visit; (2) others charged extra for duct cleaning/sealing and/or didn't include a filter or sanitizer/UV; (3) others proposed reusing the lineset, which I was just a little skeptical of with it being 24yrs old (or older); (4) nobody else considered whether rooftop venting required updating; and (5) the next closest offer included less labor warranty or a very expensive option to extend from 1yr to 10yr.  In addition, 3D Air's front office was very responsive by email to requests for changes to the proposal options.  Plus, they offer competitively priced annual service plans.  After deciding to proceed, the time from signing to install was minimal, and the installation crew worked politely & efficiently and the results reflect an attention to detail that provides a lot of peace of mind.  The new system is running great.  Thank you!

name: Pat G. Johnson
text: Our experience with this company was great. The service tech was very knowledgeable and even though we have an older heat/air system he took time to research the problem and fix it . I highly recommend them!

name: Cherie Hickey
text: Fantastic job by Chris Gilham and his team today! Very professional with the job, cleaned up the mess, and left us way cooler than we were before, if that’s even possible! 🤣

name: Steven Sisco
text: Quick response, honest and excellent installation of water heater, heat pump. We are happy customers!

name: Austin Bond
text: Really appreciate the customer service, they went way above and beyond what was required! They stand by their slogan “whatever it takes.” Thanks guys.

name: MICHAEL CLEMMER
text: Needed help fast on a Saturday and 3D had me covered.  Rodger showed up and quickly determined the problem.  These guys are fast, efficient, and honest.

name: Chris Hardin
text: Guy came out. I knew i had a leak and i complained about how my previous HVAC guy would just put in refrigerant at $100 per lb. He said they didn't just do that and he would try to find the leak. He pulled off my coil panel said its rusted out and we needed new coils or a new unit. He was really pushing the new unit, we decided to wait and just get r22 put in. He charged way more than i expected, he half put back on the panel so cold air was still leaking out into the attic like crazy. I managed to find the leak myself with a $20 sniffer off Amazon and I repaired it. It turns out the coil manifold wasn't rusted bad like he said. I feel sorry for people who just take these guys word at face value.

name: Oliver Pesch
text: We first encountered 3D Air over a year ago when another, not to be named, firm try to scam us on a simple service call and even sabotaged our unit in an attempt to get us to buy a whole new unit at an inflated price.  We came across 3D through some other contacts and Chris stopped by, fixed the original problem (simply a clogged drain line), found and corrected the problem created by the other contractor (loosened valve to drain the Freon to make it look like the unit was faulty) -- all at a normal service call rate.  We have trusted Chris and team ever since so this year when our unit went out for real we called Chris. He quoted good quality units at a very reasonable price and the whole process was fast, efficient and very professional.  I would not hesitate to recommend 3D Air to anyone needing a trusted HVAC expert.

name: Professor Waller
text: 3D Air Resolved my issues in an efficient and timely manner.

name: Natalie Hollar
text: Excellent service. They go aboveand beyond each step of the way. I would highly recommend!

name: Jonathan Collins
text: Best place for heating and cooling needs

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Betty Veitch
text: 3D Air Services, LLC has been nothing but 'over the top' in the interactions we have had with them. Yesterday when Chris came to check out my complaint of a sporadic start for the air compressor, he found nothing wrong with it, but checked all the equipment to be sure all was OK.They are the tops for service and professionalism.

name: Charlotte Weems
text: Just had my 2nd yearly inspection performed. The technician was very thorough and knowledgeable. I renewed my contract for another year and got discounts on the Aprilaire media replaced in my return air filter. I have used 3D since I moved in my new house in 2008.

name: Todd LaPore
text: Had an AC issue caused by my roofers who then called 3D Air to check on it. Chris came out within an hour and confirmed the issue. His recommendation helped me recover funds towards a new AC unit. The new unit was installed within 2 days with no issues. Very professional installation and customer service. Chris answered all of my texts within minutes I look forward to the new relationship. Price was not the lowest but worth a small premium for the quality of service.

name: Sheila Guidry
text: The best company! Chris answers my phone calls at any hour and installed a Reme Halo and a Apriliaire Filter, I can already tell a difference in my air quality!

name: Steve Bedsole
text:
Our heat pump died. Chris came out the same day I called to scope out the replacement and other work we needed (move a duct and replace hot water heater). Unlike the other two companies that we consulted, Chris prepared his pricing for us before he left our house. His pricing came out slightly higher, but his professionalism and three years of labor coverage made the choice easier for us.

They came out the day after we awarded the job and stayed until everything was done and cleaned up. They ran into a little snafu when a water shut off valve malfunctioned - not their fault. But they stayed, sent a guy to Lowe's to get a replacement, and fixed it with no additional charge to us.

We are very pleased withtheir work and how quiet the new Bryant 15 SEER heat pump is. Time will tell how much our energy bill drops, but we feel confident Chris and his team will be there for us should we need them.

name: Robby Farley
text: we have used these guys for just over 5 years. they are always courteous, professional and most importantly punctual.

name: Jim Jones
text: We had our duct work replaced and the unit serviced. 3D technicians was very professional and done a awesome job.

name: neia Lk
text: Alabama and no ac in May=no bueno. Fortunately this company came the day we called and fixed our problems. Highly recommended!

name: Gloria McGee
text: 3D Air originally came to my home to service our unit for the Summer before we discovered a much more serious issue. 3D provided a detailed plan to eliminate the problem with a cost effective method of payment for a very unexpected problem. Their service techs came back the next business day to fix the issue and the unit is working better than it was when it was originally installed. Their reps are very friendly, informative and professional. They also cleaned up behind the work and left the house as clean as it was when the techs arrived. I would recommend 3D Air to anyone with HVAC maintenance or repair needs and I will continue to use them as my HVAC service provider in the future.

name: Dawson Young
text: Terrible service. The men who were suppose to repair my heating system kept rescheduling appointments, and when they finally arrived. Were rude as ever... I recommend trying a different Air Service

name: Alan Herndon
text: Great folks!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Mary Parker
text: Very good

name: Melissa Holcombe
text: We have always had great experiences using 3D Air with prompt and friendly service. Would highly recommend them!

name: Jarred Sherrer
text:
VERY unprofessional.  Called to have an estimate on an A/C repair.  Scheduled for the next day between 8:00-10:00 AM.  I stayed home from work to meet with the repair man.  Recieved a call shortly after 8:00 to inform me that due to an emergency it would be closer to 10:00 AM and maybe a "tad" after before he could get there.  This was fine with me.  10:40 AM had come and gone and nobody had showed up or contacted me.  I called 3D Air Services and all circuits were busy.  I left a message and number to call me back and how nobody has showed up or contacted me.  Never got a call back.  I had to go back to work and decided to call on my way at 12:28 PM.  I get in touch with someone, who asks who I am after explaining how nobody showed up or contacted me.  I hear "oh yeah....the estimate....".  She apologizes and explains that there was an emergency and they can have somebody out later that evening.  So after work close to 5:00 PM, the original repair man shows up to do the estimate.  I explain what is wrong with my unit and what I THINK might be going on.  He uses no equipment and only goes into the attic and outside to look at both units, with only pen and paper (NO TOOLS).  I believe he recorded the model information and that was it.  He then basically agrees with one on my suggested problems being that it could be the TXV valve on the inside unit.  He says he is "95 - 100%" sure that is what it is.  Used no equipment or tools to verify this would be the fix.  He then left and said he would give me a call this morning with an estimate.  It's now 12:30 PM.  No contact from them still.  Will never use this company.  UNPROFESSIONAL!

Edit (After 3D Air responded):  It is really sad that this company is lying about calling me and leaving me a voicemail with a message on the estimate.  This is completely false!  There is only one number that they have from me.  They did not call.  And how gracious of you guys to not charge for a service call, when he literally just walked in the house with a pen and paper.  And was simply looked at the unit in the attic and the unit outside.  The unit upstairs has several phillips head screws for panels that are secured to the unit.  There is no way he could have diagnosed that is was a TXV valve with pen and paper.  I even offered a screwdriver for using on the unit up in the attic, to which he said he didn't need.  All this still doesn't take away from nobody every calling me back in the morning of the scheduled appointment to let me know that nobody was showing up.  Believe who you want.  This was still UNPROFESSIONAL!

name: flowbee _89
text: Awesome A+++

resp.text: Wow!  Thanks!

name: Kristy Corey
text: Kevin is amazing!!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: SHERRY Gilham
text: They are the best!

name: Jeremy Lagrone
text: Very professional and a good value.

name: T. Ferguson DiazBrothersFan
text: I gave one star because the girl at front is very sweet and there was a helpful guy, but we left car on a Wednesday at 10am. I explained we really needed the car asap because I have cancer and lupus etc and will be hard for me to give people rides to work etc at 5am! They explain there was cars in front of mine (6) Thursday it was to be done...nope! Friday the were sure by then...NO, the mechanic that looked at it had left for the day and weekend. The other mechanics had jobs and they couldn't get to mine...nothing! They need a mechanic for minor jobs like mine (bearings to be replaced) and other mechanics for the bigger jobs...if you got one car and need it done same or next day or actually in three ...don't go here! I feel the mechanic that looked at the car should have just fixed it. Oh they were supposed to have called as well..no such thing happened, the mechanic just didn't want to do the job! I have never taken a car somewhere where they did not have their stuff together like this place! Never even called for a status update or to tell us anything about the car! Taking car to another place who can have work done in one hour!!! The car set there for 3 days!!!!!

name: Carole Juarez
text: Amazing company!!!  We were referred by discount tire. Polite hard-working people. Thank you for putting us back on the road so quickly. Feeling safe Carole

name: Joe Shultz
text:
I went there for a new water pump for a Chevy SUV. A new water pump was installed, but didn't last 100 miles. I returned the vehicle only to have the auto shop refuse to replace the water pump free of charge. I removed the water pump that weekend to find they cross threaded the new water pump and warped the unit. No wonder it did not function properly. After re-tapping a couple of screws and several hours out of my Saturday I replaced the new pump myself. Now I am out the price of another water pump, thanks a lot.

Many people do not know this, but each repair job has an attached amount of time associated with it. So, if an auto center changes your brakes in 30 min but the book says it takes 1.5 hours, then the shop charges you for the extra hour as an extra rake. Now, I do not mind paying the extra as long as the quality matches. This shop may do quick work, but it is not at the quality I am paying for. Poor value given, and they would not make it right either. Basically the repair guy did not remove all the necessary components (like a radiator) to save some time and shoved the water pump in at an angle.

I will never use them again.

name: Heather M
text: Griffin is a lifesaver! My truck blew a spark plug and I had two kids with me along with my husband. We were about 300 miles from home! I thought we were stranded and repair was going to cost a fortune. Griffin used his OWN vehicle to drive 3 exits up to assist us. He was able to get the undamaged spark plug back in and also brought us a brand new coil pack and put it in. He did this repair out of the kindness of his heart and we cannot thank him enough! He was honest from the get go. He could have told us the truck needed a new head or worse and made a ton of money, but he fixed the problem quickly and didn't charge us a fractuon of what he could have! Thank you Griffin, you were our Angel! His shop may be behind sometimes, but he is worth the wait if you want an honest mechanic!

name: Sheree Lewis
text: New owner, great guy great work! I recommend this place for all your auto work .

name: Travis Gibbs
text:
I brought my car and truck to them when they first opened. They fixed both and stuck to fair estimate.

I wouldn't do business with them now after my last experience.

Month 1 & 2
Our car needed a new engine. The shop owner wanted to get an engine from his supplying junkyard. He missed one that became available. This process took about 2 weeks before we decided to find an engine ourselves which he was not happy with but agreed to. He said they could have it put in within a 3 day period. The engine company we bought from needed it done in 10 days for warranty purposes. Griffith used all of the 10 days to because other cars came in front of me while we had to wait on engine. They finally got it in and started but had to send to dealership because the car went into anti-theft mode and wouldn't start. We had to actually arrange the drop off to the dealership ourselves. I feel like we were running his business for him because he was almost never there. The employees even mentioned that problem in passing.

Month 3
We become worried after not hearing anything from dealership or Griffin for about 2.5ish weeks. I had to contact dealership for them to tell me that they told Griffin that the car needed a major fuse panel that could be $1200+. I called Griffin to tell him I approved the install because we really needed the car. It's month 3 folks!

Is it Month 4? Getting close anyway.
We had to go ourselves to the dealership to confront them about not getting to our car. This should be Griffin's job. The dealership says that the part didn't fix the problem. Car still doesn't work. We decide to give up because the car needed another part for $2400 to "maybe" fix. We decide to just give up. Dealership is trying to get more money from us even though they didn't fix the problem. Griffin is trying to put that on us. We said we would pay for his time, but does this seem fair? Griffin himself might be a knowledgable mechanic, but he is a rookie business owner with no organization or management skills of his people.  He wasted a huge amount of our time (3+months), money ($6000+) and stressed my wife and I to no end. We are going to have to scrap our car with a new engine that doesn't run.

They do good oil changes and put a muffler on another car we brought, but he also made me pay for the part up front which shows bad business to me as well.

* FINAL RESULT
paid griffin $1400 because the car ended up not working out. He said he made no money and it would have been $2000 if it had worked + whatever it would be to charge AC. When we walked in to pay he didn't even recognize us. My wife and I talked to this guy several times in person and on phone. The waiting area had mice running around too FYI if you are scared of them. After that we went to the dealer shop that had our car and basically gave it to the tech working on it. he paid for the dealer work and gave us a little cash. When we went to clean the car out I noticed that the driver seat leather looked very dirty and worn. Griffin said he was sorry.

name: Kristina Garrison
text: I am honestly disappointed, this shop has Amazing POTENTIAL. However, I don't feel it is being ran efficiently. I have called with no answer, mupltiple occasions. I also have the concern of the child/childern that are running through shop all day, most days. I have also had to keep from hitting many toys, many times. I believe the shop is in an amazing location, and again has all potential in the wprld. Unfourtnally, right now, I wouldn't recommend it.

name: Chris Ruffin
text:
I moved to McCalla in March of 2015. I was looking for a dependable repair shop that did quality work and that I could become a repeat customer with. I chose Griffin Automotive because they are ASE certified and after using them with 3 vehicles (06 Nissan Altima, 05 Chevy Silverado, & 2015 Nissan Altima) I have had no complaints with them.

They do great work, and are realistic with their estimates. If you are looking for a repair shop with a quick turnaround (meaning hours instead of days) then this may not be the shop for you, but I have a spare vehicle and can leave the vehicle for repairs.  They typically tell me that they have other vehicles in front of mine, but will look at it as soon as they get a free moment. I have sent my cars or truck to them at least 9 times (using both the overnight drop box and just bringing it in) and have only waited longer than a day once (and that was because the part got their late in the evening and I picked it up after work the next day)

I have had multiple types of jobs: brakes pads for Altima and Silverado, rotors for Altima and Silverado,, brake drums for Silverado, oil change for Altima and Silverado, window regulator replacement on Silverado, oil leak repair on Altima, engine mounts on Altima, transfer case replacement Silverado 4x4, along with other normal maintenance type items

text: Terrible, horrible, awful would not recommend to anyone.  Only one of the three technicians they sent out were competent. I had to call constantly to get updates and no one seemed to have a clue.  Customer service is poor to say the least.  Once we FINALLY got the ac fixed they wanted to dispute the invoice.  DO NOT HIRE MIDSOUTH TO DO ANY AC WORK!

Mid South was completely honest, very personable, friendly  and I could go on.  If you need hvac help call Mid South and don't waste your time with anyone else.

name: Brian Gullage
text:
$616............for 2 twenty dollar capacitors and a 15 minute service call.  So my previous 5 star review has changed.

I have been a very loyal customer of Midsouth, and I have recommended them to numerous people. I have always given them excellent reviews.

I know small businesses have high expenses and need to make a profit, but overcharging a loyal customer that sends you referrals has consequences.

resp.text:
Hello Mr Gullage,
I hope you are doing well. I just wanted to make a quick response to your negative feedback. We actually charged you 485.00 for (2) pounds of Freon and (2) capacitors. This is a very competitive price in our area for the service that was performed on your HVAC system.

We always give upfront pricing before any work is completed. You had the option to approve or decline the work  before any work was performed on your system. You approved the work order and then we made the needed repairs. Please feel free to reach out to us if you have any more questions or concerns. You can contact our office @ (205)730-1270. As always, we appreciate your business!!!

We do our very best to stay as competitive as possible to help our customers.

name: Gene Cochran
text:
David Monk was my technician today serving 3 units in my house. 2 weeks ago I had a new roof put on my house. David went in to the attic and immediately discovered a roofing nail lodged into the copper natural gas line. It was spewing natural gas and we immediately turned all appliances off. It could have been disastrous! 20 years ago the builder placed the copper lines too close to the roof decking. We were very close to losing our house in a possible explosion!
David serviced all 3 units, cleaned the coils and gave me an overview of the expected life of each unit. He also gave me information on a finance plan if one or all of my units fail. 60 months with 0% interest really would be a great way to finance a complete unit.

Brown Heating & Cooling has been great for my family for 25 years now!

Thanks David Monk for your professional service!!!

name: Lane Hyche
text: I called Brown (Dec 4, 2019) because my heat pump was running nonstop when I went upstairs but it felt like it was cold. When Derek arrived, he immediately started gathering information about what kind of issues I was having and where. I told him about the upstairs being cold and he started with the outside before working his was to the second floor. We found that one of my attic doors had been left open by our pest control tech. Instead of stopping there, he verified that everything else was operating properly. Where others would have stopped, he wanted to make sure we didn't have another problem that may have been masked by the door being left open. He definitely went above and beyond with keeping my family comfortable. Thanks for the care you showed us.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Lane. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us—and we agree, Derek is truly a gem to have on our team! We count ourselves lucky for customers like you. We look forward to working with you again in the future!

text: Brown was very fast and responsive to my call.  The technician that came out was on time and very professional.  He explained all of my options very thoroughly for repairing or replacing my 15 year old unit in terms I could understand.  He made sure he answered each and every one of my questions.  I ended up choosing to replace the unit rather than sink money into costly repairs for such an old unit.  Brown was able to replace my unit with a new Bryant the same day.  They were very fast and efficient but I could tell they took pride in the job and did even the little things the right way.  The technician told me I would, but I have really noticed a difference in the energy savings on my power bill for the new unit.  I thought that might just be a sales pitch but I have saved money on my power bill because the new unit is so much more energy efficient.  I would not hesitate to recommend Brown to all of my friends and family.

name: Meredith Thigpen
text:
I can’t sing the praises of this company and Tina White, who is my Christmas angel.  My mom lives in Virginia mines and has been without heat or air for 4 years, which we haven’t been able to afford to replace. She was using space heaters all thru the house, which I know is oh so dangerous.  I’ve known Tina from my job, and when I found out that they offer a charity that provides heat for senior citizens, all I had to do was ask.  David, in the office, immediately called to set up a time to be there on Monday.  This was on Friday.  The technician was at my moms house by 8 am and worked all day and by 5 pm, the same day, my mom was calling and crying, because of the warmth.  I will never be able to repay the generosity of Tina and Brown heating, in Hueytown.  But, we will be paying it forward whenever we are able.  Thank you so much for everything you’ve done for me and my family.
Meredith Thigpen

text: I could not say enough wonderful things about Brown Heating an Cooling the quality of service I received. Their technicians are knowledgable, skilled, courteous, efficient and contentious concerning the cleanliness of my home and the quality of air being put out by my HVAC unit. Call them now if you are having HVAC issues or even for routine maintenance.

resp.text: Thank you Jamie!

name: McCormick L.K. (k2)
text: A great experience; talented and courteous  staff. Clearly a team atmosphere!!!

resp.text: Thank you McCormick!

name: Victor Barber
text: Courteous and efficient, I would definitely use them again

resp.text: Thank you Victor!

name: Kimberly Dye
text: Always great speedy service

resp.text: Thank you Kimberly for the great review! We are so glad to hear that you had a great experience with Brown. We train hard to make sure our team operates efficiently—glad to know it’s working! We appreciate your business and look forward to serving your HVAC needs in the future.

name: Steve Loyd
text: Helpful, patient, super nice, very thorough.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to write this kind review! We are so happy you enjoyed your service.

name: Jean Turner
text: Service was very detailed and professional.

resp.text: Thank you Jean! We appreciate you!

name: jean-jacques Beaussart
text: excellent services - thank you !!!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to write this kind review! We are so happy you enjoyed your service.

name: Brittany W
text: Prices are outrageous. $250 to take a shop vac and clear the drain line; literally all the work that was performed. Be sure to call around and compare prices before electimg a company.

resp.text:
Brittany - Thank you for your feedback. We reached out to you to clarify the full scope of the services you received, but we have not been able to reach you.
Our technician properly diagnosed your system and stopped the water leak you were experiencing. He inspected the system again to confirm there were no other problems. He also changed the filter.
We are disappointed you are not satisfied with the work performed. Please call our office so we can search for a way to make this right.

name: curtis jones
text: Technician was prompt and professional

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to write this kind review! We are so happy you enjoyed your service.

name: Randy Pounds
text: Very Professional and Courteous

resp.text: Thank you Randy!

name: Sweetest Melissa
text: Prompt, Professional, and Personable!

resp.text: Thank you Melissa for the great review! We are so glad to hear that you had a great experience with Brown. We train hard to make sure our team operates efficiently—glad to know it’s working! We appreciate your business and look forward to serving your HVAC needs in the future.

name: jeffery hope
text: Great job!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to write this kind review! We are so happy you enjoyed your service.

name: Gloria D. Robinson
text: Excellent service!

resp.text: We appreciate your continued business! Thanks Gloria

name: Kay
text: Sarah was very professional and thorough. She exceeded my expectations. I recommend Brown Heating & Cooling. Excellent customer service!

name: Darral Simmons
text:
Called this company and booked an appointment weeks out. Talked to Paul in detail about what my problem was. He described the zone control system that they could install.
I confirmed appointment the day before, I also called the day they were supposed to come out. Finally had the owner call and tell me that don’t fool with this anymore. So I rearranged my day for a visit they never intended to make, and did not communicate until I called them to confirm when they would arrive.

name: larry moore
text: Excellent service they were their own time perfect service

name: Rosemary Watson
text: Thank you Smokey for coming to our rescue after hours. You were so nice and professional! Our new unit had stopped working and you fixed it quickly. Thank you again. We recommend Comfort Solutions in Foley  for great service!

resp.text: Thank you Rosemary, we'll pass the message to Smokey!

name: Matt Callaway
text: Two workers came out from Comfort Solutions due to the a/c not working in the condo. I couldn't explain what the problem was without one of the workers telling me it was not the unit, but the door open on the patio. After trying and trying to explain it was the door, he then came up with another excuse. They literally spent less than 5 minutes, left, charged for the repair visit, and of course, no a/c all day. I should have known they were not trust worthy after reading all of the other reviews.

resp.text: Hey Matt, we care deeply about our customers. We would like to get some additional details about your experience. If you are willing, please contact us at 251-967-4822.

name: Martin Stewart
text: I called at 7 AM to make a appointment and the person that helped me said that they did not know if they service my area but would have someone call me. Three hours later i called them back and they said we are sorry but we no longer service that area. I should not had to wait that long to find that out, now i have too wait three days until someone can come out to fix my a.c. in 90+ weather. They were nice and let vent about them and last time they came to my house the service was great.

name: Angel Harris
text:
Fast, reliable, friendly service! Came out to repair our unit at 9:00 PM on a Friday no extra cost.
When it was time to replace our unit we got the same service at a reasonable price.

name: Randall Loden
text: Called them about 7 pm on Monday sept 30 by 7:30 they were at my door and repaired my ac I give them 5 stars and didn’t charge a after hours charge thank you very much

resp.text: Thank you, Randall!

name: Kathy Saxon
text: Thank you so much , ordered the part , got the part and was repaired before bedtime . Had our grandchildren for the night so this was very important to us . Thanks so much , I highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, Kathy!

name: Marilyn Oulliber
text: Great Service and thank you for the job well done!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Marilyn!

name: Becki Kemp
text: The technician was at my house within 30 minutes on a Saturday no less, spent 15 minutes diagnosing the problem which was a bad motor and had my heat pump cooling within the hour, no "after hours fee" either. Total cost was $165. And he threw in a cup of bleach for mildew.Great service

name: Williamson Orlop
text: If your air conditioning is out and you want to bake alive for days and days, give these guys a call.  Horrible customer service.  Avoid at all costs.

name: J Stuckey
text: Fast and friendly people! Can fix anything!!! I will always use them.

name: Bloaty PizzaHog
text: Not a service review but for being an HVAC location will not sell parts needed without having a tech install. Makes since in some ways but for a part that isnt carried by lowes and doesnt require opening the system, therefore DIY not friendly

name: Billy Munsell
text: Prompt and polite. Great service!

name: Chad Schulz
text: Extremely professional and knowledgeable, will be using them again.

name: Good Citizen (Good Citizen)
text:
Very disorganized dispatch. Very poor customer service.
Stay away!

name: Lance Wilder
text: Uncooperative on the phone.. didn't get any service.. but they were polite

name: John Littbeach
text: Great company.

name: annette bucci
text: Great service

resp.text: Thank you, Annette!

name: Joel Banyai
text: In the past few months I've had work done and sent multiple friends to this shop. They've fixed cars other shops won't touch (or messed up), and saved my friends and I a ton of money. We all know warranty work doesn't pay the bills, but when an alternator they had rebuilt and installed failed, they had a new alternator swapped in the next morning. On another repair they offered a good used part they had on hand for much cheaper instead of charging for a brand new part. Another car had a strange symptom; they correctly diagnosed two cascading failures up the line and fixed everything. If a repair isn't going to be cost effective, they'll tell you that too.  I'm extremely pleased. You won't go wrong going here.

name: Lisa P
text: Quick service. Great price.

name: Jane Knauss
text: Very nice and knowledgeable. Quick turnaround and reasonable prices. Highly recommend!

name: Alexandria Haley
text: This man does an amazing job with rewiring...

name: Ikram Singh
text:
I think they did a pretty decent/good job on my windshield wipers and front window rotor. Had the car ready the very next day. The guy is a PROFESSIONAL but I think I was OVERLY CHARGED !!
If it was not for the HIGH CHARGE I would definitely visit this place again.

resp.text: We appreciate your business and we believe our prices are very competitive.

name: Josh Knowling
text: I recently took my truck to Russell Brothers with a tricky electrical issue that had persisted despite previous mechanic's best efforts.  I was skeptical at first that a solution would be reached.  Initially, Russell Brothers did fail in their first attempt at correcting it, despite having replaced expensive components.  However, after a couple of return trips, their persistence paid off and they expertly diagnosed and ultimately corrected the issue for good.  I would like to thank technician 'Jim' in particular in showing great integrity, reaching out to me when he knew the issue was not correctly repaired.  Will used their service again in the future, as well as recommend it to others. Thanks fellas!

resp.text: Thank you Josh! We truly appreciate you taking the time for the awesome review!

name: jdblackbelt
text: I have been bringing my vehicles here for service and maintenance for 10 years now. They regularly charge me half what the dealership has quoted me for the same job. They're always busy (as people have caught on they do phenomenal work for fair prices), so sometimes you'll have to wait an extra day for your vehicle, but you'll always save money. Jim and Robbie have always taken care of me, know me by name, and only recommend repairs and maintenance on what's necessary. There's a reason they've been in business since the 70's. Can't recommend them highly enough.

resp.text: That is so very special that you that the time to write such a wonderful review. We appreciate you taking your time to give us such a kind and thoughtful review. Sincerely, thanks so very much!

name: Elizabeth Henson
text: Easy to schedule with, did the work for what they said it would be, and what they said it would be was MUCH less than the dealership quoted.  This is the second time we've had work done there and they've got our business if we need something else done.

name: alicia perez
text: Best place to get my truck fixed. I took my truck in at approximately 12:30 and they were done by 3:00. Excellent prices, friendly guys, really smart. They know what they are doing and are honest to their prices. They are awesome all around. We will continue to keep taking our vehicles there.

resp.text: Thanks so much!!!

name: Jake Self
text: Had to return a few times but they was kinda working me in I still recommend them. Let me clarify this statement instead of changing it. When I say return a few times I mean too fix several problems. Only once was something unfinished properly on my alternator/battery, and had to have it towed back. No extra charge but I did feel that they should've covered the TOW TAG.😂😂😭👌🤘👍✌️

name: Robert Robb
text: Charged me $400 to fix a bad wire going to the AC clutch (no parts).  At $85/hour that means it took them almost 5 hrs to fix.  I had looked at the problem before I brought the car in and had narrowed it down to the AC clutch so I asked when i pick it up if it was on the ground or power side.  He wouldn't tell me .  When I looked under the car I could see where they used a wire jumper like whats used for connecting trailer lights to connect to another ground wire that must have been good.  I had expected 2 to 3 hundred but with the mechanic refusing to answer a simple question left me questioning.

name: Jovan Coates
text: Russell Brothers Auto is the best repair shop in this city hands down.  I have been having my vehicles serviced there for over ten years.  They have kept things running that others have said could not be fixed, or a dealership suggests that it's time to purchase another vehicle.   They work on any make and model of vehicle and can perform any type of maintenance from fluid changes, up to engine replacement.  The staff is friendly and the service top notch.  They have always had my vehicles ready the same day I drop them off.  The value cannot be beat.  They do not suggest needless services just to pad an invoice, if your car is not running or something electrical doesn't work, they will immediately get to the heart of the problem and take care of it.  They stand by their work and I will wholeheartedly recommend to anyone if you need your car repaired take it to Russell Brothers, you won't be disappointed.

resp.text: Thanks so kindly!!!

name: LiqwdE Teryx 4LE (LiqwdE)
text: So far so good. Very understanding. They helped budget my repairs into 3 visit depending on severity of problems. As long as people remember most problems can't be solved same day. Good mechanics, not miracle workers!

resp.text: Appreciate you very much. Thank you for being our customer!

name: Briana Wright
text:
If I could rate it at half a star I would. Avoid this place like the Ebola.
Though Ebola Might be easier to deal with than these clowns.
* NO Communication.
* NO Realistic estimate.
* NO Time frame for repairs to be completed.
* NO Call to authorize ordering of expensive parts.
* NO Friendly service, in fact, acted as if simple questions were a bother to answer, and indeed were NOT answered.

In the End I had my Car towed away to take to elsewhere.. where the car was fixed, and on the road the next day, for the same price as I was charged by these yahoos for ripping apart my dashboard.

name: Thomas Taylor
text:
These guys will fix those cars that no one else will even touch. They repair a Porsche Cayenne (a real PIB to fix) to a 20 year old beater that most would charge more than the car is worth.

The guy that was crabbing about his experience...., If you say "Fix it!" they will fix it. If you say tell me what is wrong and how much, then they will do that as well. BTW, it cost $$ to diagnose and this is sometimes the most expensive part of a repair. Communication is key and it goes both ways.

These guys are about the only honest ones left. They are so good that many dealers around town bring their used cars to them because their own mechanics can neither fix nor diagnose what is wrong with them. Or maybe they just don't want to get their hands dirty!
Jim and his guys will get greasy and keep you on the road!

resp.text: Kind words and much appreciated!

name: Russell Patten
text: Great repair facility. Will go back there again in future if needed. Very helpful and knowledgeable

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words and for being our customer!

name: James Bowker
text: Best place to take your car or truck. Real nice people who don't B.S you. 💘

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review. It is very appreciated!

name: david huey
text: People misdiagnosed my car after I TOLD them what was wrong. Then offered the correct repair for slightly above market value. Gee, thanks but no thanks. Take your car here if you enjoy wasting money

resp.text: We are unsure how to respond since there are no details. Please either post the information or call us and we can address your concerns.

name: chris denton
text: Excellent work! They are top notch mechanics and do excellent elecrical work also. They are straight up and will not take advantage of you.

resp.text: Thanks so much!!

name: z ten
text: I asked for a quote for two sides. I was given a price. I asked if that was the price for both sides. He said yes. Later, after already doing one side, he tells me that it was the price for one side and questioned if I wanted the other side done. I said I would pay for both sides if they took care of the alignment. He said they would. I got the vehicle, immediately noticed the horrible alignment, had it inspected, and was told that the alignment was, as I suspected, terrible.

name: Andrew Self
text: Always quick and direct with addressing the issues you have with your vehicle. Had a much wider skill set than other shops in the area.

resp.text: Thanks so much!!!!

name: brent dutton
text: Knowledgable staff. Fast & courteous

resp.text: Thanks so very much for being our customer and taking the time to give us a very nice review!

name: kristi gibbons
text: We've had one good experience with these folks and two bad ones. They have some skilled electrical technicians capable of figuring out difficult electrical issues. Unfortunately, the company WILL take advantage of you financiallly given the opportunity. They failed to honor a warranty on a part they replaced. Another time they overcharged for correcting an easily diagnosable connection problem in the ignition system. No parts were replaced, probably less than an hour of labor was involved, and the bill was a few hundred dollars. When I politely questioned them on the bill, the guy became agitated, tried to change the subject, explained how I was lucky they didn't charge much more to get my car back.

name: T. Barnes
text: I've been using Russell Brothers for 25 years.  Always fair and very good at Auto Electric repairs.

resp.text: Thanks so very much! We appreciate your patronage truly.

name: Trevor Tate
text: I only take my car to these guys, there the best in the business and if you have some type of wiring or computer issues with your vehicle take it to these guys

resp.text: Thank you! Thank you!

name: Malcolm Smith
text: Does a great job and does it right the first time.

resp.text: Thanks so very much for your kind words! Please let us know anything that pleases you or displeases you and we will always try to be better.

name: billy Allen
text: They fixed the problems and I got it back the next day. Replaced wiper motor, rebuilt alternator and air filter

resp.text: Thank you so much for the wonderful review! We appreciate it so much!

name: Vincent vashel
text: made the mistake of telling them I was from out of town, my original quote was $700. I thought a little high, but when I went to pick my car up it was $3200. & they totally screw up my 4 wheel drive said they didn't know anything about 4 wheel drive. can you say rip-off

name: Ed Hood
text: Best Shop in Town. They'll fix it! Been using them over 15 years!

resp.text: Thanks Ed!

resp.text: Thanks so much.

name: Joan Marie
text: Hidden jewel in Huntsville Alabama. BAM!

resp.text: Thank you so much!!!

name: Patrick Pezzano
text: Great people to deal with if you have any auto. Electrical problems this is the place to go.

resp.text: Thanks for taking your time for this wonderful review and for being our customer!

name: Debra VanHeiden
text: Always a fair price and good service

resp.text: It is so kind, thank you so very much!

name: Stephen Eyma
text: Those guys did a great job at a reasonable price. Hats off Russell Bros!

resp.text: Hats off to the great review! Thank you.

text: Good

resp.text: Thanks so much Ms. Harris!
