text: The worst people in the world to work on your car please stay away if you do not want trouble

name: donald peoples
text: Very helpful

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words and being our customer!

name: John Fletcher
text:
The get it done place
If nobody else can I bet they can!

resp.text: Thanks so much!

name: CJ AUTOMOTIVE HANDWASHANDDETAIL,LLC
text: Great service

name: Furlough Wrecker Service
text: Awesome Service and Fast

resp.text: Thanks so much!!

name: Corey Bartlett
text: Call ahead of time for estimate on installing a manifold intake and throttle body was give a 300$ estimate and a date(2-23-16) to drop it off dropped it off 5 hrs(9am-2pm) for them 2 call me back and tell me it would cost 500$ not the 300$ estimate i was given over the phone.

name: Michelle Cooper
text: I have been a customer for almost 5 years.  Valley Heating and Cooling are always responsive and professional.  Adam M. was exceptionally great!  He ensured that everything was working properly and even waited after the work was complete to make sure that everything was working before he left.  Adam was professional and definitely knew what he was doing!  Great experience!

name: Daniel Carlile
text: Gerald R, Vance K, and Brandon B are the best. On time, hard working, polite, and respectful. The experience these guys display is unmistakable. They completely removed my old Heat Pump system and AC unit and replaced them with a Bigger, Better, Faster 96% efficient Furnace and 16 Seer AC unit in just two days. Also installed a Honeywell Wi-Fi Thermostat and replaced old 16 inch Air Flow tubing with Larger 20 inch product. These guys know what they are doing, and got right to it. Thanks so much guys. You're the best.

name: Beverly Walker
text:
I have used Valley Heating and. Cooling for 20 plus years and have always been extremely pleased with their service. On 3/8/21 they installed a new Trane Split Heat Pump System for me. They were extremely professional and courteous and very knowledgeable. They kept me totally informed about the installation. My installers were Brandon B, Vance K, Jacob A, and Sean M.  The entire team were outstanding and hauled off the old equipment and cleaned up everything when the job was completed. I absolutely highly recommend Valley Heating and Cooling and their staff.
Beverly W

name: Bryant Hudson
text: I realized my AC had stopped blowing. I immediately called Valley and that same day they sent Kevin J to determine the issue. After discussing some options, we decided upon the best course of action. Kevin was very knowledgeable and gave me the pros and cons of the options. The very next morning, Brandon B and Vance K arrived. They provided me advance notice of their arrival time. While here, they kept me updated and were very respectful. They did not use any bad language. Once the installation was complete, they cleaned up after themselves and took time to go over how to use the new thermostat. I really appreciated their professionalism and will use Valley again if there is a need.

name: Zach Linley
text:
Installed a new A/C unit in 24 hours. All workers were professional and cleaned everything up before they left. Answered any questions I had as well. Brandon B. came back out after installation to put the correct breaker in while my infant was napping and the worker was very quiet and respectful of my child. Tiptoed around while working to not bother my sleeping child. Once he was finished he showed me all of my thermostats features as well.
Workers- Brandon B, Vance K, CJ, and Clay.

name: Ange Linley
text: I was at my son’s house when the technician had to come and work on their unit. Brandon was very courteous and considerate when the baby was asleep working quietly so as not to wake him. He was knowledgeable of the job that needed to be done and he provided education on how to work the thermostat. I would rate the experience as a 10/10.

name: Tina Hill
text: My four year old AC unit was not cooling. Adam came today and replaced the leaking coils in the attic. He was so knowledgeable, professional, friendly, and helpful. He’s the best that has ever come out to check my unit. I couldn’t be more pleased.

name: Starlord Stavanger
text: My family has been using Valley for over a year now and never had any issues with them. Always show up when they say. Always able to answer any questions we have. Always been very polite and professional. We've had issues on and off with our A/C unit that is older than time itself. Long story slightly less long, that unit died and Valley got us a new unit, new system, installation, and everything all within just a few short days. Thankfully this didn't happen in the middle of July, oh my! Amazing service hands down. Thank you to all the installers that were stuck in our house for two days giving my family an amazing A/C system. Special thanks to Blake A, Jeff M, Brandon B, Andrew J, Vance K, and John M, appreciate all the work you guys did for us. Keep it classy, keep it cool! 10/10, would use this company again.

name: Larry Haynes
text: Could not be more pleased from the estimate to signing off on the installation. Brandon B, Vance K, Jeff R and John M were excellent from the moment they introduced themselves until driving off.  Instilled confidence in me throughout the process. Professional, courteous, knowledgeable. I can't say enough, especially regarding Brandon and Vance. I highly recommend Valley Heating and Cooling.

name: David Flowers
text: Andrew and David replaced my upstairs unit and went above and beyond during the process.  They noted where the original install could have completely isolated the unit from the hot attic, and recommended I seal that off to make the unit run better.  They were on time, professional and got along great with my dogs.

name: Cassandra Morris
text: The whole experience was great. Gerald came out and explained everything to me and set up the work crew. The work was started the next day. Brandon B and Vance K were friendly, knowledgable and efficient. They made sure everything was done right, kept me informed throughout the installation and explained the entire system to me. They made sure I didn't have any questions several times. They left everything spotless.  Thankful for such a positive experience. Glad I chose Valley Heating and Cooling!

name: Kelly Stewart
text: I highly recommended Valley Heating and Cooling.  Their service tech Joel, arrived quickly during the coldest day of the winter and gave me honest advice no other company had given me in the 12 years I owned my old unit.  Vance K., Brandon B, and John M. came and installed new unit and made sure I knew every detail of my my new unit.  Thank you for your great customer service!

name: Robert Oldroyd
text: You can't get better than the Team at VH&C. David and Kevin, the duct guys, did a fantastic, high quality job and the service tech Kevin followed up and got the unit running. Very high standards from all of them.

name: Mary Bowen
text: They were extremely nice and professional . Kevin J came explained everything and answered all our concerns.  Brando B, VanceK, and David H.  Worked hard all day, going into a hot attic, removing old unit and replacing it.  They were all polite and respectful.  When they finished, they cleaned everything and hauled it away.  We are very happy with everything, so thanks to them!

name: Courtney Rains
text: Called on a Friday evening and they were here and had my AC going in just a matter of a couple hours. Adam was super professional and explained what the problem was. Definitely went above and beyond. They will be my first call should I ever need anymore service done.

name: StylesGG
text: Adam came out and told me exactly what has been going on with my unit. Very professional and knowledgeable. Will definitely be doing business with them in the near future.

name: Megan Lackey
text: When I worked for a local business in Decatur,  Adam Mason of Valley came out and replaced our unit. We had been a couple weeks without heat and were using portable heaters.  He explained everything clearly to our boss and had us up and going in no time. He was very knowledgeable and helpful about the unit and answered all of our questions. I would highly recommend their service and Adam as your technician.

name: Don Hardeman
text:
We can't say enough good about this company and the very professional employees. Servicemen Alex T. and Tyler E., and installation crew Brandon B., Vance K., John M., and Jeff R. all seems like members of our family now.  We would and have welcomed them into our home for installation and maintenance  of our HVAC units.  Valley started doing regular maintenance on our units twice a year, several years ago and we have since had absolutely no unforeseen issues arise.  They call to schedule their arrival and do a thorough examination of the units, even including washing them, and have on occasion alerted us to a weak or failed component.  They make the repair and the units have been running without problems for years now.  No more desperate calls for repair on the hottest or coldest day of the year.

We highly recommend Valley Heating and Cooling.

P.S.  Even our dog Truman loves these guys.

name: Todd Blalock
text: Fantastic organization! Professional, courteous and respond fast!  From Fabian responding same day to diagnose and repair my AC so it would run a few more months....to Brandon B. and Vance K. installing a new package unit and a complicated install of a split unit in my shop/garage, a great experience and so very glad I called Valley to do this work. You will not be disappointed.  One of the very few companies that do what they say and say what they do!!!  Thanks to all of you!!

name: Bethany Shelnut
text: Our installers Brandon B and Vance K did a wonderful job on our unit! Explained everything thoroughly after they had finished and even while they were installing, very patient with my eight year old curious son! Highly recommend these guys!

name: Mariann Wilson
text: Kevin J, Tyler E, Brandon B, Sean M, and Jack C worked efficiently, honestly  and were very reliable. We needed work done on the Saturday of Easter weekend and they were there and happily ready to work. We’ve been customers for five years and have always had excellent service.

name: Pamela Hodges
text: Valley Heating and cooling is awesome! I recommend them highly! My unit went out and the company that put my air handler in supposedly fixed it, but it was still not cooling. I called them and told them, which I remind you that my part was still under warranty and they did not come back to fix the issue and they didn’t call me back! I called Valley Heating and cooling and they told me they would come out to check it at no charge. Kevin James came out and diagnose my issue immediately! I had to have a coil replaced, plus the compressor had went! He told me it could be fixed, but he was honest an upfront and told me that it would be best that I replace the unit and my husband and I totally agreed because we been living in our home for 17  years and was told that the unit we had would only last for 5. Everyone was very professional and nice and all that played a part in installing my unit was excellent! From installing the unit, installing the duct work and installing a mini split! They all exceeded my expectations! I can’t remember everyone’s name, but Gerald,Vance K, Brandon B, and Sean M and the rest you know who you are, they were all very professional and so nice and the took time and explained everything with ease! Thank y’all for taking the time and  being so considerate! I really appreciate y’all’s business! Mr and Mrs Pamela Hodges

name: Gary Turner
text: Great service and team. Special thanks to Brandon B and Vance K for great and professional installation of the new HVAC unit. Also thanks to Alex T in sales for the great deal and the various options I could choose from. I highly recommend Valley for your HVAC needs.

name: Melissa Parker
text: Brandon B, Vance K and AL did a fantastic job replacing 2 HVACs! They were very polite, professional and knowledgeable. I really appreciate how patient they were with all of my questions and that they pointed out lots of other things I should have inspected in our new-to-us lake home. They were very sweet with my kids and pets as well. Great guys and company! Highly recommend!

name: Keith Childers
text: I wanted to express how satisfied I am with the installation of my new air conditioning system by Valley Heating and cooling. This was a complete replacement, including ductwork. I cannot thank Vance Kanaday and Brandon Brewer enough for their efforts. They were courteous, professional, and conveyed integrity which was greatly valued. Their attention to detail, communication and overall quality of work was no less than outstanding. I am so grateful for this as I work from home and this will greatly improve my day-to-day life. To everyone at Valley, Brandon and Vance, thank you so much!

name: Susan “Susan”
text:
We were extremely pleased with Valley Heating and Cooling.  The quality of our new system is excellent.  The warranty is exceptional.
Vance K, Brandon B and Gerald R were awesome to work with.  They were extremely polite, professional.  They explained everything in detail.
Very, very good experience.  We highly recommend them!

name: Nicole Swafford
text: Kevin J. came out to my home to do my annual HVAC service/maintenance. He was very professional and knowledgeable, making sure I knew exactly what problems my unit was having and all the options available to me. Turns out, I needed a new unit, in which Brandon B. and Vance K. came 2 days later to install. This was by far my best experience with any company. These guys made sure they explained everything to me thoroughly. Even after encountering a small issue, they stayed until the job was done right! Also, they went above and beyond to make sure I had plenty of a very hard to find filter. I wish I could hire these guys to do the remodel on my house! I would definitely recommend.

name: michael mcdonald
text: Brandon B. and Vance K. did a very good job.  We are very happy with the work they did.  We have used Valley Heating and Cooling in the past for our other home, and we will continue to use them in the future.  We also recommend them to anyone needing any heating and cooling work done.

name: Linda Brandon
text: Matt cleaned and serviced both units and did such a thorough job.  He saved my unit from stress and saved me $ in making the units run more efficiently.

name: Deonte Rivera
text: The heating system at my grandmothers house has been out for  about a week called multiple companies to come out and service her equipment nobody can get it up and running. Call Valley heating and cooling they came out they were on time they ensure that the system is was up and running properly before leaving and just delivered an outstanding service I do want to thank personally Andy and Joel for ensuring that my grandmother was properly taken care of Valley heating and cooling has my business for life!

name: Starlord Stavanger
text: My family has been using Valley for over a year now and never had any issues with them. Always show up when they say. Always able to answer any questions we have. Always been very polite and professional. We've had issues on and off with our A/C unit that is older than time itself. Long story slightly less long, that unit died and Valley got us a new unit, new system, installation, and everything all within just a few short days. Thankfully this didn't happen in the middle of July, oh my! Amazing service hands down. Thank you to all the installers that were stuck in our house for two days giving my family an amazing A/C system. Special thanks to Blake A, Jeff M, Brandon B, Andrew J, Vance K, and John M, appreciate all the work you guys did for us. Keep it classy, keep it cool! 10/10, would use this company again.

name: Don Cole
text: Received the yearly service on our system today in Cullman by the technician Alex. Very prompt, good job, good guy.

name: Pamela Robinson
text: Adam m is absolutly wonderful . he has answered any questions ive had and made sure i was always taken care of he is a true asset to this company .

name: Jordan Coomes
text: 10/10 would recommend! Valley heating and cooling are amazing at everything they do. From my service tech Fabian to all my wonderful installers Brandon B, Vance K, Kyler, and Clint R. They all went above and beyond. They answered all my questions and gave me all knowledge I needed to know about my new HVAC system. I highly recommend them for anyone in need!

name: Brae Priesing
text: Adam is a true professional and very helpful. His knowledge really shows and he answers all of your questions and concerns. Great work and reasonable prices with great communication.

name: Steve Brennemann
text: Technician, Tyler E,  did a great job servicing my HVAC systems (for the second year). This year, Tyler found several issues with the aging systems and was very professional in reviewing the repair costs.  Due to high repair costs on the aging systems and a few other factors, I decided to replace two HVAC systems.  To my surprise, the install team was able and scheduled to start the next day.  Andrew J., Sean M. and David H. arrived the next morning, completed one install that day and the second unit the next day.  They were all very professional, did a great job, and completed the install in a very timing manner.  My experience indicates Valley HVAC service is second to none.  Steve B.

name: Elijah Creel
text: Vance K, and Brandon B are the best.  Very professional and knowledgable.

name: Matthew Cooper
text: Adam mason was awesome and very nice . He did a great job !

name: Matthew Cooper
text: Adam mason was awesome and very nice . He did a great job !

name: Carol Dehollander
text: CJ, Kevin, Lance and Clay installed a new HVAC unit for me and they were terrific! They arrived on time and stayed all day until the job was done. They were courteous and professional! Couldn't  have asked for better service!

name: Joslyn parchman
text: Clay and CJ did an exceptional job in replacing my unit. They were On Time & Courteous. Not only that but they wore their mask the entire time which was very respectful for my safety and theirs.  Thanks guys.

name: Kay Moore
text: I had a great experience. Kevin J was my service tech. Brandon B and Vance K were my installers for my new unit.  They were both extremely professional, very informative, and had my new unit up and going quick. I HIGHLY recommend this company. They are the best.

name: vince sherrill
text:
The guys from Valley Heating and Cooling were very professional and did a fantastic job installing a new unit in my home. They actually came out on a Saturday and performed the service, when the temps were below freezing. I can't say enough about their service and professionalism.  John Mcminn, Kevin F, and Jeff R got the job done in a timely matter and explained all the details needed on my new unit. I'm very satisfied with the work they performed, and will be calling Valley Heating and Cooling with all of my service needs.
Thanks guys!

name: Pat Compton
text:
I've used Valley before at my other house about 15 years ago and they were always prompt and did exactly what they said, so back in January I was getting quotes on a hvac with a complete installation of the whole nine yards for my new house. They were not the cheapest but past experience I had with them I got them to do it. On 1/15/21 they sent out a crew of 2 and started it took them till 1/22/21 to finish. This crew did not do as asked to do as far as what I wanted done, I called valley back to get them to fix the issues and they sent the 2 same guys back out, I assumed everything was fine except for the pad until I went under the house to do some more work and I realized that they didn't fix the problems right. I got back ahold of them and let them know. The service manager said that he would send another crew out to resolve the issue's and apologized for the inconvenience. On 4/28/21 4 guys showed up with one mission in mind and that was to make all the repairs necessary to  my satisfaction which they did, I'm going to call them the A Team which consisted of Vance K, Brandon B, C. J. and Clay P.
If I ever need to have any other hvac installs or work on my other houses I will still go back to valley even after the bad experience I had with this one, which is the result of someone not wanting to be proud of their workmanship which does not represent the workmanship and ethics of Valley Heating and Cooling. Thanks again to the service manager Jeremy for sending the A Team.
.

name: Judy Welborn
text:
Kevin J,  Brandon B,  Vance K, and Sean M were all very professional, informative, and so very courteous.  They did an outstanding job installing my unit and explaining how to use it.
I am extremely satisfied with their work today.

name: Kim McCartt
text: CJ & Clay installed our heating system. They were able to install our unit in a days notice! We will be warm tonight! Thanks guys!

name: Abby Myrex
text: Hands down best customer service & never over charge. Service guy Tyler is also great!!!

name: Diane Cothren
text:
Our crawlspace duct work was 40+ years old.....Valley Heating and Cooling
had the best price to 100% replace with new all rigid duct work.  They
arrived on time and worked hard all day every day till the job was complete.
My wife and I are very satisfied that we chose them for this important
house upgrade.  Many thanks to C.J., Clay, Andrew and Sean !!!!!

Mike and Diane Cothren

name: Abby Myrex
text: Hands down best customer service & never over charge. Service guy Tyler is also great!!!

name: Dre Cross
text: A big waist of my time and money .. I wouldn’t recommend this place for anybody .. take your money some where else .

name: Trey Ward
text: Several people in town referred me to Valley for their professionalism and high quality of work. I was not disappointed. Adam M was very clear in evaluating the repairs for my system and went over all my options. I never felt rushed or pressured. Brandon B and Vance K were phenomenal installers, going above and beyond. The quality of their work was the best I've ever seen. I definitely recommend them to anyone needing HVAC work done.

name: Sue Maske
text: i would like to thank all of the GREAT people that came to our rescue when our 18 year old system was about to bite the dust on one of the coldest days this year. Thank you Kevin for navigating the maze of joists to access and diagnose all of the issues that were causing problems. Thank you to Brandon and Vance for spending the day with us to properly install and remove the existing unit and the trash left behind from previous contractor, they kept us updated throughout the entire process, made sure we were comfortable, and schooled us on proper usage to get the most from the new system. Brandon and Vance were so friendly and professional, they even took time to love on our girls (four legged) Gidget and Junebug, you cant get better than this!! I would give them 20 stars if possible! Thank you again :)

name: Kelly Branigan
text: I'm very satisfied with all the service Valley Heating and Cooling provided. My heater gave out and with little notice in the afternoon, they had me back-up and running the next day with a totally new HVAC system. Installers, Brandon B., Vance K, and Andrew J, were very professional, friendly, and answered all my questions (I had many).Also Covid-19 aware .They also cleaned-up very well after the job was completed.  Very happy !

name: danielle brown
text: Great company with fair prices and prompt service. Adam is always professional and provides quality work. I would definitely recommend this company for all of your heating and cooling needs.

name: Pam Keenum
text: Brandon B and Vance K were so professional and so knowledgeable. Highly recommend Valley H&C.

name: Daniel Lee
text: Everyone was very helpful and professional, from the person I spoke with when making the appointment, to Adam who did the initial visit, and Brandon, John and Vance who installed the unit. They did a great job of keeping us informed and explaining the process through out the job. They got our new unit installed in one day and were very respectful of our property.

name: Cassandra Thomas
text: Adam came out to check our HVAC unit he was very thorough in his inspection. He explained in detail the issues that our unit was having and answered all of our questions. We determined that our unit needed to be replaced.  He went over all of the options that were available to us. Then within 24 hours he sent out CJ and Clay to replace our unit. They did an excellent job and had it done in 1 day. The service provided by these technicians was outstanding.  I would highly recommend Valley Heating and Cooling for all of your HVAC needs.   To me, service is just as important as price and they definitely knocked it out of the park on this one.

name: Sue Holmes
text:
My unit was not cooling and I called Valley Heating and Cooling. They had installed my unit a couple of years ago. The service technician, Alex Thornton was quick to respond and had my unit back up and running in a short period of time. He was so professional and explained everything to me. Valley has the most wonderful group of technicians. They are always very professional and prompt. Highly recommend Valley Heating and Cooling.
Amanda Stancil.

name: Sue Holmes
text:
My unit was not cooling and I called Valley Heating and Cooling. They had installed my unit a couple of years ago. The service technician, Alex Thornton was quick to respond and had my unit back up and running in a short period of time. He was so professional and explained everything to me. Valley has the most wonderful group of technicians. They are always very professional and prompt. Highly recommend Valley Heating and Cooling.
Amanda Stancil.

name: Kathy DeMellier
text: The team at Valley Heating and Cooling was exceptional!  They installed three units in our home.  Brandon B., Vance K., Kyler D., C.J., Tyler E., Sean M., and Clint R. were an incredible crew.  They were extremely professional, reliable, knowledgeable and easy to work with.  The team leader did a great job communicating with us throughout the entire process.  They took great pride in their work and went above and beyond. I would highly recommend them without hesitation.  Thank you for the exceptional work!

name: Kate Namie
text: Great experience! Adam was very helpful in coming out quickly, determining our AC issues, and explaining our options to us. We decided to get a new unit, and Kyler, Jameson, and their crew did an awesome and thorough job and were very professional throughout the installation. Highly recommend Valley Heating and Cooling!

name: Janet Sullivan
text: I've been using Valley for years!  The contactor on my unit went out and Adam had to come out and replace them.  He also noticed that my heat strips were put in the wrong way and he fixed that also.  Adam is very knowledgeable and was very, very nice!  I'd recommend Valley Heating and Cooling to anyone and I would also recommend Adam Mason as their service technician!

name: Rhonda Johnson
text: Our AC unit was not cooling and I called Valley Heating and Cooling. They sent a tech within a hour. Kevin confirmed that we needed a new unit. He gave us several option to choose from. Kyler and Trevon came to install the new unit. They were very friendly, polite and professional. They never complained about the heat in the attic and worked the whole time.  They made sure everything was working properly before leaving. Big thanks to Kevin, Kyler and Trevon.  I highly recommend these guys from Valley Heating and Cooling for their awesome service.

name: Lilly Koerner
text: My house was freezing cold when my 33 year old furnace quit.   They were terrific from the first phone call until they walked out with my new system heating my house.   Everyone was kind and professional.    They worked until nearly 9 pm to get everything running and heat back in my house.   They were fast and efficient.    Thank you so much!

name: Beth Hales
text: Adam did an excellent job of explaining to me the situation and he quickly got my system working again!

name: Martie Robison
text: Valley Heating and Cooling performed an inspection for my client on an older unit.The company sent Alex. The level of detail of his inspection was amazing. Not only did he inspect thoroughly, he explained his findings verbally to my client and in writing. It was the most comprehensive inspection I have seen- and Alex was able to explain in layman's terms what he saw. 10/10.

name: Amber Garcia
text: Adam Mason did wonderful service...

name: Alpharetta Tucker
text: Brandon and Vance did a great job with my air conditioner install. I could highly recommend Valley Heating and Cooling. I'm very satisfied with my experience and the level of professionalism of their team.

name: Phil Faulk
text: We have used Valley for years. They are very professional and efficient. We had a problem with our thermostat last week. Adam Mason came out and took care of the issue for us on the same day. I would definitely recommend Valley Heating and Cooling.

name: Sandy Norwood
text: Courteous, very fast service and everything was explained well.

name: George Davis
text: Jeremy, Brandon B, and Vance K worked together as a team and provide great service.  When the job was completed I was a happy customer.   They took the time to explain everything, as well as provide a professional service.  Thank you for a job well done!!!

name: T M
text: Valley Heating & cooling has been my go to HVAC for several years. They've installed Heat Pumps in three (3) of my homes. Always exemplary service and workmanship. On the rare occasion I need them to make repairs or adjustments they've jumped right on it, with perfect results. You can't go wrong with Valley HVAC

name: Brittney Maddox
text: Wonderful owners. They are Fast, efficient, Fantastic Customer Service,  and very appropriate pricing! We highly recommend  Valley Heating & Cooling!

name: Teresa Oakley
text: This was not my first time to use Valley Heating and Cooling, however it was a first installation of a new HVAC system. Shout out to Sean McGuire, Andrew Johnson and Gerald R. for the professional methods used especially during a pandemic. Not only did they provide excellent removal and installation of a new unit, but they were conscious of my health and safety. It’s not an easy task servicing the public during a world pandemic however it can be done. Thank you Valley Heating and Cooling!

name: Christy Faulk
text: Adam M. did a great job figuring out what was wrong with our unit and installed a new thermostat. We have used Valley for over 25 years and always have excellent service.

name: Lynda Gatlin
text: Our A/C went out on Friday before the Labor Day weekend.  We thought it would be the next week before we could get another installed.  Thanks to Valley we had a new unit installed on Saturday.  Their installation crew, Clint R., Jonathan M, CJ and Kevin F were all very professional and did an excellent job!

name: Corky Hill
text: Adam Mason came to my rescue, unit was blowing warm air. Adam explained  everything  that was needed and also gave a quote before repairing unit.  Great personality, great work.....will use Valley for all repairs and when its time for a new unit there will be no hesitation to call valley for a replacement unit....hopefully I can get Adam to come out. ..very knowledgeable young man.

name: Janell Hill
text:
We've had great experiences with Valley. Most recently, Brandon B., Vance K., and Gerald R. helped us replace our old unit. They all did an excellent job explaining what we were purchasing, how the install would take place, and how our new unit differed from our 30+ year old one. Brandon, Vance, Gerald, and every other tech we've had visit us are kind and courteous.
If you're looking for fast, reliable service, Valley is the place to use.

name: suzette earle
text:
This has been the hottest days of summer and our upstairs air conditioner has not been cooling efficiently because a different company installed it incorrectly.
Valley heating and cooling sent out two of the best men for the job. Installers  Brandon B. and Vance K.
They got straight to work to correct the problem and within a few hot, sweaty hours in the attic they had completely finished the job and cleaned up.
We are very pleased with the results. This is not our first time hiring Valley heating and cooling and it won’t be our last.
Thank you for such pleasant, honest and happy guys representing your company Vance K. and Brandon B.
Sincerely, Suzette Earle

name: Brandi Whitlow
text: Adam came out in a timely manner. Very professional. Would recommend Adam and this company to anyone.

name: wanda siddall
text: I had no heat.  Valley Heating and Cooling Service Technician Kevin J. inspected the unit that I had and discovered it needed replacing.  He gave me the options, prices, all information that I needed for a new heating/cooling unit.  Introduced me to the clean air systems and I choose IWave; Very happy that I did.  Professional, friendly and on scheduled time.  The installers, Brandon B. and Vance K. called before arriving as scheduled.  Very professional and friendly.  Knew and got their job done efficiently.  Cleaned up afterwards very well.  Very happy with their work!

name: Vickie Hall
text:
Same day service!!! These guys did everything to get us comfortable, they were very respectful and I will never use anyone but Valley Heating and
Cooling. The price they gave us was the price we paid even though they had to spend an extra day repairing duct work I told them to charge me for their time they refused to charge any extra. Love love love Valley.

name: Kevin Froscello
text: My unit had issues at 930PM and they came right out and had me back up and running in an hour.  Adam was friendly, professional, and very knowledgeable.  Will definitely use Valley again and request Adam!

name: Charles Horton
text: I purchased a new HVAC system from Valley Heating and Cooling and I couldn't be more pleased with the work they performed.  It was very apparent to my wife and I that this company prides itself on providing honest and thorough service to their customers.  The installers Brandon B., Vance K., Andrew J., Clint R., Kevin and our service tech Adam Mason were super professional and polite.  They discussed every step of the process with us prior to even beginning the job.  Everything went exactly as they said in a very quick and efficient manner.

name: Paula Weaver
text: Our service technician (Alex), came out to troubleshoot issues we were having with a mini-split system in our external garage.  The unit was not originally purchased at Valley and it was determined the time had come for replacement.  Alex was very thorough about my options.  I decided to purchase a new system.  The very next day the installers, Brandon B. and Vance K. arrived at 0900.  They were thorough and extremely professional during the entire installation process.  I cannot say enough positive things about my experience.  Valley also installed my house unit a few years ago and the maintenance team has been great as well.  I will be turning to them in the future for any of my HVAC needs. Great overall experience!

name: Alice Jackson
text: Adam Mason did a great job. Thorough,  on time and personable. He explained everything he was doing.

name: Ivey Drewry
text: Our old system was about to die so I called Valley hearing and cooling. Within 36 hours I had a new system in and working perfectly. The installers (Brandon B., Vance K., John M., and Jeff R.) were very professional and well informed. They explained the new features so even I understood. I would recommend them to anyone who asked. Outstanding product selection, outstanding timelines, outstanding professionals. They saved me from the heat of late July. Thank you.

name: Susan
text: This company is the BEST!  Kevin and Dustin were very professional and nice. There were 2 separate teams on 2 different days and I wish I knew the others names that came Saturday 3/21/2020 and removed the old unit and set the new one up, but I'm sure Valley Heating and Cooling knows who they are! It was a pleasure doing business with this company and I will recommend them to all friends and family who need any kind of heating and cooling work done. Thank you so much! Very happy customer!!!

name: Eric Mullins
text: Very professional. Brandon B., John M., and Lance K., installed our unit and repaired the duct. They were all very helpful and did great work.

name: Joe Betterton
text: The Valley Heating and Cooling crew responded quickly to my wife's call when our unit stopped.  They were able to install a new unit the next day working in extreme heat and later in a downpour to get us up and running.  Thx to Brandon B., Vance K., Dustin, Sean, Clint, and Fabian for a great job!

name: Carolyn Lanier
text: Kevin James was awesome. Great company

name: Daniel Bray
text: Adam Mason was very knowledgable about the current equipment and set up in our home. After discussing several options for repair or replacement, I decided a new system was what I needed. He helped me pick out a new system and it was installed the next day. Vance K and Brandon B, the installers, were on time and took great care of us during the installation. They explained everything they were doing, did a thorough check of the entire house for air flow, and cleaned up the garage and outside driveway area before leaving. I would highly recommend Valley Heating and Cooling based upon the quality of work and the employees that I interacted with!

name: My Name
text: This company is the best!  Tyler came to check our ac unit.  Since it was 20+ years old, he suggested we get a new unit.  After giving us several options, we decided to go with the one that worked for us.  No pressure to purchase.  He said the guys could be out today to install it.  Lance, Kyler and Joel were here shortly after 8 a.m.  They worked the whole time they were here.  Before leaving, Lance made sure our system was working properly.  They even cleaned up their mess!  So thankful for these guys and their professionalism.  Would highly recommend Valley Heating and Cooling!!!

name: Juanita Parrish
text: The Tech ( Adam M.) was on time and very helpful. He answered all of our questions. The Installers (Andrew J. and Blake A.) were also right on time, explained all they were doing and and did a Wonderful job! It was very nice to have work done the way it should be. Would highly recommend ALL 3 of them!

name: Ricky Peck
text: I have been using Valley H&C for the last 12 years. They have been the most responsive to any issues I have had. Their customer service and technicians professionalism are beyond reproach. Called them about an issues and within 10 minutes of the phone call late in the afternoon Alex showed up and corrected the issues with my upstairs AC. He was very professional and corrected the problem. Thanks Alex; you represented Valley H&C with professionalism and responsiveness- much appreciated.

name: Rick and Mary Kennedy
text: Brandon B and Vance K were very courteous and diligent.  Vance spent a good amount of time explaining all the ins and outs of our new HVAC unit. My husband was at work so I think Vance took  extra time to explain every detail and then showed me how to work the new thermostat.  Definitely recommend Valley Heating and Cooling. Thanks to the service tech Kevin J. for  filling me in on what would be the best way to deal with the trouble my air conditioning was having.  He was very courteous, as well.

name: Fred Pickelsimer
text: Adam Mason was knowledgeable,  Professional,  and on time. Definitely will use him again.

name: William Weaver
text:
Had to replace the mini splits in my shop. Called on Valley since they did my home unit a couple years back and I've been completely satisfied. Well our service tech Alex was great he gave us the down and dirty on the old unit and was kind enough to recommend the appropriate replacement. Needless to say we met our install team, Brandon B and Vance K, first thing this morning.  They were very friendly and very informative. Got the job dine without a hiccup and my exotic woods are now cool and safe from the humidity.

Thanks a bunch guys.!

Another satisfied customer.

Bill

name: William Weaver
text:
Had to replace the mini splits in my shop. Called on Valley since they did my home unit a couple years back and I've been completely satisfied.
