name: Lavon Parker
text:
Called Valley Heating and Cooling needing a unit checked / possibly a new unit installed for my upstairs. To my surprise I was told someone would be out that same evening to look at my old unit and discuss details of their findings. Fabian arrived that evening to check everything out. We discussed his findings and he gave me options to choose from.
On a day that I was available they were ready to install. Sawyer, John, Clay and Kevin were very professional, respected my home and cleaned up everything before they left. Thank you for getting my upstairs cool again!!

name: Max Parker
text: Adam M identified my problem very quickly. Highly recommended.

name: Michelle Walter
text: Saturday night my heater quit working so i called valley and heating right away then allan the technician came to my house and fixed the heater. Then monday morning the heater quit working again so i called valley/heating again to let then know. The technician named adam check and fixed my hvac and install a new thermostat. He was a nice guy also and tell me the details of my hvac issue. I will give more than 5 star to this business they are professional and good service.

name: Leisa Manzella
text: AC wasn’t cooling, called for a service check and had a tech out within an hour. Ended up needing a new AC..needless to say that afternoon I had cold air! Couldn’t be happier with our new AC and can’t say enough great things about the service the crew provided! Thanks Brandon B., Vance K., John M., and Trevor for a job professionally well done!

name: Carol Atchley
text: Brandon B and Vance K. We’re extremely professional and provided great service!! They explained all that they were doing and did a great job cleaning up after they were done!!  Would highly recommend them!!’

name: Becky Bright
text: Great service, Brandon B. and Vance K were very respectful and answered all of our questions. I would also like to thank Zak G. for coming out late at night and trying his very best keep us comfortable for the rest of the night. Zak was on the ball early the next morning getting us set up to get another ac unit installed in a timely manner.

name: Sandra Smith
text: Adam came out quick even in the heat and fixed my unit quick and efficient. Good service

name: Megan Mcdaniel
text: Alex installed a Whole Home Dehumidifier in our home. It was the best thing we ever did. It made a HUGE difference in the comfort level in our home. We have had issues in the past with high humidity levels and the whole home dehumidifier solves the problem. We set the humidity level at 50% and the unit cycles on and off to remain at that level. Alex was on time and polite and extremely knowledgeable on the system design and installation. There were multiple ways to install the system and Alex suggested the best design. It wasn’t the easiest install/design and he was willing to go the extra effort in making sure it was done right. He was open and honest with us on what to expect and we couldn’t be happier. Thanks to Valley for hiring such skilled and competent people like Alex. We are forever grateful.

name: Jill Bachman
text: Bo, Kevin and CJ installed my ductless split unit and were professional, friendly, helpful and did a great job!   I was given a quote on Friday and they started and finished Monday!

name: Jill Bachman
text: Bo, Kevin and CJ installed my ductless split unit and were professional, friendly, helpful and did a great job!   I was given a quote on Friday and they started and finished Monday!

name: Joe Siwiec
text:
Excellent service from the salesman to the technicians ! Gerald our salesperson was very professional and helped us choose the right AC system for our needs. He did all the legwork on our utility company financing and made everything easy for us.
The technicians - Lance Johnson and Kyler were very professional, courteous and efficient. They took the extra time to answer all of our questions and did a fantastic job on our install.
A good company creates a culture that you can see in its employees. Valley is obviously doing the right things to ensure their employees understand the importance of great customer service . Thanks.

name: jo sims
text: Would like to thank ALEX THORNTON for the prompt and quick service he did on my central unit. He was very professional and helpful . He showed respect and was very helpful to this old woman. Thank you Alex

name: Megan Mcdaniel
text: Alex installed a Whole Home Dehumidifier in our home. It was the best thing we ever did. It made a HUGE difference in the comfort level in our home. We have had issues in the past with high humidity levels and the whole home dehumidifier solves the problem. We set the humidity level at 50% and the unit cycles on and off to remain at that level. Alex was on time and polite and extremely knowledgeable on the system design and installation. There were multiple ways to install the system and Alex suggested the best design. It wasn’t the easiest install/design and he was willing to go the extra effort in making sure it was done right. He was open and honest with us on what to expect and we couldn’t be happier. Thanks to Valley for hiring such skilled and competent people like Alex. We are forever grateful.

name: Brian Marino
text: I couldn't be any more pleased with the install and operation of my entirely new heating and cooling system which included a Trane unit for the main house, a smaller Trane unit for my bonus room and a mini-split for the master bedroom.  The service and professionalism made all the difference!  Brandon B, Vance K, Kyler D, CJ, Tyler E, Sean M, and Clint R. did an amazing job!  Their attention to detail was unmatched with any other contractor I have ever used in the past.  The Senior Tech kept me well informed every step of the way and went above and beyond to correct the mess made from the original install when the house was built.  They were extremely polite, professional, and cared about their workmanship!  Truly great experience that was worth every penny spent!  Great job Valley...I'll be referring you every chance I get!

name: Eddie Jr Senior
text: One of my best customers, good people.

name: Rodolfo Sclafani
text: Just had Alex from Valley Heating and Cooling out here to fix my AC. He was fast, professional, and knowledgeable. He diagnosed and fixed the problem in no time flat. I would highly recommend him to anyone with any HVAC issues.

name: Bruce Imsand
text: It has now been about 3 months.  A 5 ton Daikin inverter high efficiency heat pump was installed.  One day job with two guys (brandon and vance).  Very clean install with no complications at all.  Unit has worked perfectly.  Recommend these guys as a professional service for replacement installs.

name: Wiley Faust
text: My existing unit was over 17 years old. I needed a completely new unit (inside my attic and outside). I was given many choices to choose from and because I used Decatur Utilities I paid nothing upfront, everything was going to be put on my electric bill and paid monthly. The very next day the service men came and installed my unit and showed me how to work the digital controller. They picked up all of their trash and moved my furniture back. Lance and the other men were great. I highly recommend Valley Heating and Cooling.

name: Gaylon Hicks
text: We had Adam out to look at our 12 year old unit, and he really knew what he was doing.  Short version, we ended up buying a new Trane gas pack they installed the next day.  The boot install was pretty tough and had to be redone, but Kyler and Trevor came out the next week and rebuilt it from scratch, and did an excellent job.  The competence of the service techs and installers, and overall responsiveness of the company is a plus.  I would recommend Valley Heating and Cooling to friends and family.

name: Rodolfo Sclafani
text: Just had Alex from Valley Heating and Cooling out here to fix my AC. He was fast, professional, and knowledgeable. He diagnosed and fixed the problem in no time flat. I would highly recommend him to anyone with any HVAC issues.

name: Bruce Imsand
text: It has now been about 3 months.  A 5 ton Daikin inverter high efficiency heat pump was installed.  One day job with two guys (brandon and vance).  Very clean install with no complications at all.  Unit has worked perfectly.  Recommend these guys as a professional service for replacement installs.

name: Gaylon Hicks
text: We had Adam out to look at our 12 year old unit, and he really knew what he was doing.  Short version, we ended up buying a new Trane gas pack they installed the next day.  The boot install was pretty tough and had to be redone, but Kyler and Trevor came out the next week and rebuilt it from scratch, and did an excellent job.  The competence of the service techs and installers, and overall responsiveness of the company is a plus.  I would recommend Valley Heating and Cooling to friends and family.

name: Aaron Francis
text: Thank you Valley Heating and Cooling for replacing our AC so quickly! Brandon and Vance were super kind and friendly, and they did a great job installing our new AC unit! Kevin also did a great job as our service tech! They were prompt, knowledgeable, and super friendly! 10/10 would recommend!

name: Derrick Winfrey
text: Once again a great job by Brandon. My house is fully updated with a new larger 5ton unit thats quieter and more efficient than my old one and added a mini split to a bonus room. The air quality is so much better, much dryer and a lot more flow after the upgrade and finding all of the duct leaks from the last company!

name: rupesh menon
text: I have used Valley Heating’s services last year as well on my HVAC. This year had a small trouble with it. Gave them a call at 7:15 in the morning and had the Service at site by 9:30AM. Very impressed with the Service Technician Adam Mason. He was very diligent and went about attending the problem like a thorough professional. Overall very happy with the services provided. Definitely recommended.

name: Pat Brown
text:
Vance K. and Brandon B. installed us a new unit. First of all they arrived on time and went right to work. They worked hard and were courteous and professional in their work. After the install was complete they went over  the thermostat and how it worked. We highly recommend Valley Heating & Cooling for all of your hvac needs. They will always be our go-to company.   Thank you Valley!

Roger/Patsy Brown

name: Amy Miller
text:
Valley Heating and Cooling was running a contest and we won the new HVAC system!!! These guys did an amazing job!! They were punctual, professional, knowledgeable and hard working. They even went the extra mile and replaced the duct work for free. Kevin and his team did an amazing job and my husband and I would recommend this company to anyone looking to get a new HVAC system installed. Thank you Valley Heating and Cooling for such a wonderful blessing.
Greg & Amy Miller

name: Richard Palmer
text: Valley installed an HVAC unit a year ago. Unit stopped working and it's 96 degrees outside (82 upstairs). Called Valley and the service tech, Alex Thompson, was en route within the hour. Alex was on-time, professional, and very personable. He diagnosed the problem and braved the very hot attic to drain the clogged line. We were back up and running in no time. Thanks Alex and best of luck with everything. I highly recommend Alex and Valley Heating and Cooling

name: #Jbug Vids
text: Great maintenance service. Answered all my questions . Professional service.

name: evelia serrato
text: The service tech Kevin J and our installers Brandon B and Vance K did on excellent job on our home, very professional  and finish their job the same day, I really recommend 💯% Valley Heating and Cooling!

name: Debbie DeCroes
text: We went with Valley to replace our air units because previously they have given excellent on-time responsive service to our old units. They kept in touch with us thoughout the morning to update us on their arrival and we couldn't be happier with the results. All four gentlemen--Brandon, Vance, Jeff, and Jonathan M. worked quickly and efficiently. They took time to explain every aspect of the contract and the details of the new units. They rewired and perfectly labelled the mechanisms and were clean and polite.  We are very satisfied with our choice in providers.

name: Jana Trigg
text: Very impressed with the caliber of service! Alex T, Vance K and Brandon B make a great team to bring fast and thorough service to fix our HVAC problems. Thank you Valley Heating and Cooling!

name: BRANDON SPARKS
text: Adam Mason, our service technician was responsive, on time and very professional.  He spelled out all the options and everything he was doing as he went along.  We have used Valley Heating and Cooling now twice and we have had a great experience with them both times. I would recommend them and Adam Mason.   Hartselle AL

name: Marvin Howard
text:
Mid-July in Alabama, and naturally, our A/C goes out !
Called and got a same day diagnosis from Valley H/C Service Tech, Fabian, that there was no reasonable way to save our 20 year-old unit, and he gave us a not-cheap, but reasonable estimate on a high SEER Trane A/C and heat pump unit with a 10 year parts and labor service warranty. He also assured us that they could have everything up and running by Thursday (the following day - VERY IMPORTANT) !
Thursday morning, early, we met our Installers, Vance K. and Brandon B..
Nice guys, who immediately got after replacing our dead unit with the new  Trane system.
Took about 6 HOT hours, but we were gratefully cooling by 4 o’clock !
Highest praise to Fabian, Vance and Brandon !  I’d recommend them and their professionalism to ANYONE!
Kudos to Valley Heating and Cooling. They’ve got our business from now on !

name: Larry Penn
text: I've been using valley for about two years they've always been very prompt and courteous and today I had a heat pump put in and Brandon and Vance were very professional with everything they did

name: Melissa Mccullar
text: Thank you Tyler E, Brandon B, Jeff R and Jonathan M for your professionalism and work.

name: Belinda Bishop
text: Valley just finished with the installation of our new A/C and gas furnace system.  We're SO excited.  We scheduled our regular maintenance with Valley.  Alex came out and did a thorough inspection.  The original system was over 30 years old, but we had some refurbishments done in 2007 (also by Valley).  The original system was shot.  Alex sat down with us and went over all the options.  Everything was thoroughly explained.  He really knew what he was talking about.  Lance & Kyler came the following day to do the installation.  EVERYTHING was done so professionally and quickly.  We have dogs and these guys worked with us to make sure everyone (including the dogs) was taken care of.  Since completion took a little longer than expected (having to wait for someone to do the inspection), Valley provided space heaters to use overnight.  Followup and coordination were outstanding!  We switched out an outdated heat pump with this new system.  We look forward to many years of efficiency with this new system.  Thanks Valley!

name: Tim Albright
text: Awesome job by Tech Adam Mason.  Saved us a fortune.  We're moving our business to Valley HVAC!

name: Deadra Wilson
text: We were really impressed with the people. They were all so very nice . They explained everything very well and there were no surprises. Big Thank you to Adam M. Who did the estimate and Brandon B., Vance K., Sean M., and Bo W. For doing the installation. I highly recommend Valley Heating and Cooling.

name: Helen Hutto
text: We were extremely satisfied with the service. They installed a new heating and cooling system and did an outstanding job. The technician , Zack, who identified our problem was very professional and informative. The installation crew, Brandon B. and Vance K. were equally professional and informative. The customer service skills of all three of these employees were outstanding. We would highly recommend Valley Heating and Cooling in the future. Thanks for your great work!

name: wes poole
text: I called out Valley Heating & Cooling, their service tech Alex T. came out very quickly. When we arrived he was very professional and got right to work, He took detailed pictures of both units and explained what was going on. 10/10. We end purchasing a new unit and Brandon B. & Vance K. came out the very next day and got right to work as well. The guys were very explanatory in what they had done that day and also helped explaining the new thermostat. Both very professional on the service/installation side of things. Highly recommended.

name: AWW Mc
text: My 13 year old air conditioning system began to fail on a Friday afternoon over a hot and humid weekend.  Fortunately I was able to contact Gerald Rollo and he put together a package to replace my system first thing Monday.  Vance and Brandon called that morning to confirm my appointment, arrived on time and immediately went to work.  They were professional and knowledgable, explaining what they were there to do and answered my questions while doing the install.  I watched as they worked and appreciate that they take a moment to neatly route the wiring and coolant lines. This results in a better finished product in my opinion and reduces the chance of a call back.  They obviously take pride in their work, cleaning and picking up any and all debris while they did the install.  I highly recommend Valley Heating & Cooling to anyone looking for either repair or replacement of their AC system.

name: Katy Davis
text: We recently had a new AC installed by Valley Heating & Cooling and they were awesome! The team was very professional and did a great job. Thanks to Brandon, Vance, Jeff, John, Andrew and Blake. These guys were amazing!

name: Kody McCullar
text: Very professional and satisfied. Thanks Tyler E, Brandon B, Jeff R and Jonathan M.

name: Carol McGuire
text: Just had to have our very old unit replaced. Called Valley and Adam Mason, service tech came out quickly and assessed our unit, was very professional and explained everything to us. Brandon B and Vance K came out next day and installed new unit. They were very professional, did great job!

name: Carolyn Browning
text: We had a new 3 ton Daikin split heat pump installed today. Bo and Sean were the installers and were just top of the line. They were very professional, polite, and knowledgeable. Thank you Bo and Sean for a job well done. Thank you Valley Heating and Cooling for being a company that cares.

name: Kelsey Wanserski
text: Kyler and Jeff were great. They went the extra mile to insure customer satisfaction.

name: mmckinney1982
text:
I called late in the afternoon yesterday after deciding to have a new unit installed vs. repairing the old one again. Gerald was very quick to return my phone call. Once I explained our situation, he made it a point to come out to the house after regular business hours to discuss my options. When I made a decision to move forward with Valley H&C for the replacement unit, he was able to get a crew lined up for me immediately to have it installed today. Vance and Brandon were very punctual and were at my house ready to get started about 20 minutes earlier than expected. They worked very diligently for the entire day to ensure we had cool air again before this evening. I am very grateful and satisfied for the rapid and professional service provided. The two of them are very knowledgeable and were able to answer all of my questions (most before I even asked 👍). I would, without hesitation, recommend this company again to anyone needing a new unit installed and I will venture to guess that their repair service is just as reliable.
I will return to post an actual product review once it has been in service long enough to give an honest assessment.
Thank you again to Brandon, Vance, Gerald, and the rest of the team for working so hard to get us some much needed air conditioning in excellent timing.

name: Kaitlyn McCullar
text: Thanks Tyler E, Brandon B, Jeff R and Jonathan M for doing such a professional job installing our heat pump. I would highly recommend you guys.

name: Dusten Curvin
text: Quick to respond. Had service tech showed up that day . About hour after I called. Could not ask for better service than that . My service tech Fabian N. was very professional and showed me what I had going on, and gave me options on my issues. And also helped me get finance with my new unit. very helpful during this stressful time. They had my new unit in the next day. My installers Brandon B and Vance K. went beyond what I expected . With installing new vents and even putting up my dryer vent that had fell down under my house . Will be recommending them to everyone . Thanks for the help.

name: NEB JR
text: My experience with Brandon B and Vance K was exceptional.  They were both very professional and I was extremely satisfied with their service.  They even took the time to explain the issue and how they were going to resolve it. I would definitely recommend them.

name: Donnie Yates
text: Valley Heating & Cooling is a great company to deal with. Our son just bought his 1st home a few months ago and last night his system stopped working. We called them, set up an appointment and the system is now fixed and back working. Very professional service technician and very friendly staff when you call the office! Thank you Valley for helping my son!! 5 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

name: Elizabeth And Raul Uriarte
text: Alex came on a Friday night to work on the HVAC at my Mom's. He checked everything and was very thorough in asking/answering questions. He was very considerate and listened to everything my Mother said and fixed the issue. Definitely use this company for all your HVAC needs!

name: Kenneth Richards
text:
My twenty year old central unit was showing its age and had too many things wrong with it.  It was going to cost more than I wanted to put in it for repair so after discussions with Adam Mason I decided to replace it.  Before the day was over my new unit was in place and running, thanks to the professional and efficient crew of Brandon B., John M., Lance, Kyler, Sean, and Kevin F.  Great job, Guys.  Thanks to Adam for the little extra.

Someone left a pair of shades so if you are wondering where they are, now you know.

Certainly recommend this company.

name: Susan Green
text: We were really impressed with Vance and Kyler. They were all so very nice. They did an amazing job on the installation of our new unit. They explained everything very well and answered any questions we had. I highly recommend Valley Heating and Cooling.

name: Steve Atchley
text: Brandon B and Vance K were very personable and professional.

name: Dagan Burnett
text: We were serviced by Kevin and it was extremely quick and the best experience I've ever had with any kind of HVAC company. They were great and Kevin was awesome.

name: Tony Waket
text: Valley Heating and Cooling is a wonderful company. They just installed my new unit today and did a great job, the installers Brandon B , Vance K, Jeff R, and John M did a great job and cleaned up after the job was complete. Kevin J did an excellent job telling me what the problems were and giving my best options. Thank you guys for all that you do...

name: Debbie E
text: I would like to say this business is extremely professional in every aspect of customer service. Many thanks to Adam Mason the service tech, Brandon B and Vance K the installers. Also Jerrod for all his help with financing. This is not the first time I have used this company and definitely won’t be the last!!  Many thanks to you all.  Deborah E. Decatur Al

name: Glynda Stephenson
text: I would like to Thank Fabian Napoleon for helping with a last minute issue with the heat pump at our daughters townhouse. The day she was to close on the sale of her townhouse, we noticed ( it was August) the heat pump was icing over. Mr Napoleon came out and was able to do a repair that would allow the new owner to some time between the purchase of the townhouse and needing a replacement.

name: Kari Walker
text:
Valley Heating has been so good to us. I am a landlord of several rental properties and they are always timely and efficient. Anything that keeps my tenants happy- keeps me happy. I will always use Valley Heating and cooling.
Adam was especially friendly and helpful. Very knowledgeable and explained everything during the repair. Made me feel so confident in their services.

name: Teresa Bates
text: Here is a Shout out to installers Brandon B, Vance K, and service tech Adam M for the absolute Awesome job that they did at our Home installing our new Bosch Central Unit. These guys worked diligently to remove the old unit and install our new unit. They were polite and professional  and courteous from start to finish, cleaning up as they worked, they kept us cool from start to finish which was very important to us as I am a full time caregiver for my Mom, who has Alzheimer's and her comfort was of the utmost importance to us. I would and will recommend Valley Heating and cooling to anyone that is in need of Service for heat and cooling.

name: David Thrasher
text: Topnotch company! Adam Mason was very professional and courteous. Will only use Valley Heating and Cooling for all my HVAC needs...

name: Stephen McNutt
text: Very pleased with the service, quality, responsiveness and professionalism with Valley Heating and Cooling. I would especially like to recognize Alex T. for his diligence and troubleshooting our HVAC issue and repairing/fixing the problem! I highly recommend Valley Heating and Cooling for your HVAC needs.

name: Carin B.
text: I highly recommend Valley Heating and Cooling. They are honest, sincere and customer oriented.  I had major HVAC repairs several years ago with another company, but when I started having problems again I called Valley H &C and so glad I did. Matt the technician explained things about my system I did not know and I think the prior company I used should have told me. Valley H&C put in a new system and the installers Brandon B. and Vance K. did an excellent job.  I was so impressed with their approach. They were courteous, professional and took care while inside my home. So nice to find genuine customer service. They called before they arrived, explained everything they would do, how long it would take, etc. My thanks to Matt, Brandon and Vance. I truly appreciate their expertise and sincere customer service.

name: wb wilson
text: Adam Mason did an excellent job. Was very professional and proficient in the performance of his task. Thanks wb wilson sr

name: Sandra Tidwell
text:
I had a new unit installed 5/21 and Andrew and Blake couldn’t have been more respectful and hardworking. It was very hot that day, but the heat didn’t slow them down at all.  Also, I appreciate Andrew’s explanations and answering any questions I had.
Tyler came out before the unit was installed and very thoroughly checked everything out. He too was very thorough and explained everything he did.

name: Clifton Rogers
text: Can't say enough about the whole team at Valley Heating & Cooling. Exceptional all around customer service. They are highly responsive, knowledgeable, trustworthy, and they do excellent work. Special thanks to Kevin J, Brandon B, Blake A, and Andrew J for taking good care of us. They did everything they could to save our almost 30-year-old unit. When that wasn't possible, they made the entire replacement process easy.

name: Jane Laughmiller
text: We had some problems Friday they came straight away were here for 4 hours.unfortunally could not repair problem. Saturday they sent Alex out what nice guy so polite, enjoyed speaking with him, very knowledgeable knows what he’s doing  I would like him to service my unit everytime. He informed us that they have to send for a part. Everyone is real nice just found him the best one. Hope he stays with the company

name: Scott Buchanan
text: Had two amazing techs put in my unit and get everything up to date. They were both very friendly and nice to my child when she would not leave them alone lol. Vance K and Brandon B made sure everything is running good. Thank you

name: Lori Lessley
text: I called VHC today and Kevin was out quickly to look at a potential issue.  He was extremely helpful and professional.  I appreciated his assistance.  Thank you Kevin!!

name: Laurence McCrary
text:
Today's installation was perfect. Brandon B. Blake A and Vance K. were professional, courteous, and efficient.

We always use Valley Heating and Cooling. They do excellent work.

name: Charlie Overby
text: Adam at Valley Heating and Cooling did a extremely wonderful job at a great price of repairing my A/C unit! He never got into a rush, took his time with the repairs, and never once made any kind of a mess at all. I highly recommend this company with it's knowledgeable staff to handle any of your A/C repair needs. Thanks Valley Heating and Cooling for getting my A/C back on the right track!

name: Jonathan Baggs
text: Been dealing with some issues with my gas unit for a few weeks now and Valley Heating and Cooling and particularly service tech Adam Mason has gone above and beyond to resolve things for me. He is the reason I always recommend Valley to anyone needing good, dependable, responsive service for all HVAC needs. He and Valley are quite simply the best in the business. Thank you !!!

name: Delita Potter
text: I was very satisfied with the service from Valley Heating & Cooling. Fabian diagnosed the issue and gave us a couple of options. Brandon and Vance did a fantastic job installing the new system. They kept me informed on what they were doing and made sure I understood the new wall panel before leaving. I highly recommend this company.

name: Jeffrey Kirkland
text: Great service! Competitively priced, offered a better warranty, and quick service. They gave us a quote the same day we called and were not pushy for a sale. The installers Vance K. and Brandon B. were very helpful and answered any questions I had during the replacement of my HVAC system. They were professional, polite, and had great attitudes.

name: William Murner
text: Lance and Kyler called arrived on time , were careful and courteous and very efficient in installing the unit. We were very pleased with their work and their their explanation  of equipment. They answered all our questions.

name: miss Baker
text: Special thanks to Jonathan and Jeff of valley heating and cooling! They were great and they did a very good job of putting in our new unit!

name: Shirley Gillis
text: Adam responded to our call that our Aux Heating was running on our downstairs HVAC unit.  He did a thorough check and explained what he found wrong and gave us a price for the repair.  He also explained that he found mold growing in the pan under our coil and gave us multiple fixes for this problem along with pricing for each.  I can't praise Adam enough!  When he left our home our unit was back up and running and the mold issue had been resolved.  I will be requesting Adam for our future bi-annual service calls.  He's the best!

name: Jill Belbey
text: 5 Stars!  Valley Heating replaced my 37 year old unit that was full of Mold.  Adam came out and gave me several options, from trying to repair the old unit to getting an entire new system.  We went with a new unit and we are extremely happy we did.  Installers Brandon B and Vance K were very professional and I was amazed they were able to get it going all in the same day.  Thank you Valley.  I highly recommend.

name: Randi Thomas
text: Kevin did a fantastic job fixing my unit!! He came after hours and made sure he stayed until the problem was fixed. He was extremely knowledgeable and gave excellent customer service. I appreciate the friendly attitude and smile on his face while working. I highly recommend Valley Heating and Cooling!

name: Jon Colbert
text: It takes a team of good folks to be successful.  It was nice to see some hard working installers take pride in their work.  Vance K., Brandon B. and Kevin J. provided excellent communication, and a professional install of our new heat pump and furnace.  Valley has a good team in these guys; Gerald too.  Well done and thanks.

name: Taylor Elizabeth
text: Vance and Brandon were so nice to work with. They were very professional and got the job done quickly. We really appreciated how they communicated everything thoroughly so we were always on the same page. Overall they were very helpful and we appreciate the wonderful job they did. Thanks guys!

name: Pasty Posey
text: Alex Thorton was very professional and knowledgeable.  This company has a bright future with this young man. I will recommend,  Alex.

name: Kimberly Holt
text: I recently purchased a new unit from Valley Heating and Cooling.  I was extremely pleased with everyone involved.  Gerald came to my home the day I called and gave me the different options available. The very next day the installers, Brandon B., Vance K., and Jonathan M. arrived to install my new unit.  They arrived early and worked all day in very hot conditions.  They were all very professional, hardworking and knowledgeable.  All my questions were answered before they left.  I highly recommend Valley for any of your heating and cooling needs.

name: Renee Bond
text: Kevin & Clint came and installed our new unit today very Professional explained everything step by step did a excellent job! Thank you both so much!

name: Janet Rollo
text: Lance and Kyler installed us a new unit. They worked hard and were very professional. Explained what they were doing while working. We highly recommend Valley Heating & Cooling.

name: Sherry Strickland
text: Adam, Kevin & Clay all did a very good job!  Very quiet, clean & professional!  Thank you guys!!

name: Nikki Eddy
text: Valley Heating and Cooling goes above and beyond. They took time to explain everything. They gave me three choices. They did not pressure me to make a particular choice. They were on time and always called when they were headed to my house. They kept me well informed while working at my home. Everyone that I talked to from the lady that answered the phone to the men that came out to my house were knowledgeable, friendly, and helpful. I could not have asked for better. I will always use Valley Heating and Cooling and I will recommend them to everyone!!

name: Shanee Thompson
text: Adam serviced our units and suggested an add on to help with allergies!

name: Jeannine Hill
text: I have been doing business with Valley Heating and Cooling for many,  many years and have never been disappointed. The technicians are always prompt, polite and ready to begin work. They are also very knowledgeable and will address all my concerns. Nate was the service tech that came first, discovered the problem and made his recommendations. After answering all my questions, I chose the unit I wanted and he took over from there. The installers, Brandon B., Johnathan M. And Vance K., were here the following morning on time and completed their jobs efficiently and professionally. Can't ask for better than that. I always choose  Valley Heating and Cooling.

name: Connor Francis
text: Brandon B., Vance K., and Kevin J. are some of the nicest people I have ever met, and I'm truly appreciative for their service.

name: AJ Wagner
text: So far were very pleased with our new heating and cooling unit . All the guys that installed the unit were very friendly, polite, got the job done as soon as possible and explained everything to us about the new unit. Valley Heating and Cooling are very lucky to have guys like Vance K and Brandon B working for them.When they were finished  they did a great job of cleaning up also

name: Timothy Ministry
text: Adam Mason was my technician and he quickly found and resolved the problem with my unit.  I would highly recommend!  Thanks for the quick response time.

name: Tanya
text: Adam Mason got my units cooling properly again. He went above and beyond to make sure everything was clean and functioning properly. He also took the time to explain the issue and show me how to care for them in between services.

name: L Powers
text: Quick response and Great installation.  Brandon B and Vance K were very courteous and professional in their demeanor and work.  Thanks Fabian for responding in the late evening and getting everything in order for the installation.   I have used Valley for several years and have always been pleased with their service.

name: Haley Sivley Cobb
text: I called at 8:45 PM, and Alex was here by 9:30. I felt terrible about calling so late but he showed up HAPPY to help. I couldn’t have asked for better customer service. Thanks for saving us Alex!

name: Crystal James
text: I would like to brag on the owner Jason and the rest of the Valley family .My husband Kevin James has been working for valley for almost a year now. My family and I really appreciate the quality time we get to spend with him now that he don't work out state any more. I understand he has to work long hours to take care of Valleys customers.Their custom service and experienced employees are second to none. Do not hesitate to call these guys they will have you going asap !

name: Lori Fulmer
text: Thank you for your quick response and in getting us a new unit the next day!! To hot for no air! Huge shout out to the guys for installing it so quickly. Kevin James,  Brandon B and Vance K you guys are awesome.

name: Tommy Parker
text:
The technician, Kevin was helpful in explaining the problem that was occurring and the options that were available for us.
After we decided what we wanted to do, he further explained cost and effectiveness of the units.   He called the morning of the installation to assist with application process and to let us know when the installers would be there.
We received a call by the installers as we were told, letting us know when they would arrive.  When Andrew J and Blake A came out to install the unit, they explained what they would be doing.  At the end of the installation, they went over all the things we would need to do and explained how to set everything up and the process the unit would go through.  We were told to call anytime night or day  if there was a problem.    We were pleased with the process as a whole.  If this unit is as good as the people who provided the service, we will have it made.
We called Valley the morning of problem and they came out that day. Great service.

name: Cheri Morgan
text: Adam Mason was very knowledgeable on my system and explained what the problem was. After ordering my part and replacing it  double checked to make sure everything was ok. Called every time to let me know he was on his way. Thank you Adam

name: Joshua Fields
text: Excellent work! Adam M. the service technician was knowledgeable and proficient. He delivered fast solution to the problem, and he provided excellent customer service.

name: Barbara Allen
text: Adam came out to check my furnace.  He was highly informative about the safeguards built into my furnace and explained how their service calls are handled.  He ordered the necessary part.  He’s an asset to the company.

name: Jon Holt
text: Valley made the whole process easy for the homeowner. Brandon B, Vance K, and Johnathan M were professional, hardworking and knowledgeable. I highly recommend Valley and will only be using them in the future.

name: Raymond Webb
text: They are always courteous on time professional. Adam Mason walked me thru the process . I felt he did a top notch job. I do recommend this company for your HVAC needs

name: Marilyn Liles
text: Alex who came today to do the annual service was on time, professional.  Found a small problem I reported and fixed it, a bug!! Have been pleased with Valley for many years!!

name: tim shorey
text: Great customer service.  Technician who came out was extremely professional, highly knowledgeable and went above and beyond to get my unit working properly. Highly recommend this company

name: Danny Weaver

name: chris ray
text: I had a new central unit put in and couldn't be happier with the overall experience. Vance and Brandon were very professional and got the job done quickly. They kept me in the loop with everything as the job went on. The service tech, Fabian, came out initially when the old unit went out was great as well. He got us a temporary unit set up in the house to hold us over til the new unit came in. I also use this company because they are very timely with getting to you.

name: Jon Bierer
text: Alex was great, very thorough, explained everything. Hope to deal with him again in the future.

name: Sandy Forrester
text: It was time to have a new heat and air system installed, so I called Valley. And I'm so glad I did. Just minutes after I talked with someone in the office, Gerald called and set up an appointment for that afternoon. He was so nice, listened carefully to everything I wanted in a system, and recommended one that I love. The heat pump is very attractive; it's quiet, runs about half as much as my old system, and has already saved me a significant amount of money, while keeping every room in the house at a consistent and comfortable temperature. He could have set up installation for 2 days later, but that didn't work for me, so we scheduled it for the following week. Vance and Blake, who installed the system, were just as nice and professional as Gerald. They did a super job, finished it in 1 day, and did a fantastic clean-up. Someone from my local electric company came to inspect the work so that I could get a rebate from TVA, and told me that they had done an excellent job. Valley knows what rebates are available, and handled setting that up so that I didn't have to do anything. And a few weeks later, I received a check! This is the best experience I've ever had when having major work done on the house. I wouldn't go to anyone but Valley for my heating and air services. Just wish I could give them 10 stars. They deserve it!

name: Anna Simonsen
text: Valley heating and air has the friendliest most professional techs. Matt was so friendly when he came today. If you need work done on your system call Valley.

name: Mike Massey
text: Andrew J.  Blake A.  Lance J.  and Kyler D. all worked to change out my heat pump and add insulation to the attic.  It was a miserable rainy day but that didn't slow these guys down. They arrived on time and finished swapping out both units complete with insulation to the attic in around 6 hours and did a great job on the cleanup. In this day and age it's hard to find this kind of dedicated employee.

name: Ellen Cumbess
text: A failing cooling system prompted me to phone Valley to have my unit checked.  Because of the time of year – I asked that they please check both the cooling and heating sides.  After a very thorough investigation, several problems were identified – the most significant of which was a badly corroded heat exchanger.  Had this problem gone unnoticed, the weak spots would have resulted in CO2 filling my home and possibly killing my family.  When I say they saved my life – I mean in the literal sense!  Thank you Kevin and Jacob for your conscientious work and quick response.   My family is safe and comfortable thanks to you.

name: GaminGrayson P
text: Called VHC about my a/c going out because the guy with the company that installed it was out of town. My unit is still under warranty but since they were not the ones to install it they informed me I'd have to pay labor. The first person I talked to wouldn't/couldn't tell me what the labor rate was so I told them I couldn't schedule someone not knowing what I am being charged per hr. Someone else called back and their answer was $65 for service charge plus $265 for swapping a fan motor that took all of 30 min the last time it went out. When I asked why so much they basically said because they have to pay shipping on parts and don't get paid back for that and that they have to purchase upfront and get reimbursed by the manufacturer. So, basically, they were charging me for the parts and shipping all in the "labor price" even though my warranty covers the parts. That came straight out of the horses mouth so definitely would not recommend for service if they didn't put your unit in. They'll rip you off, or try at least. I told them absolutely not, I'll weight till my service guy gets back to town.

resp.text:
J.P,

We apologize you were not happy with the service we provided you on your cooling system. It is true when you buy a unit from a competitor other HVAC companies will not cover the competitors labor that's just not good business. Also we cannot stay in business by only charging labor a mark up of the part has to be calculated into other wise we break even. If you buy your unit from us you will be guaranteed same day service and your warranty will be covered in full. What you cannot except it to buy from our competitor (at a cheaper price) then ask us to do all the free work. To add to it I'm not sure why you would be so mad at us when we showed up for you the same day and the company you actually gave your money to for your new unit didn't show up.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. We do our best to make sure our clients know exactly what is going on with their unit.

name: Dane Benton
text:
Terrible workmanship paired with an equally repulsive attitude towards customers.

Our A/C unit died in August of 2017. Luckily, we had a warranty through Old Republic, which paid for a replacement unit. Unfortunately, however, the company that Old Republic required us to use for installation was 5 Star Heating and Air Conditioning out of Foley, AL.

Over the past year, we have experienced several issues with our new unit not cooling the house properly. About two months ago, we came home to soggy carpet and buckled wood floors due to the drain pipe for our unit overflowing. My father came by to take a look at the unit and noticed that the "Safe-T-Switch float valve", which cuts the unit off if the drain pipe clogs and fills up, was installed ON THE WRONG SIDE OF THE UNIT, rendering it completely useless.

We called 5 Star and they did come out to the house and move the valve to the correct side without charging us, which we felt was the least they could do since their poor workmanship was the cause of this incident. Over the past few weeks, we noticed that our outside unit would randomly cut off during the day, making the house unbearable to be inside. We called 5 Star, and they let us know that it would be $100 to come out and take a look at it. At this point, I decided to call another company to come look at it rather than paying 5 Star.

The other Service Man came out and took a look at it and noticed that the inside of the pipe that the float valve was attached to was clogged with sealant, preventing the flow of water. (See attached photos) I'm no plumber, but I can tell you that when you put sealant inside the female coupling, and push the male part in, the sealant has nowhere to go but inside the pipe, which prevents the drain pipe from being able to drain water. He replaced the drain pipe, and put the float valve in the correct place, and amazingly, our A/C unit works like new!

I will be sure to let everyone know how much money my "no-cost warranty replacement" A/C unit has cost me thanks to 5 Star's sub-par work.

Photo 1 - Crazy Straw like drain pipe from 5 Star
Photo 2 - Sealant inside pipe (photo taken after I punched a large portion of the sealant out of the pipe)
Photo 3 - New drain pipe installed by another {competent} A/C Repair company

resp.text: Dane, we are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with our options for maintenance. We felt that our repair of the float valve and drain line were sufficient in correcting the problem. We at 5 Star Air Conditioning pride ourselves on excellent workmanship, and truly hope that you understand our position with the 30 day warranty. Please remember proper maintenance is critical, and we are happy to hear that your A/C unit is working properly.

name: Christina W
text: Amazing service! Was able to text my issue and receive information about service call all via text. Paul M. responded quickly in less than 60 minutes from initial text to arrival. Paul asked insightful questions about what had happened that day and also explained how the system worked in summer and winter, so I learned a lot about systems down here and how to care for them as opposed to how systems run up North. When we need a new AC, we will definitely call 5 Star Air to do the job!

name: Maureen E McGuire
text:
My home was getting warmer and warmer. I didn’t know why because the air conditioner was on. Finally, I went outside to check the unit and saw the fans were not turning because one of the blades had been torn in half and was wedged along the unit’s edge. This is all happening in the early evening, I’m going to my granddaughter’s graduation & my unit is 21 years old. Being very new to the area, I called the business closest to me. What a WONDERFUL group of people!
They listened to my problem, came to my home immediately to assess the situation and gave me very useful tips and information. Took the damaged part and replaced it. Then, made sure it was working properly. They took care of me like I was a member of their family. Thanks to them, I made it to the graduation & my home was cool when I returned.

resp.text: Maureen, thank you for the kind words!

He also said if you are not on her good side, she will make sure the installation is prolonged "like she did a customer in Point Clear." Well, he was honest about that!  BUT...
I was lied to, I was reprimanded on the phone, I was discriminated against, and was led on for 3 weeks and 4 days without Air Conditioning. My home warranty is conducting a detailed investigation and I hope They will never be able to do this to anyone again. They were cruel and vindictive.

We apologize for the communication that you felt was not very helpful to your situation. We try to be as helpful and informational as possible while still running a business. The supply stores that we purchase materials from do not sell to the public and, we are truly sorry, that we can not be of additional assistance on who you can purchase from.
